T02D1202:166a-31: nub pa ni chad pa ste mun pa lta bu'o //

T02D1202:166a-34: dus zhes pa ni 'das pa'i dus kyang ma yin /
T02D1202:166a-35: ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma yin /
T02D1202:166a-36: da ltar zhes kyang dmigs su med ba'i dus te /
T02D1202:166a-37: de lta bu'i dus su me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pa rgyas pa'i dus so //
T02D1202:166a-38: de yang rlung phyir rgyu ba dang /
T02D1202:166a-39: nang du rgyu ba med pa'o //
T02D1202:166a-41: shin tu rgyu ba'i dus dang ni //
T02D1202:166a-42: shin tu min pa dus gnyis te //
T02D1202:166a-43: sna yi bu ga gnyis ka yi'o //
T02D1202:166a-44: gnyis ka min pa de nyid ni //
T02D1202:166a-45: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1202:166b-0: padma'i 'bras bu'i 'dod @166b ba ni rtsa'i dbyibs padma'i
T02D1202:166b-1: 'bras bu 'dra ba yod pa de 'dod pa ni
T02D1202:166b-2: rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i sbyor thabs
T02D1202:166b-3: dang / dga' ba skye ba'i rgyu'o //
T02D1202:166b-4: de yang las kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa la brten pa la 'byung ngo //
T02D1202:166b-5: lus 'dar zhas pa ni de las byung nas 'dar
T02D1202:166b-6: ba'i dga' ba la sogs pa'i shes rab mas rgyu
T02D1202:166b-7: byas nas 'byung ba dang brten pa 'dar bar byas
T02D1202:166b-8: pa'o // nyes ba zhes bya ba'i rlung dang ldan nas /
T02D1202:166b-9: stobs zhes bya ba'i thig ler gnas pas 'bras bu smin no //
T02D1202:166b-10: drag po'i ming ni rtsa'i dbyibs ru dr'aksha bzhin gnas pa la bya'o //
T02D1202:166b-11: des ni drag po'i mig mtshon pa'o //
T02D1202:166b-13: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems mi gnas ba ste /
T02D1202:166b-15: mnyam pa zhes pa ni me dang mnyam pa'i rlung gi ming ngo //
T02D1202:166b-16: ldan zhes pa ni dga' ba dang rlung du ldan pa ste /
T02D1202:166b-17: byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan no //
T02D1202:166b-18: sprin zhes pa ni bde ba'i thig le'i mtshan gyi
T02D1202:166b-19: rnam grangs de'i dus su thams cad dang ldan no
T02D1202:166b-20: // rigs kyi me tog ces pa la sogs pa ni bla ma las rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1202:166b-21: thog ni sngangs 'jigs byed pa ste //
T02D1202:166b-22: zhes pa ni thog babs sam brgyab kyang bred pa bzhin /
T02D1202:166b-23: rang bzhin dga' ba spros pa thams cad dang bral
T02D1202:166b-24: ba dga' ba thams cad kyi thog tu gyur pa
T02D1202:166b-25: dang / gzhan yang thog ces pa rang bzhin dga'
T02D1202:166b-26: ba'i rnam grangs su brtags pa des chad pa'i dga'
T02D1202:166b-27: ba la sogs pa rnams 'jigs shing bred par byed
T02D1202:166b-28: dang / pa'o // 'o na rang bzhin dga' ba de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1202:166b-29: dga' ba kun dang mi mnyam pa dngos po med pa yin no //
T02D1202:166b-30: rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las kyang gsungs te /
T02D1202:166b-31: rang bzhin dga' ba dngos po men //
T02D1202:166b-32: dngos bo ma yin pa yang min //
T02D1202:166b-33: srid dang mya ngan 'das pa min //
T02D1202:166b-34: char yar thig le tshul ma yin //
T02D1202:166b-37: rlag dang longs spyod la sogs bral //
T02D1202:166b-38: dga' ba rnams kyis brjod mi nus //
T02D1202:166b-39: thig le la sogs 'joms pa'i lha //
T02D1202:166b-40: de nyid rang bzhin ye shes so //
T02D1202:166b-41: de bas na mtshan mar snang ba'i ye shes thams cad dang thun mong ma yin no //
T02D1202:166b-42: de la nub pa bcu drug yin //
T02D1202:167a-0: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems mi @167a * //
T02D1202:167a-1: gsal ba la ni bcu drug yin bya'o //

T02D1202:167a-3: longs spyod dang rlag pa la sogs pa ni rang
T02D1202:167a-4: bzhin dga' ba zhes mi bya'o //
T02D1202:167a-6: rang bzhin dga' ba de yod min //
T02D1202:167a-8: rang bzhin dga' ba la ni shar dang nub pa'i
T02D1202:167a-9: dngos po longs spyod la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'i ye
T02D1202:167a-10: shes med pa'o // yon po'i gdung bu zhes pa
T02D1202:167a-11: ni la la n'a g-yon phyogs na lu gu rgyud
T02D1202:167a-12: shes med pa'o // bzhin gnas pa'o // rtsa ba'i
T02D1202:167a-13: lte ba zhes pa la sogs pa ni srog ma'i

T02D1202:167a-30: ro // zhes bya'o // bshad // / bshad zin
T02D1202:167a-31: pa'o // de ltar bshad nas bsdus pa 'di nas
T02D1202:167a-33: dngos dang rten dang rnam par 'byed //
T02D1202:167a-34: ces pa la sogs par dngos ni las kyi phyag
T02D1202:167a-35: rgya'i lta ba la sogs pa'i sbyor thabs sum cu
T02D1202:167a-36: rtsa gnyis te / dga' ba dang sprul pa'i 'khor lo la sogs pa'o //
T02D1202:167a-37: yang na dngos po ni dam tshig gi phyag rgyas
T02D1202:167a-38: byang chub kyi sems rtsa de rnams mdud par brten
T02D1202:167a-39: pa dang mchog gi dga' ba dang chos kyi 'khor
T02D1202:167a-41: yang rten gyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rang gi
T02D1202:167a-42: bde ba'i rten byang chub kyi sems thig le la
T02D1202:167a-44: ye shes ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya rang gis rig cing rtogs pa ste /
T02D1202:167a-45: yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang kun rdzob
T02D1202:167a-46: byang chub kyi sems gnyis las byung bar rig pa'am
T02D1202:167a-47: chad pa'i dga' ba dang longs spyod 'khor lo la
T02D1202:167a-48: sogs pa'o // yang na ye shes ni chos kyi
T02D1202:167a-49: rang bzhin gyi phyag rgyas rig pa'i byang chub kyi
T02D1202:167a-51: rnam par 'byed pa zhes pa ni chos kyi rang
T02D1202:167a-52: bzhin gyi phyag rgyas bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin
T02D1202:167a-53: rig pa dang bral bar phye nas rtogs pa'am /
T02D1202:167b-0: bde chen 'khor lo @167b la sogs pa'o //
T02D1202:167b-1: yang na rnam par 'byed pa ni phyag rgya thams
T02D1202:167b-2: cad dang bral ba byang chub kyi sems kyi rang
T02D1202:167b-3: bzhin phye nas ye shes kyi gzhi dang bcas pa
T02D1202:167b-4: spangs pa'o // de ltar bsdus pa'i phye ba bstan nas rgyas pa'i phye ba bshad par bya'o //
T02D1202:167b-5: dngos po ro mnyam lta ba yin //
T02D1202:167b-6: zhes ba ni thabs dang shes rab srub dang bsrubs
T02D1202:167b-7: pa las ni ye shes kyi ro'i rtags mnyam par
T02D1202:167b-8: 'byung ba'o // 'dod chags pa ni gzugs dang sgra
T02D1202:167b-9: dang dri dang ro dang reg la sogs pa'i 'dod
T02D1202:167b-10: pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la chags shing zhen pas
T02D1202:167b-11: ni 'khor ba'i 'bras bu thob ste bskyed pa'i rim
T02D1202:167b-12: pa la sogs pa sna tshogs kyis ni yon tan
T02D1202:167b-14: gzugs kyi sku 'byung bas ni tha mal ba'i bag
T02D1202:167b-16: 'dus pa reg bya byed pa'i zhes pa ni thabs
T02D1202:167b-17: dang shes rab 'dus pas reg bya'i bde ba nyams
T02D1202:167b-18: su myong ba 'dis rtogs pa la sogs pa dag
T02D1202:167b-19: par byed do // dngos ni srid pa med par byed //
T02D1202:167b-20: ces pa la sogs pa ni khams gsum gyi bag
T02D1202:167b-21: chags bzang ba dang ngan pa la sogs pa las
T02D1202:167b-22: dang nyon mongs pas bskyed pa rnams ni dngos kyis
T02D1202:167b-24: gzhan yang sbyor thabs sna tshogs pa'i longs spyod 'o bya ba dang ;
T02D1202:167b-27: 'khyud pa la sogs longs spyod do //
T02D1202:167b-28: de ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i chos thams cad ni dngos kyi bar du gcod par byed do //
T02D1202:167b-30: zhes pa ni me tog dkar po'i kha dog gi
T02D1202:167b-31: sems dkar pos byang chub kyi sems dkar po'i kha
T02D1202:167b-33: rtsa'i mdud par 'byung ba yin no //
T02D1202:167b-34: zur gsum zhes pa la sogs pa ni zur gsum
T02D1202:167b-35: dang padma'i 'bras bu dang drag po'i mig 'dra ba
T02D1202:167b-36: la sogs pa'i mdud pa sum cu rtsa gnyis yod
T02D1202:167b-38: brten pa yin zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rten ni rtsa rnams kyis byed pa'o //
T02D1202:167b-39: brten pa ni bsam gtan med pa ste zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
T02D1202:167b-40: de la sgom pa po med rnal 'byor pa dang sgom rgyu gnyis dang bral ba ste /
T02D1202:167b-41: de bas chos kyi dbyings spros pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1202:168a-1: gi mnyam pa'i rten zhes pa la sogs pa ni
T02D1202:168a-2: gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung la sogs pa'i rlung thams
T02D1202:168a-4: 'dus pa'i dus nas ye shes tsam du yang rtogs pa'am gnas pa med do //
T02D1202:168a-5: bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i rten ni shin tu
T02D1202:168a-6: bde ba'i rang bzhin de ni nyon mongs la sogs
T02D1202:168a-7: pa'i rtsi ru gyur pa'i rten no //
T02D1202:168a-8: rigs lnga'i ni mchog gi gzhi ni gzugs kyi phung
T02D1202:168a-9: po la sogs pa lnga'i gzhi ni nam mkha' rdo
T02D1202:168a-10: rje sems dpa'o // yang na 'khor lo lnga ni rigs lnga'o //
T02D1202:168a-11: de rnams kyi mchog gi gzhi ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo yin te rigs drug pa'i 'o //
T02D1202:168a-12: de bde ba dkar po bsrubs pa las zhes par bshad do //
T02D1202:168a-13: ye shes 'dod pa lhun gyis grub //
T02D1202:168a-14: ces pa ni dga' ba thams cad chad pa'i dga' bas bsdu'o //
T02D1202:168a-15: 'o na rang bzhin dga' bas kyang bsdu'am zhe na /
T02D1202:168a-16: rang bzhin dga' bas ni bsdus kyang mi 'gal te /
T02D1202:168a-17: chad pa'i dga' ba la ma brten par rang bzhin dga' ba mi rnyed do //
T02D1202:168a-18: rang bzhin dga' ba ni dga' ba gsum las logs na med pas kyang mi 'gal lo //
T02D1202:168a-19: dper na lus med par yang sems mi rnyed pa
T02D1202:168a-20: ltar chad pa'i dga' ba la ma brten par rang
T02D1202:168a-21: bzhin dga' ba mi thob bo //
T02D1202:168a-22: de bzhin du ma yin na skyon yod pas 'di skad kyang gsungs te /
T02D1202:168a-23: dmigs pa la ni brten nas su //
T02D1202:168a-24: mi dmigs pa ni rab tu tshol //
T02D1202:168a-26: dper na me tog dang dri bzhin no zhes pa'i dpe 'di rnams kyis bstan to //
T02D1202:168a-27: 'dar ba dga' ba mchog gi dga' ;
T02D1202:168a-28: / zhes pa la sogs pa'i mchog gi dga' ba
T02D1202:168a-29: de ni rtog pa dang bcas pa'i sgo nas ye
T02D1202:168a-31: de ltar myong ba'i don la bde bar gnas tsam

T02D1202:168a-38: gzhi dang bcas pa'i chad pa'i dga' //
T02D1202:168a-40: ye shes nga rgyal med par byed //
T02D1202:168b-0: @168b ces pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal spangs pas 'grub po //
T02D1202:168b-1: chos thams cad ni rnam par shes //
T02D1202:168b-2: zhes pa ni phyis bsdus pa'i chos dang nang gis bsdus pa'i chos ma lus pa shes pa'o //
T02D1202:168b-3: ye shes shes bya don grub byed //
T02D1202:168b-4: ces pa ni thun mong gi dngos grub la sogs pa kun gyi don grub pa'o //
T02D1202:168b-6: zhes pa ni byang chub sems 'byed pa spros pa
T02D1202:168b-7: thams cad dang bral ba'i 'od rab de ni brjod
T02D1202:168b-9: tshul dang sprin dang stobs bdag nyid //
T02D1202:168b-10: ces pa ni bde ba'i thig le bcu drug gi
T02D1202:168b-11: bdag nyid yin pas na rnam par 'byed ces bya'o
T02D1202:168b-12: // dngos po kun du ni dngos por snang ba thams cad do //
T02D1202:168b-13: rnam pa bzhi dang bcas pa rlag ni de rnams ma lus pa dang /
T02D1202:168b-14: bag chags dang bcas pa thams cad rlag par zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1202:168b-15: skye dang gnas pa rdzu 'phrul gyi //
T02D1202:168b-16: zhes pa ni skye ba'i cho 'phrul ston pa dang /
T02D1202:168b-18: gnas pa la sogs pa yang yon tan no //
T02D1202:168b-19: rnam par 'byed pa gti mug sod //
T02D1202:168b-20: ces pa ni nyon mongs pa 'joms pa ni de rnams dang bral ba'o //
T02D1202:168b-21: rtsi'i snying po thams cad ni zhes pa ni rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis te /
T02D1202:168b-22: de rnams kyi snying po 'khor lo byang chub kyi sems dang bcas ba rtsa'o //
T02D1202:168b-23: 'od 'di yang zad de med par byed do //
T02D1202:168b-24: 'khor lo sngags dang bya ba la //
T02D1202:168b-31: / ces ba ni dkyil 'khor la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i chos thams cad do //
T02D1202:168b-32: bcom pa'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pas ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02D1202:168b-33: sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun la //
T02D1202:168b-34: zhes pa ni sa bcu gcig gi sangs rgyas la sogs par /
T02D1202:168b-35: sa bcu man chad kyi byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02D1202:168b-36: snying gar rtag tu bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1202:168b-37: zhes pa ni rang bzhin dga' ba kun gyi byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1202:168b-38: yang sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa ni phung po lnga la sogs pa'o //
T02D1202:169a-0: byang chub sems dpa' kun ni dbang po la sogs pa'i skye @169a * //
T02D1202:169a-2: snying gar de'i snying ga'i padma'i lte ba la byang
T02D1202:169a-3: chub sems kyi sa bon zla ba ltar kun rdzob
T02D1202:169a-5: rnam par 'byed ba bsgoms pa med //
T02D1202:169a-6: ces pa ni chos nyid yang dag par de nyid cir yang bsgom du med do //
T02D1202:169a-7: phung po khams la sogs dang bral //
T02D1202:169a-8: zhes pa ni phung po lnga dang khams bco brgyad
T02D1202:169a-9: dang skye mched la sogs pa'i 'dus byas thams cad
T02D1202:169a-10: dang bral ba'o // sgra la sogs pa'i chos kyis stong //
T02D1202:169a-11: zhes ba ni sgra dang tshad ma la sogs pa'i chos kun gyis stong ngo //
T02D1202:169a-12: stong dang snying rje'i bdag nyid yin //
T02D1202:169a-13: zhes pa ni stong pa shes rab skye ba med pa dang /
T02D1202:169a-14: snying rje thabs khyad bar can gnyis las rang bzhin dga' ba 'byung ngo //
T02D1202:169a-15: tshangs pa la sogs pa la tshangs pa ni don yod par grub pa ste /
T02D1202:169a-16: de ni ye shes yin la ye shes thams cad
T02D1202:169a-17: kyi bdag nyid ni bya ba nan tan yin no
T02D1202:169a-18: ; /'o na ye shes la tshangs pa zhes ci'i phyir bya zhe na /
T02D1202:169a-19: rtog pa thams cad dag pa gang yin pa de ni tshangs pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1202:169a-21: dngos po'i bag chags rang bzhin ni //
T02D1202:169a-22: ma spangs dag pas yi shes 'dod //
T02D1202:169a-25: don dam dang ni kun rdzob kyi //
T02D1202:169a-26: bden gnyis gang du 'dres pa yis //
T02D1202:169a-27: byang chub sems kyi thig le khab //
T02D1202:169a-28: de tshe tshangs pa ye shes 'dzin //
T02D1202:169a-30: nam mkha'i dbus na thig le bde //
T02D1202:169a-31: byang chub sems kyi dngos 'di yin //
T02D1202:169a-32: gcig bu'i bdag nyid dngos po bral ;
T02D1202:169a-33: / de dus tshangs pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1202:169a-35: des ni tshangs pa don yod grub par bstan to //
T02D1202:169a-36: khyab 'jug ces pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D1202:169a-37: de bzhin snang ba mtha' yas drag po yin te
T02D1202:169a-38: des mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad bcom nas so
T02D1202:169a-39: sor rtog pa'i ye shes sbyin par mdzad do //
T02D1202:169a-40: dbang phyug ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1202:169a-41: rtag tu zhi ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1202:169a-42: rlung gi 'khor lo la sogs pa lnga la yang sbyar ro //
T02D1202:169a-43: de rnams kun zhes pa ni de 'das ma thag la /
T02D1202:169a-44: rnams kun ni rigs lnga po la bya'o //
T02D1202:169a-45: yab yin no zhes pa ni de kho na nyid
T02D1202:169b-0: @169b spros pa dang bral ba'i ye shes brjod du
T02D1202:169b-1: med pa'i bdag po rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag po
T02D1202:169b-2: de la bya'o // spros pa dang bral ba'i ye
T02D1202:169b-3: shes ni chos kyi sku bde ba chen po yin
T02D1202:169b-4: na rdo rje sems dpa' gzugs kyi sku yin pas
T02D1202:169b-6: mi 'gal te rdo rje ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin dbyer mi phyed pa'o //
T02D1202:169b-7: sems dpa' ni sprul pa la sogs pas sems can gyi don byed pa ste /
T02D1202:169b-8: de yang rang bzhin dga' ba spros pa thams cad
T02D1202:169b-9: dang bral ba las ni rim gyis longs spyod rdzogs
T02D1202:169b-10: pa'i sku mtshan thams cad rdzogs pa de las sprul
T02D1202:169b-12: byed pa de ni mchog rmad byung //
T02D1202:169b-14: zhes pa rang bzhin dga' ba bde ba'i thig le
T02D1202:169b-15: kun gyi ngo bo bcu drug pa chad pa dang
T02D1202:169b-18: mchog rnams grub pa'i mnga' bdag go //
T02D1202:169b-20: 'byung ba kun gyi nang yod pa //
T02D1202:169b-21: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1202:169b-22: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung la sogs pa'i 'byung ba'i nang na yod do //
T02D1202:169b-23: sku lnga'i zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D1202:169b-24: sogs pa ste de rnams kyi bdag po yin no
T02D1202:169b-25: // mkha' lnga'i bdag nyid skye med do //
T02D1202:169b-26: zhes pa ni shes par sla'o //
T02D1202:169b-27: nam mkha' lnga yi nang du thim //
T02D1202:169b-28: zhes pa ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung
T02D1202:169b-29: dang rnam par shes pa dang lnga'i nang du bsdu'o
T02D1202:169b-30: // sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byed pa ni rnam
T02D1202:169b-31: par snang mdzad la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad
T02D1202:169b-32: ma lus pas byed pa yin no //
T02D1202:169b-33: de lta'i gsang chen ye shes ni //
T02D1202:169b-34: ji ltar nor brkus mi rnyed ltar //
T02D1202:169b-35: 'bad pa yis ni sba bar bya //
T02D1202:169b-36: zhes pa ni rnam par 'byed pa de rtog pa dang /
T02D1202:169b-37: mi mthun pa kun phye nas rang bzhin dga' ba
T02D1202:169b-38: shin tu rnyed par dka' ba de dbang la sogs
T02D1202:169b-39: pas thob par byas la de nas sems la bcang
T02D1202:169b-40: ngo // lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u dang po'i dka' ba bkral ba'o /
T02D1202:169b-42: // / dang po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'dir zhus so //
T02D1202:169b-43: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol ba zhes pa ni sdud pa'i tshig go //
T02D1202:169b-44: kye bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni snyan pas bod pa'o //
T02D1202:170a-0: de nyid gsum la sogs pa gsum po la @170a * //
T02D1202:170a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes pa ni
T02D1202:170a-3: lha'i dbang phyug la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad kyi
T02D1202:170a-5: de nyid gsum ni sku gsung thugs //
T02D1202:170a-6: rdo rje gsum ni ye shes mchog / ces pha
T02D1202:170a-7: ni sku rdo rje rnam bar snang mdzad de mchog
T02D1202:170a-9: snang ba mtha' yas chad ba'i dga' ba rdo rje gsung dang /
T02D1202:170a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' rang bzhin dga' ba'i ye shes rdo rje'o //
T02D1202:170a-11: zla ba bde ba mchog gi nang //
T02D1202:170a-12: de ni phung po dbang po khams //
T02D1202:170a-13: zhes pa ni phung po lnga la sogs pa'i rigs lnga la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D1202:170a-14: dbang po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D1202:170a-15: khams la sogs pa'i lha mo la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1202:170a-16: yang na byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo'o //
T02D1202:170a-17: phyag rgya chen po rdo rje snying po zhes pa ni /
T02D1202:170a-18: ye shes sems dpa' ste ye nas gnas ba'o //
T02D1202:170a-19: yang na bde ba'i ye shes so //
T02D1202:170a-20: de yi mtha' ni bha gar dran //
T02D1202:170a-21: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
T02D1202:170a-22: yang na gong ma'i de rnams shes rab kyi bha ga la gnas pa'o //
T02D1202:170a-23: mtha' dang snang ba rnam par shes //
T02D1202:170a-24: chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong //
T02D1202:170a-25: zhes pa ni dga' ba gsum gyi rang bzhin dga' ba'i rgyu gnyis te /
T02D1202:170a-26: kun rdzob kyi dngos por chad pa'i dga' ba'i gnas
T02D1202:170a-27: na chu'i zla ba bzhin snang la don dam par
T02D1202:170a-29: chos kun rang bzhin dri ma med //
T02D1202:170a-30: ces pa'i chos ni gzung 'dzin no //
T02D1202:170a-31: de'i dag pa ni dri ma med pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1202:170a-32: snang ba las ni thams cad 'byung //
T02D1202:170a-33: zhes pa ni snang ba thob ba la sogs pa las rang bzhin 'byung ngo //
T02D1202:170a-34: skye ba dang ni 'gag pa med //
T02D1202:170a-35: ces pa yang dag dri med 'di chos thams cad kyi ngo bos stong ngo //
T02D1202:170a-37: zhes pa ni 'di las chud pa'i dga' ba de las mchog gi dga' ba rim par 'byung ngo //
T02D1202:170a-38: de'i phyir chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid ces pa
T02D1202:170a-39: ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos ma
T02D1202:170a-41: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le'o zhes pa
T02D1202:170a-42: ni sku bzhi'i dngos po'i bdag nyid bde ba chen
T02D1202:170b-1: de la dang po rnam pa dang bcas pa'i dang
T02D1202:170b-2: bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor lo'i bskyed pa bsgoms pa dang
T02D1202:170b-3: zhes pa ni le'u bzhi pa dang bcu pa dang
T02D1202:170b-4: bcu bdun pas rnam pa dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1202:170b-5: ston to // bcu gcig pas dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ston to //
T02D1202:170b-7: bzlas pa ni bcu gcig pas so //
T02D1202:170b-8: sbyin sreg ni bcu bzhi pas ston to //
T02D1202:170b-9: mchod sbyin ni drug pa dang bcu gcig pas ston to //
T02D1202:170b-10: gtor ma ni dgu pa dang bco lnga pas ston to //
T02D1202:170b-11: mchod pa ni bdun pa dang bcu gnyis pas ston to //
T02D1202:170b-13: / dbang bskur ba ni gsum pa dang bcu gsum pas ston to //
T02D1202:170b-14: de rnams la ni rim pa med pa de das bshad do zhes bya'o //
T02D1202:170b-15: de yang le'u dgu pa yan chad du ni dngos su'o //
T02D1202:170b-16: gzhan ma rnams ni sbas pa ste /
T02D1202:170b-18: rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u gnyis ba'i dka' ba bkral ba'o /
T02D1202:170b-20: // / lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa zhes bya ba ni zhu ba po'i tshig go //
T02D1202:170b-21: tshangs pa'i zhes pa nas gzhan 'dir ma gsungs zhes
T02D1202:170b-22: bya ba'i bar du sdud pa po phyag na rdo
T02D1202:170b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes pa ni
T02D1202:170b-25: 'khor dpa' bo dang dpa' mor bcas pa la gsungs
T02D1202:170b-26: so // gcig pu rtog med ma so sho mna' zhes smos so //
T02D1202:170b-28: bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis zhes pa la
T02D1202:170b-29: sogs pa ni de thams cad kyi don 'dis byed
T02D1202:170b-31: / lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol ba byin yang zhus pa'o //
T02D1202:170b-32: de ltar yin yang bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don yin mod kyi zhes pas so //
T02D1202:170b-33: sum cu rtsa gcig la mtshan dang grangs zhes pa la sogs pa zhu pa'o //
T02D1202:170b-34: des ni bde chen 'khor lo rtsa sum cu rtsa
T02D1202:170b-35: gnyis yod pa la aa wa dhu t'i ma gtogs
T02D1202:170b-36: pa'i ming re'i sgo nas grangs tsam du zhus pa
T02D1202:170b-37: yin no // sum cu rtsa gcig gi rtsa'i ming
T02D1202:170b-38: nyon cig ces pa ni bde ba 'bab pa'i rtsa'o
T02D1202:170b-39: yin no // // de yang gsang ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1202:171a-0: gsang ba la sogs pa'i rtsa'i ming nges pa kho na'am des nyams su @171a * //
T02D1202:171a-2: las dang ngo bo la sogs pa'i sgo nas 'dogs pa'o //
T02D1202:171a-3: de yang dbye na mang bas 'dir bsdus pa'i dbye ba bstan to //
T02D1202:171a-4: rtsa'i rnam pa'i dbye ba ni mdor bsdus pa na bcu zhes so //
T02D1202:171a-5: byang chub sems kyi thigs pa gsum //
T02D1202:171a-6: dang po mkha' la snang ba las //
T02D1202:171a-7: ai dang pi ga so sho mna' //
T02D1202:171a-8: 'byung ba de ni rgyu yin no //
T02D1202:171a-9: gzhan rnams de las byung ba dang /
T02D1202:171a-10: snga ma'i rim las phyi ma 'byung //
T02D1202:171a-11: de lta'i dbye ba thams cad ni //
T02D1202:171a-13: rtsa re rnam dag dbye ba yis //
T02D1202:171a-14: lha dang lha mo 'khor lor snang ;
T02D1202:171a-17: snga ma rnams ni rgyur 'thad de //
T02D1202:171a-18: phyi ma de bzhin 'bras bu yin //
T02D1202:171a-19: khyad par can gyi 'bras bu zhes //
T02D1202:171a-20: 'di ni yin par bdag gis bshad //
T02D1202:171a-21: dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ma rnams //
T02D1202:171a-22: so sor gsal ba gang yin pa //
T02D1202:171a-23: de ni rang gi ngo bor snang //
T02D1202:171a-24: de ltar rtogs pas khyad par yin //
T02D1202:171a-25: rtsa yi dra bar 'brel pas na //
T02D1202:171a-27: de yang khyab pa yi ni phyir //
T02D1202:171a-28: khyad par 'di ru bdag gis bstan //
T02D1202:171a-29: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ni //
T02D1202:171a-30: byang chub sems kyis gang ba'o //
T02D1202:171a-31: de yang rtsa rnams kun nas 'bab //
T02D1202:171a-33: sha khrag bshang gci mig rdu snabs //
T02D1202:171a-34: sen mo skra spu rus pa rgyus //
T02D1202:171a-35: mkhal snying rus pa klo ba dang //
T02D1202:171a-36: rgyu ma dri ma tshil dang rnag / aa khri gnyer ma lto kha spu //
T02D1202:171a-37: bad kan rdul dang mchi ma glad //
T02D1202:171a-38: rkang mar khu ba khrag sha ma ;
T02D1202:171a-40: mdud pa la sogs rten byed pa //
T02D1202:171a-41: gang zhig shes shing rig pa 'di //
T02D1202:171a-42: des na ye shes nyams myong ste //
T02D1202:171a-43: myong pa'i mtshan ma mtshan nyid do //
T02D1202:171a-44: de yang ye shes so sor gsal //
T02D1202:171a-45: khyad par zhes ni bya bar bshad //
T02D1202:171a-46: mtshan ni rtsa ru btags pa ste /
T02D1202:171a-47: spyi yi sgo nas bod pa'o //
T02D1202:171a-48: re rer btags pa gang yin pa //
T02D1202:171a-49: khyad par yin pas de brjod do //
T02D1202:171a-50: rtsa gsum nas ni spu khung bar //
T02D1202:171a-52: 'khor lo drug dang bzhi dang gcig / ai da la sogs khyad par dbye //
T02D1202:171b-0: srog gi dbyug ba dbus @171b na 'greng //
T02D1202:171b-1: kun gyi rten du shes par bya'o //
T02D1202:171b-2: gcig la gcig brten kun gyi dang //
T02D1202:171b-3: khyad par brten pa so sor gsal //
T02D1202:171b-4: dper na shing la sogs pa bzhin //
T02D1202:171b-5: yal ga lo ma 'bras bus brgyan //
T02D1202:171b-6: de lta bur ni dbye ba 'di //
T02D1202:171b-7: don gyis shes par 'bad la bya //
T02D1202:171b-8: rtsa rnams med na phung po med ;
T02D1202:171b-9: / phung po med na bde med pas //
T02D1202:171b-10: me tog med na dri med ltar //
T02D1202:171b-12: thos par bya ba'i don du ni //
T02D1202:171b-13: mdo ru bsdus na bcu po 'di //
T02D1202:171b-14: don 'di ma nor bla ma la //
T02D1202:171b-15: yang nas yang du zhu bar bya'o //
T02D1202:171b-16: de'i phyir shes par dka' bas 'on kyang bsdus pa'i
T02D1202:171b-17: don gyis gsang ba dang zab pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1202:171b-18: mtshan ci la brtags pa shes par bya'o //
T02D1202:171b-19: de ni rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1202:171b-20: zla pa nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus tshigs su
T02D1202:171b-21: rgyas pa'o zhes pa ni thabs shes rab gnyis ka'i
T02D1202:171b-23: sangs rgyas rin chen gyi snod gnyis ka bde ba chen pos rgyas pa ste /
T02D1202:171b-24: chad pa'i dga' ba dang mchog gi dga' ba'i bar
T02D1202:171b-25: rang bzhin ye shes brtan pa la gzas zin zhes
T02D1202:171b-26: bshad do // rtsa'i don bstan nas da dbang gi rim pa ston to //
T02D1202:171b-27: de nas zhes pa na 'brel ma chad pa'i tshig yin no //
T02D1202:171b-28: dbang gi rim pa bshad de zhes ni bum pa dang gsang ba dang /
T02D1202:171b-29: shes rab ye shes dang bzhi pa'i dbang la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1202:171b-30: ji lta'i ni go rims zhes pa ni snga ma rgyu //
T02D1202:171b-31: phyi ma rnams 'bras bu rim pa ma nor bar bya'o //
T02D1202:171b-32: dbang bskur mchog ni mnyes pa gang //
T02D1202:171b-33: zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang /
T02D1202:171b-34: 'bras bu'i rim pas bzhi ba rnyed kyi mngon sum du ni mi rnyed do //
T02D1202:171b-35: thams cad du ni phod par 'gyur //
T02D1202:171b-36: zhes pa ni bzhi pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor ba ni thun mong dang mchog la sogs pa dang /
T02D1202:171b-37: ci bsams pa yang 'grub par bshad do //
T02D1202:171b-38: das ni dbang gi yon tan dang 'bras bu bstan to //
T02D1202:171b-39: yon tan tshul khrims ldan pa'i bu ni snod dang
T02D1202:171b-40: skal bar ldan pa sdom pa dang dam tshig bsrung
T02D1202:171b-41: ba'i slob ma'o // bla mas dang por dbang bskur bya //
T02D1202:171b-42: zhes pa ni kun gyi mchog tu gyur ba'i bla
T02D1202:171b-43: mas slob bu mtshan thams cad dang ldan pa de
T02D1202:172a-2: mtshan dang ldan pa gang la bya //
T02D1202:172a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis ni sems can thams cad la dbri bkol ma mdzad na //
T02D1202:172a-4: de lta mod kyi 'on kyang sngon gyi dus su
T02D1202:172a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa la bskur sti rim gro la
T02D1202:172a-6: sogs pa ma byas pa rnams ni tshe 'di dang
T02D1202:172a-7: phyi ma'i dus la sogs par bsod nams zhan pas
T02D1202:172a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi byin rlabs dang phrad par mi
T02D1202:172a-9: 'gyur ro // mi phrad pa'i phyir na snod dang mtshan nyid dang mi ldan no //
T02D1202:172a-11: gang 'di dge slong dngos gnas dang //
T02D1202:172a-12: gang zhig rgan por gnas pa dang //
T02D1202:172a-13: gang yang rtog la dga' ba'i mi //
T02D1202:172a-14: de la de nyid bstan mi bya //
T02D1202:172a-17: mu stegs pa dang nyan thos dngos //
T02D1202:172a-18: ma ning pas ni dbang mi 'thob //
T02D1202:172a-19: rgyud 'di las kyang gang gi dra ba zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1202:172a-20: de'i phyir snod dang mi ldan pa la gsang sngags kyi dbang mi bskur ro //
T02D1202:172a-21: mtshan la sogs pa ni 'gal ba med do //
T02D1202:172a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yang dgongs nas so //
T02D1202:172a-23: khrus byas mig dgab ras kyis bcing //
T02D1202:172a-24: me tog gis dang snyim par ldan //
T02D1202:172a-25: yon dbul zin sa dga' dang bcas //
T02D1202:172a-26: lha yid bang phyug dbang bskur bya //
T02D1202:172a-27: zhes par sngar sa dang dkyil 'khor gyi thig dang
T02D1202:172a-28: sta gon dang rab gnas dang khrus kyi cho ga
T02D1202:172a-29: la sogs pa kun rdzogs nas mig dgab pa'i cho
T02D1202:172a-30: ga bya nas bla ma la me tog gtor ba
T02D1202:172a-31: dang / dkyil 'khor la gtor ba dang /
T02D1202:172a-32: dam tshig gi cho ga nas yon dbus ba'i rim pa kun dbang nod kar bya'o ;
T02D1202:172a-33: / dbang bskur la ni sangs rgyas sa //
T02D1202:172a-34: zhes pa ni bcu gcig nas bcu drug gi bar 'thob bo //
T02D1202:172a-35: the tshom med par rnyed par 'gyur //
T02D1202:172a-36: zhes pa ni bar der thob par des sam som nyi dang yid gnyis mi bya'o //
T02D1202:172a-37: de bas thams cad du 'bad de /
T02D1202:172a-38: dpal ldan dbang rgyal blang bar bya ;
T02D1202:172a-39: / zhes pa ni slob mas bkur sti yon la sogs pas bla ma mnyes par bya //
T02D1202:172a-40: bla mas kyang rim pa dang don ma nor bar
T02D1202:172a-41: dbang gi rgyal po bzhi pa yan chad rdzogs par
T02D1202:172a-42: sbyin no // dbang bskur bzhin du dbye ba ni //
T02D1202:172a-43: zhes ba ni dang po bum pa dang /
T02D1202:172b-0: gsum pa @172b shes rab ye shes dang //
T02D1202:172b-1: bzhi pa de ltar de bzhin no //
T02D1202:172b-2: slob dpon la sogs dbye ba yin //
T02D1202:172b-3: zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1202:172b-4: bzhi gnyis rab tu dbye ba ni //
T02D1202:172b-5: zhes pa ni bzhi gnyis la brgyad de bum pa'i
T02D1202:172b-6: dbang ni mi bskyod pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'o
T02D1202:172b-13: skyabs sbyin la sogs pa brgyad po'i dbang bskur ni slob dpon gyi'o //
T02D1202:172b-14: rdo rje'i dbang la gsum du dbye //
T02D1202:172b-15: nam mkha' mnyam du bdag gis gsal //
T02D1202:172b-16: zhes pa ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang ni nam mkha' dang mnyam du khungs bstan pa ste /
T02D1202:172b-17: dam tshig gsum gyi dbang ngo //
T02D1202:172b-18: dbang bskur de ni rin po che //
T02D1202:172b-19: khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa //
T02D1202:172b-20: zhes pa ni bum pa ru sman dang 'bru dang rin po che la sogs pa dang ldan pa'am //
T02D1202:172b-21: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i dbang bcu gcig pa dang ;
T02D1202:172b-22: kun rdzogs pa la 'jig rten gsum gyi phyag dang mchod pa'i gnas so //
T02D1202:172b-23: yang na nang gi slob dpon gyi bum pa la
T02D1202:172b-24: sogs pas dbang bskur ba'am/ gsang pa'i slob ma rang
T02D1202:172b-25: gi bum pa la sogs pa'i dbang rdzogs par bskur
T02D1202:172b-26: na dngos su khams gsum gyis phyag byed par 'gyur
T02D1202:172b-27: ro // yang na sangs rgyas rin po che'i snod
T02D1202:172b-28: dang rin po che sna lnga la sogs pa yod
T02D1202:172b-29: pa thabs kyi rdo rje la dbang bskur ba dang
T02D1202:172b-30: ro // / phyag bya ba'i ngo bos rdzogs pa ste /
T02D1202:172b-31: shes rab la yang de bzhin no //
T02D1202:172b-32: yang na dbang gi yon tan gyi rim pa gsal bas shes par 'dod pas de ru blta'o //
T02D1202:172b-33: rnal 'byor rgyud la mos rnams la //
T02D1202:172b-34: zhes pa ni yo ga phyi la dga' ba'i slob ma la bya'o //
T02D1202:172b-35: dbang brgyad phye ba sbyin par bya //
T02D1202:172b-39: ming dang lnga ni rigs lnga'o //
T02D1202:172b-42: skyabs sbyin te sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
T02D1202:172b-43: rnal 'byor bla ma la mos rnams //
T02D1202:172b-44: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor chen po thob pa'i thabs kyi'o //
T02D1202:172b-45: bcu gcig bdag nyid sbyin par bya //
T02D1202:172b-46: zhes pa ni snga ma'i thog tu sku rdo rje
T02D1202:172b-47: la sogs pa'i dam tshig gsum ste bcu gcig go
T02D1202:173a-2: zhes pa ni ma rgyud do //
T02D1202:173a-3: gsang ba'i dbang ni sbyin pa'o //
T02D1202:173a-4: zhes pa ni bcu gnyis pa'i mchog go //
T02D1202:173a-5: gsang ba gnyis zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1202:173a-6: de ni gsang ba gsum du dbye //
T02D1202:173a-7: zhes pa ni 'og nas gsum du ston to //
T02D1202:173a-8: skye dang zhes pa nor bu'i skye'i mchog gi dga' ba'i gnas so //
T02D1202:173a-9: mdud dang zhes pa ni aa wa dh'u t'i'i rtse mo rang bzhin gyi gnas so //
T02D1202:173a-10: de bzhin du ni padma'i shes rab ma'i kha chad pa'i gnas so //
T02D1202:173a-11: shes rab gnyis su dbye bar bya //
T02D1202:173a-12: bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i bye brag go //
T02D1202:173a-13: zhes pa ni phyi ni shes rab ma'i padma nas 'thung pa ste bskyed pa'o //
T02D1202:173a-14: gtum mo la sogs pas bdud rtsi 'thung ba ni rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1202:173a-15: 'di na mar gsang ba'i yum gyi mtshan nyid ston te /
T02D1202:173a-16: shes rab brgyad gnyis lo dang ldan //
T02D1202:173a-17: bu mo lo grangs bcu drug pa dang /
T02D1202:173a-19: spyan rings zhes pa mig 'khyug pa smin ma'i bar ma chad par gnas pa gnag la 'tsher ba'o //
T02D1202:173a-20: longs spyod mkhas pa zhes pa ni sbyor thabs drug cu la sogs pa'i las dang /
T02D1202:173a-21: dbang gi rim pa la mkhas pa'o //
T02D1202:173a-22: yan lag tsandan sar pa'i dri //
T02D1202:173a-23: zhes pa ni lus dang yan lag kun las shin tu zhim pa'i dri mnam pa'o //
T02D1202:173a-24: shin tu 'jam pa'i khu bas tshim //
T02D1202:173a-26: ye shes kyi rgyu bde zhing tshim ste /
T02D1202:173a-27: si la ga phur la sogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyis 'jam pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1202:173a-28: gzugs bzang sngo la skal ldan pa //
T02D1202:173a-29: zhes pa ni lus sbom pa min pa ;
T02D1202:173a-34: nu ma zhes pa la sogs pa ni nu ma 'bur ba /
T02D1202:173a-36: dad pa la sogs pa'i yon tan tshad med pa
T02D1202:173a-37: de 'bad la slob bus btsal te gsang ba'i dbang
T02D1202:173a-38: pa'i don du rigs dang ldan pa phul ba ;
T02D1202:173a-39: bla ma la zhu ba'i tshigs bcad la sogs pas gsang dbang thob par bya'o //
T02D1202:173a-40: dbang gi man ngag gsum du dbye //
T02D1202:173a-41: nang gi yi ni brda byed pa //
T02D1202:173a-42: bzhi pa 'bras bu'i ngo bor grags //
T02D1202:173a-43: gsum dang bral ba gsum bdag nyid //
T02D1202:173a-44: ces ba ni bum pa dang /
T02D1202:173b-0: @173b shes rab ye shes dbye ba byas nas kha
T02D1202:173b-1: khva mu kha dang bo lar sbyor ba la sogs
T02D1202:173b-2: pa'i ye shes 'khor lo rnams la rim gyis babs
T02D1202:173b-3: pa dang de yang spyi bo dang /
T02D1202:173b-5: snying gar babs pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa don dngos so //
T02D1202:173b-6: rdzogs pa dga' ba dang mchog gi dga' ba dang
T02D1202:173b-7: chad pa'i dga' ba la sogs pa dang dbang gsum
T02D1202:173b-8: rim par sbyar ba las bzhi pa 'byung ba ni
T02D1202:173b-10: gsum po la sogs na yang med //
T02D1202:173b-11: gsum po rang yang ma yin te //
T02D1202:173b-13: dga' ba la sogs bye brag tu //
T02D1202:173b-14: rdo rje gzhon nu mas gsal byed //
T02D1202:173b-15: ces pa ni dga' ba dang mchog dga' ba la
T02D1202:173b-16: sogs pa'i yang dag pa'i ye shes ni thabs dang
T02D1202:173b-17: shes rab gnyis su med pa las gsal bar 'byung
T02D1202:173b-18: ste / de yang shes rab mtshan dang ldan pa las skye'o //
T02D1202:173b-19: de yang rgyud gsum zhes pa la sogs pa bstan to //
T02D1202:173b-20: dbang bskur gyis zhes pa la sogs pa ni dbang gi yon tan bstan to //
T02D1202:173b-21: gcig nas gcig gi rim pas 'byung //
T02D1202:173b-22: zhes pa ni snga ma ni rgyu //
T02D1202:173b-23: phyi ma ni rim pas 'bras bu'o //
T02D1202:173b-24: bla ma rab kyi zhal nas blang //
T02D1202:173b-26: de yang dbang thams cad thob pa //
T02D1202:173b-27: rgyud dang man ngag dang dbang la sogs pa la mkhas pa grub pa thob pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1202:173b-28: de ni mnar med par ni 'gro / zhes pa
T02D1202:173b-29: ni bla ma mnyes par ma byas na de'i skyon
T02D1202:173b-30: gyis dmyal bar 'gro'o zhes skyon bstan pa'o //
T02D1202:173b-31: de bas na skyon spongs la bla ma la 'bad
T02D1202:173b-32: pas mchod pa dang yon la sogs pas dgyes par
T02D1202:173b-33: bya'o // rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u gsum pa'i dka' ba bkral ba'o /
T02D1202:173b-35: // / dbang bskur bas snod du rung bar byas nas bsgom pa'i rim pa ston to //
T02D1202:173b-36: de nas gzhan yang bshad nyon cig /
T02D1202:173b-37: ces pa ni dbang bshad ma thag tu gnas kyi don bstan pa'o //
T02D1202:173b-38: ka ba gcig dang sgo dgur ldan //
T02D1202:173b-39: zhes pa ni srog gi dbyug pas ka ba byas pa'i sgo dgu dbang ba'o //
T02D1202:173b-40: rdo rje'i rtsig pa ni ba spru'i ngo bo rtsa
T02D1202:173b-41: re re la byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba
T02D1202:174a-2: rtsa thams cad bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas pa ye shes rnam pa lnga'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1202:174a-3: ye shes de rnams dbyer mi phyed pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje'i //
T02D1202:174a-4: de bas na rdo rje'i rtsig pas brgyan pa'o //
T02D1202:174a-5: rdo rje'i thig ni rtsa'i dbye bas phye ba'o //
T02D1202:174a-6: bla re ni zhes pa ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la sogs pa ste /
T02D1202:174a-7: des ni khyab pa kun du yongs su bskor ba yin zhes smos so //
T02D1202:174a-8: rlung la sogs pa'i rim pas dbye //
T02D1202:174a-9: 'byung ba bzhi dang ldan pa yin //
T02D1202:174a-10: zhes pa ni yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon
T02D1202:174a-11: po zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsang ba'i gnas
T02D1202:174a-14: snying ga dang rim pas bsam //
T02D1202:174a-15: yang na rlung gis me sbar ba las rtsa thams
T02D1202:174a-16: cad kha bye ba las bde ba chen po'i rang
T02D1202:174a-17: bzhin 'khor lo bzhi la khyad par ldan zhing 'byung
T02D1202:174a-18: ngo // nam mkha' thams cad mtha' kun du //
T02D1202:174a-19: thams cad bdag gnyid rtag tu bzhugs //
T02D1202:174a-20: zhes pa ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo nam mkha' zhes te 'khor lo gzhan dang /
T02D1202:174a-21: mtha' ma'i rtsa yam chad khyab nas rang bzhin dga' ba'i bdag nyid du lus thams cad bzhugs so //
T02D1202:174a-22: yang na nam mkha' ni chos kyi 'byung gnas te /
T02D1202:174a-23: shin tu rgya che ba de'i nang na dbang chen
T02D1202:174a-24: las bskyed pa'i gzhal yas khang la sogs pa'i phyir
T02D1202:174a-25: rol du bstan pa bzhin no //
T02D1202:174a-27: dkyil 'khor sku ru bstan pa dang /
T02D1202:174a-28: de bzhin gsung du bstan pa dang /
T02D1202:174a-29: thugs su byang chub sems bshad do //
T02D1202:174a-30: zhes pas phye nang gsang ba gsum shes par bya'o //
T02D1202:174a-31: yang na gsang ba 'di le'u bcu par blta'o //
T02D1202:174a-33: zhes pa ni 'di ni gzhan go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02D1202:174a-34: de kho na nyid bsdus pas bstan te /
T02D1202:174a-35: rnal 'byor chen po'i dus su ni //
T02D1202:174a-36: sangs rgyas rin chen snod rnyed nas //
T02D1202:174a-37: byang chub kyi sems nyi ma bsrungs nas slar 'khor
T02D1202:174a-38: lo'i lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du gnas pa de ni
T02D1202:174a-39: phyi'i rtogs pa rgyu ru mi ster bar nang gi
T02D1202:174a-40: reg bya shin tu 'jam pa chu'i zla bas kun
T02D1202:174a-41: rdzob tu snang ba lta bu de dang dbyer mi
T02D1202:174a-42: phyed pa bzhin snang ba ni ye shes chen po
T02D1202:174b-0: rtsibs bcu pa @174b la gser gyi mdog / ces
T02D1202:174b-1: pa la sogs pa ni go sla bas ma bshad
T02D1202:174b-2: do // 'dir ni 'khor lo'i lte ba gru gsum
T02D1202:174b-3: gyi byad gzugs ri bong can chos kyi 'byung gnas
T02D1202:174b-4: do // zhes pa'o // rtsibs bcu pa la gser
T02D1202:174b-5: gyi mdog ste gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa
T02D1202:174b-6: bcu dang ldan pa'i dbus kyi lte ba la /
T02D1202:174b-7: dar mo ta ya kha dog dkar mo byang chub
T02D1202:174b-8: sems kyi ngo bo 'di gzung 'dzin la sogs pa'i
T02D1202:174b-9: chos thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas te /
T02D1202:174b-10: sngar bshad pa bzhin rim pas dbye'o //
T02D1202:174b-11: de'i dbus su zhes pa ni 'khor lo'i lte bar bya'o //
T02D1202:174b-12: sngar bstan pa'i zhes pa ni rlung la sogs pa'i zhes par bstan pa bzhin no //
T02D1202:174b-13: 'byung ba ba'i ni rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i bzhi ste /
T02D1202:174b-15: ji lta bu'i rim pas ni yam ram bam lam
T02D1202:174b-16: las rlung la sogs pa bzhi de rnams kyi steng
T02D1202:174b-18: thams cad 'od du zhu pa las rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1202:174b-19: rnam par snang mdzad yongs su gyur pa las zhes
T02D1202:174b-20: pha ni 'od du zhu nas pho brang grub bo
T02D1202:174b-21: // dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa yi //
T02D1202:174b-22: zhes pa ni de yang yi dgas dang ldan pa'i
T02D1202:174b-23: gnas mi bzad pa zhes bya ba'i dur khrod dang
T02D1202:174b-24: / mi sdug pa dang zhes pas ston to //
T02D1202:174b-25: de rnams ldan pa'i bzhugs gnas so //
T02D1202:174b-26: gzhal yas zhes pa ni dpag pa dang gzhal pa dang tshad dang bral ba ste /
T02D1202:174b-27: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bzhugs gnas la dog pa la
T02D1202:174b-28: sogs pa'i dngos po spangs pas na khang pa yangs
T02D1202:174b-29: pa chen po'o // 'phar ma gnyis ni phyi nang phye ba'o //
T02D1202:174b-30: nyi ma'i gdan du zhes pa ni nyi ma'i steng du bdud pho mo'o //
T02D1202:174b-31: sna tshogs pa zhes pa ni go bar sla'o //
T02D1202:174b-32: 'dab ma brgyad kyi lte bar zhes pa ni bzhi
T02D1202:174b-33: pa spangs pa'i dbus su nyi ma la sogs pa
T02D1202:174b-34: sngar bzhin no // tshul dang thigs pa'i rang ngo bo'o //
T02D1202:174b-35: zhes pa ni bka'i dngos po thigs pa aa khong na gnas pa'i tshul lo //
T02D1202:174b-36: de gnyis las a'a li k'a li'o //
T02D1202:174b-37: a'a li ni aa a'a zhes pa nas aam aa: zhes pa'i bar ro //
T02D1202:174b-38: k'a li ni ka kha zhes pa nas ha ksha: zhes pa'i bar ro //
T02D1202:174b-39: de yang dam tshig gi a'a li dang /
T02D1202:174b-41: k'a li la yang de ltar de bzhin no //
T02D1202:175a-0: gnyes las byung ba ni zhes pa @175a * //
T02D1202:175a-1: ni zla ba dang nyi ma ste /
T02D1202:175a-3: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid mam h'um gnyis
T02D1202:175a-4: la rdo rje dang gri gug sa bon dang ldan
T02D1202:175a-5: pa 'di rnams thams cad las thabs dang shes rab
T02D1202:175a-6: kyi skur bzhengs pa la dpal ye shes thig le
T02D1202:175a-7: zhes bya'o // phyag rgya chen pos 'khyud cing zhes
T02D1202:175a-8: pa ni thabs dang shes rab la brten zhes pa
T02D1202:175a-9: zhes bya'o // ste / dbye bas phye na go sla'o //
T02D1202:175a-10: da ni kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa ston te //
T02D1202:175a-11: zhal brgyad phyag brgyad g-yas brkyang ba //
T02D1202:175a-12: zhes pa ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1202:175a-14: zhal bzhi ni zhes pa ni brgyad kyi phyed rtsa ba nas drangs pa'o //
T02D1202:175a-15: gnag ces pa ni sku dang mthun pa dbus su bsam mo //
T02D1202:175a-16: ser po ni g-yas dmar po g-yon dang rgyab ma ljang gu'o //
T02D1202:175a-17: gzhan pa bzhi sngon po'i padma lta bu'o zhes pa
T02D1202:175a-18: ni sngar gyi ma gtogs pa bzhi ni autpala sngon
T02D1202:175a-19: po dang 'dra'o // rdo rje la sogs pa ni phyag brgyad na g-yas dang g-yon na'o //
T02D1202:175a-20: sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram gyis spyi bor brgyan pa'o //
T02D1202:175a-21: zla ba zhes pa la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1202:175a-22: phyag rgya drug gis sku bcings pa ni 'khor lo la sogs pa ste /
T02D1202:175a-23: rigs drug gi ngo bo yin no //
T02D1202:175a-24: gzhan yang de ltar shes par bya'o //
T02D1202:175a-25: rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u bzhi pa'i dka' ba bkral ba'o /
T02D1202:175a-27: // / da ni sngags mchog bshad bya ba //
T02D1202:175a-28: zhes pa ni skabs 'dir snying po phye la bshad pa'o //
T02D1202:175a-29: sgrub pa po ni gang gis 'grub //
T02D1202:175a-30: ces pa la sogs pas phyi nang gsang ba de kho na nyid la sogs pa bshad par bya'o //
T02D1202:175a-31: sgrub pa po zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02D1202:175a-32: gang gis ni thabs par can no //
T02D1202:175a-33: 'grub ces pa ni sngags des 'grub pa ste /
T02D1202:175a-34: mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'o //
T02D1202:175a-35: de yang sngags ni mantra zhes so //
T02D1202:175a-36: man ni stong pa mtshan ma bral //
T02D1202:175a-37: kha dog sogs bral chos nyid bdag / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dbugs 'byung ba //
T02D1202:175a-38: shes rab ces su bshad pa yin //
T02D1202:175a-39: tra ni ye shes bde ba ste //
T02D1202:175a-40: tshan dang dpe byad gzugs skur gnas //
T02D1202:175b-0: de bzhin gshegs par @175b dbugs 'byung ste /
T02D1202:175b-1: snying rje chen por bdag gis bshad //
T02D1202:175b-2: snying rje shes rab gnyis po 'di //
T02D1202:175b-3: gang du gcig tu gnas pa yis //
T02D1202:175b-4: dngos po med pa'i dngos po'i tshul //
T02D1202:175b-5: de ni sngags su bstan pa'o //
T02D1202:175b-6: de lta bu yi phyag rgya che //
T02D1202:175b-7: shes nas bdag nyid ming mchog pa ;
T02D1202:175b-8: / ming yang ma yin mtshon pa ming //
T02D1202:175b-9: sus rtogs sngags kyi dngos grub po //
T02D1202:175b-10: zhes pa ni shes rab dang snying rjer bshad do //
T02D1202:175b-11: sngags kyi nges tshig la sogs pa gzhan mi bstan pa ci //
T02D1202:175b-12: gzhan 'dir ma bstan te de yang dbang gi yon tan gyi rim par blta'o //
T02D1202:175b-14: zhes pa ni 'dab ma dang lte bar bcas pa bri'o //
T02D1202:175b-15: rdo rje ni rdo rje gzhon nu zhal gsum phyag drug pa sgom mo //
T02D1202:175b-16: phur bu bcu ni drangs so //
T02D1202:175b-17: khro bo'i sngags ni mkhas pas gdab //
T02D1202:175b-18: ces pa ni rdo rje gzhon nu khro bor bsams
T02D1202:175b-19: la aom badzra k'i li la sogs pa rnal 'byor
T02D1202:175b-20: bas phyogs dang mtshams bye brag tu gdab bo //
T02D1202:175b-21: a'a li k'a li mnyam byas nas //
T02D1202:175b-23: a'a li ni shes rab kyi yi ge bcu drug go //
T02D1202:175b-24: k'a li ni k'a la sogs pa thabs kyi yi ge sum cu gsum mo //
T02D1202:175b-25: mnyam byas ni a'a li bcu drug po dang /
T02D1202:175b-27: sum cu rtsa gsum pa gnyis ldan pa'o //
T02D1202:175b-29: 'dab ma kun gyi rim pas dgod //
T02D1202:175b-30: ces pa ni rten dang rten can bstan to //
T02D1202:175b-31: yang na snying po'o sngags te /
T02D1202:175b-34: mig gi dbang po'i skye mched gti mug mkha' 'gro
T02D1202:175b-35: la sogs pa don 'di bla ma rje btsun rim
T02D1202:175b-37: a'a li ni longs spyod kyi bcu drug go //
T02D1202:175b-38: k'a li ni bde ba chen po'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang srog gi dbyug pa'o //
T02D1202:175b-39: mnyam byas nas zhes pa ni de rnams thams cad la byang chub sems dang ldan pa'o ;
T02D1202:175b-40: /'dab ma kun gyi rim pas dgod //
T02D1202:175b-41: ces pa ni thams cad la tshang bar dgod do //
T02D1202:175b-42: de la snying po la sogs pa'i sngags rim pa
T02D1202:175b-43: bzhin btus pas yab kyi snying po thabs kyi rtsa
T02D1202:176a-0: yum gyi snying po shes rab kyi rtsa nas snying po bgrang ba la @176a * //
T02D1202:176a-2: yang na k'a li ni zur gsum la sogs nas
T02D1202:176a-3: til gyi me tog rgyas par bar du tshes bcu
T02D1202:176a-4: drug 'pho ba de slar steng du bcu drug ste

T02D1202:176a-10: shes rab kyi rang gis shes par bya'o //
T02D1202:176a-11: yang na dga' ba bcu drug la rang bzhin bcu drug rdzogs pa ni shes rab kyi'o //
T02D1202:176a-12: 'dab ma kun gyi zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //

T02D1202:176a-14: ma brgyad pa kun rdzob zla ba'i dngos po thigs
T02D1202:176a-15: pa brgyad la don dam pa'i rang bzhin brgyad rdzogs
T02D1202:176a-16: pa'o // k'a li thabs kyi la de bzhin dgod pa'o //
T02D1202:176a-17: mnyam byas nas zhes pa ni lte ba'i dkyil du mnyam pa ste /
T02D1202:176a-18: de ni nam mkha' stong pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1202:176a-19: 'dab ma kun gyi rim pas dgod //
T02D1202:176a-20: ces pa ni rang bzhin dga' bas thams cad kun la khyab pa med pa'o //
T02D1202:176a-24: dpyad pas rnyed pa ma yin pa /
T02D1202:176a-28: rmad du byung ba de ni rang bzhin gyi ye shes de kho na nyid ces bya'o //
T02D1202:176a-30: a'a li ye shes 'dab mar gcig / ces pa
T02D1202:176a-31: ni bcu drug pa kun 'dab ma gcig la dgod
T02D1202:176a-32: do // k'a li 'dab ma bdun du ni //
T02D1202:176a-34: 'dab ma re re yi ge lnga //

T02D1202:176a-36: lnga pa'i bar du lnga lnga pa'o //
T02D1202:176a-37: zhes bya ba ni 'dab ma re re lnga lnga ste /
T02D1202:176a-38: ka kha ga gha nga de ni gcig la'o //
T02D1202:176a-39: rtsa la sogs pa la de bzhin no //
T02D1202:176a-40: 'dab ma gnyis su bzhi gnyis te /

T02D1202:176a-42: gnyis pa la sha sha sa ha ste bzhi'o //

T02D1202:176b-6: de gnyis la a'a li l'i'i 'du shes yin zhes pas bye brag kyang bstan to //
T02D1202:176b-7: gnyis kyi yi ge 'dab ma yis //
T02D1202:176b-8: zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyi yi ge'o //
T02D1202:176b-9: sngags kyi rgyal po de nyid drang //
T02D1202:176b-10: zhes pa ni yab kyi snying po dang /
T02D1202:176b-14: dang po gzugs kyi rgyal po dbang //
T02D1202:176b-15: zhes pa ni dang po kho na rnam par snang mdzad kyi sa bon yi ge aom mo //
T02D1202:176b-16: de nas 'dab ma gnyis kyi dang por zhes pa ni de ma thag gnyis kyi dang po sha'o //
T02D1202:176b-17: bzhi pa'i dbyangs yig ni a'i dang bcas pa ni sha dang ai ru ldan pa /
T02D1202:176b-19: re pha ni ra'i ming gi rnam grangs so //
T02D1202:176b-21: de rnams kyis shri ri grub bo //
T02D1202:176b-22: nyi shu rtsa lnga yod pa yi //
T02D1202:176b-25: zhes pa ni bzhi pa ha'o //
T02D1202:176b-26: dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa //
T02D1202:176b-28: ha dang a'a dang ldan pas h'a zhes so //
T02D1202:176b-30: zhes pa ni dpal chen pos bdud la sogs pa
T02D1202:176b-31: thams cad bsgral nas ye shes kyi bdag nyid du
T02D1202:176b-32: byed do // 'dab gnyis dang po bzhi pa yis //
T02D1202:176b-33: zhes pa ni skabs 'di na mar man ngag gis bstan te /
T02D1202:176b-34: dang po'i bzhi pa ni ba'o //
T02D1202:176b-35: de nas gsal byed pa'i brgyad ni dza'o //
T02D1202:176b-36: 'dab gnyis dang po'i gnyis pa yis //
T02D1202:176b-38: ldan pa thams cad rim 'phrog byed //
T02D1202:176b-39: ces pa ni dzar ldan nas gnas pa la badzra zhes so //
T02D1202:176b-40: rdo rjes thams cad gcod pa dang /
T02D1202:176b-41: 'bigs pa la sogs pa byed do //
T02D1202:176b-42: gsal byed pa gsum pa ste ni ga'o //
T02D1202:176b-43: bcu pas yang dag ldan pa'o //
T02D1202:176b-44: zhes pa ni le ste ga ru ldan pa'o //
T02D1202:176b-45: dbyangs kyi yi ge zhes pa la sogs pa ni bstan pa'o /
T02D1202:176b-46: bzhi pa'i lnga pa ni na yin no //
T02D1202:176b-47: de nas de'i dang po'i ta'o //
T02D1202:176b-48: bcu drug pa ni gsum pas ldan ni ai ste ti ru ldan no //
T02D1202:176b-49: thams cad sngags kyi tshig gi gzhi ni 'di rtsa ba'am gzhi yin no //
T02D1202:177a-2: de bzhin gsal byed dang po'o //
T02D1202:177a-4: yan lag gsal byed sum cu gsum //
T02D1202:177a-6: dbyangs yig drug pa yang dag ldan //
T02D1202:177a-7: zhes pa ni a'u ste ha la a'u ldan h'u'o //
T02D1202:177a-8: de nas chos thams cad 'byung ba ste /
T02D1202:177a-9: dbye ba ni zhal las shes par bya'o //
T02D1202:177a-12: de ni zhes pa ni de rnams las h'um grub bo //
T02D1202:177a-13: h'um de dang nye bar gnas pa ni yang h'um ste /
T02D1202:177a-14: don du ni gnyis grub bo //
T02D1202:177a-15: sems kyi dbang phyug yi ge mchog / ces pa
T02D1202:177a-16: ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bskyed pa'i rgyu 'di yi
T02D1202:177a-17: ge thams cad kyi mchog go //
T02D1202:177a-18: gang zhig lnga pa'i gnyis pa zhes pa ni pha'o //
T02D1202:177a-19: gsum pa'i dang po ta dang ldan pa'i phat do //
T02D1202:177a-20: mthar ni sv'a h'a ldan pa'o //
T02D1202:177a-21: ste zhes pa ni de thams cad kyi zhabs su'o //
T02D1202:177a-22: snying po'i sngags ni yang dag mchog / ces pa ni yab kyi snying po'o //
T02D1202:177a-23: dang po ru ni gzugs kyi mchog / ces pa ni gzugs kyi sa bon aom mo //
T02D1202:177a-24: 'dab gnyis kyi bzhi pa ni ha'o //
T02D1202:177a-25: 'og tu re phas yang dag ldan //
T02D1202:177a-27: dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas sbyar //
T02D1202:177a-29: ha dang ra dang a'i dang gsum sbyar bas hr'i'o ;
T02D1202:177a-30: / rig pa'i rgyal po'i yi ge mchog / ces pa ni rig pa'i snying po'o //
T02D1202:177a-31: thig le yis ni mgo bo mnan //
T02D1202:177a-32: zhes pa ni hr'im zhes pa'o //
T02D1202:177a-33: de rang du ni nye bar gnas //
T02D1202:177a-34: zhes smos pas yang hr'i btu'o //
T02D1202:177a-35: thams cad zhi ba zhi ma mchog / ces pa ni bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1202:177a-36: thig les mnan pa'i sum cu gsum //
T02D1202:177a-38: bcu drug pa'i gnyis pa ni a'a'o //
T02D1202:177a-39: ldan pa ni ham dang a'ar ldan pa'i h'am ngo //
T02D1202:177a-40: yang na de nyid yi ge mchog / ces pa ni ham ngo //
T02D1202:177a-41: khams gsum mun nag 'byed par byed //
T02D1202:177a-42: ces pa ni yon tan gyis so //
T02D1202:177a-43: h'um phat de ni gnyis kar sbyar //
T02D1202:177a-44: zhes pa ni re re yang gnyis gnyis su sbyar ro //
T02D1202:177a-45: tha mar sv'a dang h'as ldan no //
T02D1202:177a-46: nye ba'i snying po'i sngags zhes bya //
T02D1202:177a-47: zhes pa ni de yan chad do //
T02D1202:177a-48: bcom ldan ye shes thig le'o //
T02D1202:177b-0: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kho na'o zhes @177b so ;
T02D1202:177b-1: / dang por rnam par snang mdzad ces pa ni /
T02D1202:177b-2: dag pa'i dngos po aom mo //
T02D1202:177b-3: nyi shu rtsa dgu de rnams so //
T02D1202:177b-5: gsal byed pa yi brgyad pa'i yig / ces bya ba ni yi ge dza'o //
T02D1202:177b-6: nyi shu rtsa bdun pas ni zhes pa ni ra'o //
T02D1202:177b-7: dza dang ra dang ldan pas badzra'o //
T02D1202:177b-8: nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'i gzhan zhes pas ma'o //
T02D1202:177b-9: dbyangs kyi yi ge bdun ni ri'o //
T02D1202:177b-11: bzhi pa las ni gsum pa'o //
T02D1202:177b-12: zhes pas ni da ston to //
T02D1202:177b-13: de nang nye ba rlung yin no //
T02D1202:177b-14: zhes pas ni rlung gi sa bon ya'o //
T02D1202:177b-15: dbyangs yig bcu gcig ni ae ste ya'o /
T02D1202:177b-16: lnga pa yi ni lnga pa zhes pa ni ma'o //
T02D1202:177b-18: lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang //
T02D1202:177b-20: nyi shu rtsa brgyad de nas so //
T02D1202:177b-22: lnga pa yi ni dang po dang //
T02D1202:177b-24: nyi shu rtsa bdun de nas so //
T02D1202:177b-26: dbyangs yig gnyis pas zhes pa ni a'a'o //
T02D1202:177b-27: ldan pas bya bas r'a zhes bshad do //
T02D1202:177b-28: gsal byed kyi ni dang po zhes pa ni ka btu'o //
T02D1202:177b-29: sum cu rtsa gcig pa ni sha'o //
T02D1202:177b-30: ldan pa ni de gnyis ksha ru ldan no //
T02D1202:177b-31: nyi shu rtsa lnga dag pa zhes pa ni ma'o //
T02D1202:177b-32: dbyangs yig gnyis pa zhes pa ni a'a'o //
T02D1202:177b-33: 'dam gnyis m'a'i dngos po la ldan zhes bya'o //
T02D1202:177b-34: nyi shu drug gi yi ge mchog / ces pa ni ya'o //
T02D1202:177b-35: dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gcig ces pa ni yi ge ae ste /
T02D1202:177b-36: ye ru ldan pa'i sv'a h'a zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02D1202:177b-37: dang po yi ge phra nan pa //
T02D1202:177b-39: 'dab gnyis pa'i gsum phri zhes bstan pas so //
T02D1202:177b-40: ya'i sde tshan gnyis pa ni ra zhes smos so //
T02D1202:177b-41: nyi shu rtsa dgu de nas so //
T02D1202:177b-42: zhes pa ni wa ru bshad do //
T02D1202:177b-43: dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pa yis //
T02D1202:177b-44: zhes pa ni gu gu ste wam zhes smos so //
T02D1202:177b-45: drug cu rtsa bzhi phyed dag pa //
T02D1202:177b-46: zhes pa ni sum cu gnyis so //
T02D1202:177b-49: tha mar sv'a h'a dang ldan pa ni kun gyi mthar sbyar ro //
T02D1202:177b-50: h'um h'um phat ni spel ba yin //
T02D1202:177b-51: zhes pa ni bar du bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1202:178a-2: zhes pa ni bcom ldan mo phyag rgya chen po'i nye ba'i snying po'o //
T02D1202:178a-3: bcom ldan 'das ye shes thig le'i phreng ba'i sngags
T02D1202:178a-4: kyi bsnyen pa 'bum byas nas las la sbyar bar
T02D1202:178a-5: bya'o // bcom ldan mo'i yang las la sbyar ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1202:178a-6: 'khor rnams kyi ni nam mkha' dri med dang /
T02D1202:178a-7: zla ba'i snying po ni aom dh'um dh'um h'um phat /
T02D1202:178a-9: g-yon pa ma la sogs pa gzhan rnams kyang de ltar ro //
T02D1202:178a-10: de bzhin du dpa' mo rnams kyi yang yin no //
T02D1202:178a-11: skyes ma'e aom a'a: h'um phat /
T02D1202:178a-14: gzhan rnams kyang de kho na bzhin no //
T02D1202:178a-15: gzhan 'khor lo drug gi sngags dang dbyangs yig / gsal byed kyi yi ge dang /
T02D1202:178a-18: sku rdo rje la sogs pa gsum dang /
T02D1202:178a-19: 'di rnams ni go sla bas ma bshad do ;
T02D1202:178a-20: / rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u lnga pa'i dka' ba bkral ba'o /
T02D1202:178a-22: // / sngags kyi rim pa bshad nas mchod sbyin gyi rim pa ston pa la ni /
T02D1202:178a-23: de nas mchod sbyin rab bdag bshad /
T02D1202:178a-25: gnas la sogs pa'i rim pa sbyor //
T02D1202:178a-27: nye bar gnas la sogs pa'i mchod sbyin dang por sbyor ro //
T02D1202:178a-28: bskyed pa'i bye brag thigs pa gsum //
T02D1202:178a-29: zhes pa ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo dang /
T02D1202:178a-31: chos kyi 'khor lo dang gsum du rlag pa /
T02D1202:178a-33: dbang gi thigs pa gsum mo //
T02D1202:178a-34: rdzogs pa'i rim gsum de ltar ro //
T02D1202:178a-35: zhes pa ni dga' ba dang /
T02D1202:178a-37: chad pa'i dga' ba dang gsum mo //
T02D1202:178a-38: yang na yar rdzogs pa la rdzogs zhes bya'o //
T02D1202:178a-39: rnam shes la sogs bye brag tu //
T02D1202:178a-40: zhes pa ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la sogs pa bzhi dang ;
T02D1202:178a-41: dngos po la sogs pa'i bye brag go //
T02D1202:178a-42: mchod sbyin tshangs pa'i yul sa che //
T02D1202:178a-43: zhes pa ni 'khor lo bzhi'i sprul pa la thug pas so //
T02D1202:178a-44: rnam par shes pa zhes pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo ste gnas so //
T02D1202:178a-45: snang ba ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo ste skye'o //
T02D1202:178b-0: nam mkha' zhes @178b pa ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1202:178b-1: ye shes zhes pa ni dga' ba gsum po yang 'khor lo bzhin sbyar ro //
T02D1202:178b-2: sku brgyad kyi ni bye brag tu //
T02D1202:178b-3: zhes pa ni phyi nang la sogs pa'i rim pa dbye ba ni sku brgyad gnas kyis 'byed do //
T02D1202:178b-4: dngos po rten dang rnam par 'byed //
T02D1202:178b-5: ces pa ni dga' ba dang ;
T02D1202:178b-7: sngar gyi chad pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02D1202:178b-8: 'khor lo la sogs pa'i dbye ba kun rang bzhin pas 'byed do //
T02D1202:178b-9: dper na chu dang rnyog ma bzhin no //
T02D1202:178b-10: ji bzhin 'dod pa sdud pa ni //
T02D1202:178b-11: zhes pa ni mchod sbyin thams cad ni sangs rgyas rin chen du sdud pa ste /
T02D1202:178b-12: de yang phyi la sogs pa thams cad kyang ngo //
T02D1202:178b-14: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma 'dus pa'o //
T02D1202:178b-15: au rgyan la sogs pa gnas su ni //
T02D1202:178b-16: zhes bya ba ni au rgyan gnas dang /
T02D1202:178b-19: k'a ma ru la sogs pa'i gnas dang /
T02D1202:178b-20: nye pa'i gnas la sogs par ro //
T02D1202:178b-21: legs dgyes ma sogs lha mo rnams //
T02D1202:178b-22: zhes pa ni lha mo rnams kyang de ltar gnas pa bzhin du dbye bar bya'o //
T02D1202:178b-23: k'a li ye shes yig mchog sbyin //
T02D1202:178b-24: zhes pa ni yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pas mchod do //
T02D1202:178b-25: phyi dang nang du bya ba'i thabs //
T02D1202:178b-26: zhes bya ba ni lus dang rtsa dang rim pa sngar bzhin no //
T02D1202:178b-27: mchod sbyin byas na sbyin pa che //
T02D1202:178b-28: zhes pa ni de rgyas na bde ba chen po thob bo //
T02D1202:178b-29: 'bras bu bkra shis ldan pa skye //
T02D1202:178b-30: zhes pa ni yon tan gyis sangs rgyas pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa'o //
T02D1202:178b-31: sems dang sems kyi bye brag ces pa ni sems
T02D1202:178b-32: bzang ba dang ngan pa la sogs pa bye brag
T02D1202:178b-33: gis ston pas thabs sna tshogs gsungs pa'o //
T02D1202:178b-34: kha cig rnams la 'dul ba'i thabs //
T02D1202:178b-35: zhes pa la sogs pas blo tshod dang sbyar ba'i chos kyi bye brag mang du gsungs so //
T02D1202:178b-36: tshe 'di la ni sangs rgyas so //
T02D1202:178b-37: zhes pa ni tshe 'di las tshe gzhan mi 'pho
T02D1202:178b-38: ba phung po lhag ma med pa'i bde ba chen
T02D1202:178b-39: po'i sku'o // dper na rgyal po chen po rnal
T02D1202:178b-40: 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal aindra bh'u t'i
T02D1202:178b-43: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1202:179a-0: yang na phung po spangs pa @179a * //
T02D1202:179a-2: / zhes pa ni ye shes kyi bag chags dang bcas nas gnas pa'o //
T02D1202:179a-3: bla na med pa'i ye shes sku ni sa bcu drug lta bu'o //
T02D1202:179a-4: brtson par mi ldan pa yis rnyed //
T02D1202:179a-5: ces pa ni bsam gtan g-yel bas kyang thob pa
T02D1202:179a-6: rnyed nas bsal ba la brtson 'grus rgyun ma chad
T02D1202:179a-8: ci bsams pa thams cad 'grub bo zhes so //
T02D1202:179a-9: de ltar ye shes kyi sku la sogs pa'i 'bras
T02D1202:179a-10: bu yang rnyed na gzhan gyis dngos grub lta smos
T02D1202:179a-11: su ci yod / de lta bas na /
T02D1202:179a-12: brtan pa'i brtson pas don thams cad //
T02D1202:179a-13: 'bad min chen pos grub pa yin //
T02D1202:179a-15: rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u drug pa'i dka' ba bkral ba'o /
T02D1202:179a-17: // / de nas bya ba ni mchod sbyin bshad nas bya ba'o //
T02D1202:179a-18: mchod pa'i cho ga ni zhes pa ni mchod ces pa'o //
T02D1202:179a-19: de yang yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa'i mchod pa la cho ga zhes so //
T02D1202:179a-20: sdig pa thams cad 'jig byed pa //
T02D1202:179a-21: zhes pa ni sdig pa dang nyon mongs pa la
T02D1202:179a-22: sogs pa kun 'di'i yon tan gyis med par byed
T02D1202:179a-23: do // yid 'phrog lha'i zhes pa ni lha thams cad yid 'jug pa'o //
T02D1202:179a-24: gang la 'jug ce na me tog ces smos te de la 'jug go //
T02D1202:179a-25: de'i phyir me tog gis zhes gsungs so //
T02D1202:179a-26: zla ba nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan //
T02D1202:179a-27: me dang sgron ma rmad du byung //
T02D1202:179a-28: mchod sbyin dkyil 'khor la mchod bya //
T02D1202:179a-29: zhes pa ni ku mu ta dang padma la sogs pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D1202:179a-30: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i mchod pas sngar gyi dkyil 'khor la mchod do //
T02D1202:179a-31: mar ngo'i dang po yi ni dbang //
T02D1202:179a-32: bcu drug pa yi dang po yis //
T02D1202:179a-33: zhes pa la sogs pa ston te mar ngo'i tshes bcu drug go //
T02D1202:179a-34: dbang zhes pa ni rlag pa dang longs spyod pa dang dbang gsum ni mchod pa'i dus so //
T02D1202:179a-35: bcu drug pa ni dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug po 'di sngags re rer sbyar ba'o //
T02D1202:179a-36: kun gyi rim pa yang de bzhin no //
T02D1202:179a-37: yang na zla ba ni yab kyi byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1202:179a-38: nyi ma ni yum gyi khrag go //
T02D1202:179a-39: de gnyis las rang bzhin bde ba'i 'od dang ldan no //
T02D1202:179a-40: me ni dri chu ste rang bzhin gyi don la sbyar ba'o //
T02D1202:179a-41: sgron ma ni sha chen te bde ba'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1202:179b-0: rmad du byung ni dri ste bde ba dang @179b bral ba'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1202:179b-1: mchod spyin dkyil 'khor la mchod bya //
T02D1202:179b-2: zhes pa ni ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la ye shes kyi mchod pas mchod pa'o //
T02D1202:179b-3: mar ngo'i dang po'i zhes pa ni tshes bcu drug pa sngar bzhin no //
T02D1202:179b-4: dbang zhes pas mchod de de yang bde ba'i a'a lis mchod de de'i phyir /
T02D1202:179b-5: byang chub sems byung mchod pa yis //
T02D1202:179b-7: yar ngo mar ngo'i bye brag tu //
T02D1202:179b-8: zhes pa ni a'a li dang k'a li ye shes kyi khyad par ro //
T02D1202:179b-9: shes rab thabs ni rab tu sbyor ni de gnyis
T02D1202:179b-10: dbyer med par sbyar ba las 'di lta bu'i 'khor
T02D1202:179b-11: lo 'byung ngo // sku gsum ni bde ba chen po ru rlag pas chos kyi sku'o ;
T02D1202:179b-12: / longs spyod pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D1202:179b-13: snying gar dbang byas pas sprul pa'i sku'o //
T02D1202:179b-14: yang na re re la yang gsum gsum mo //
T02D1202:179b-15: ye shes ni sku gsum dbyer med pa'am /
T02D1202:179b-16: dga' ba'i gnas la sogs par sku gnas pa la'o //
T02D1202:179b-17: de lta bu'i dngos po la dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
T02D1202:179b-18: tshes dang yi ge sngags kyis su //
T02D1202:179b-19: zhes pa ni chos zhes pa ni ye shes kyi
T02D1202:179b-20: rim pa dang yi ge'i ngo bo thig le dang
T02D1202:179b-21: sngags kyi ngo bo thabs dang shes rab byang chub
T02D1202:179b-22: kyi sems kyi thig le de bsrung ba'i phyir sngags
T02D1202:179b-23: zhes bya'o // ri bong can ni 'phel bar 'gyur //
T02D1202:179b-24: zhes pa ni ye shes rgyas par mdzad do //
T02D1202:179b-25: thig le dang mkha' 'gog pa yis //
T02D1202:179b-27: zhes pa la sogs pa smos so //
T02D1202:179b-28: byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo thig le la
T02D1202:179b-29: gnas pa de ye shes rlung 'gag pa dang h'um
T02D1202:179b-30: phat bkod la spro bsdus rang bzhin dga' bar 'byung
T02D1202:179b-31: ngo ; / de ltar ma yin na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang ma rnyed do //
T02D1202:179b-32: bla ma'i zhal la ltos nas 'od rab 'thob bo //
T02D1202:179b-33: de thob na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i bdag nyid yin no //
T02D1202:179b-34: rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u bdun pa'i dka' ba bkral ba'o; ;

T02D1202:180a-32: sngags dang rgyud kyi thos pa che //

T02D1202:180b-29: sring mo dang ni mna' 'am dang //

T02D1202:180b-31: rigs lnga'i yum du bshad pa yang //
T02D1202:180b-32: ji bzhin ma yin bdag gis phye //
T02D1202:180b-34: shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis //

T02D1202:180b-36: ces pa ni bla ma dang lhan cig bsrub pa

T02D1202:180b-43: zhes bya ba ni sbyin sreg gi mchod pa 'di

T02D1202:180b-45: ba ste / gnas dang dgang gzar dang blugs gzar

T02D1202:181a-2: sna tshogs thabs ni bdag gis bstan //

T02D1202:181a-4: mtshan ma la rgyu ba'i thabs kyi bye brag gis gzung bar gsungs so //
T02D1202:181a-5: don dam du ni phyi don mi //
T02D1202:181a-6: nang gi ma yin phyi ma yin //
T02D1202:181a-7: zhes gsungs te don dam pa de kho na nyid kyi sbyin sreg ni phyi yang ma yin /

T02D1202:181a-9: de bas na don dam du gsang ba'i sbyin sreg

T02D1202:181a-11: bdag nyid do // rdul med rnam par rdul med

T02D1202:181a-15: bdag nyid do // su dag pa'o // stong ba nyid ni stong min bral //
T02D1202:181a-16: zhes pa ni rdzogs pa'i don gyis spros pa thabs dang bral pa ste /
T02D1202:181a-17: de yang rang bzhin gyis sbyin sreg 'di ni gzugs kyang ma yin /
T02D1202:181a-18: tshor ba la sogs pa ma yin /
T02D1202:181a-23: shin tu stong pa yang ma yin /
T02D1202:181a-24: stong pa chen po yang ma yin /
T02D1202:181a-25: mi stong ba yang ma yin /
T02D1202:181a-26: brjod du med pa lkog tu gyur pa rang rig pa'i dngos dang bral ba ste /
T02D1202:181a-27: rang rig pa las gzhan du 'da' ba ma yin

T02D1202:181a-33: phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa

T02D1202:181a-37: la sogs pa'i yon gnas la yon gyi rim pa

T02D1202:181b-0: @181b tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni //
T02D1202:181b-1: tshogs kyang yin te thams cad tshogs pas so //

T02D1202:181b-3: gtor ma chen po yin te phyi nang gi dbye bas ni gtor ma bya'o //

T02D1202:181b-9: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa yang de bzhin no //

T02D1202:181b-12: bsrung ba 'grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mchod pa'o //
T02D1202:181b-13: de kho na nyid ni bza' ba'i tshogs dang /
T02D1202:181b-14: bsrung ba gnyis ni bza' ba'i bdud rtsi byang chub kyi sems kyi rtog pa dang bral ba'am /
T02D1202:181b-15: de bral pa'i dbang gis shes rab kyis srung rgyu
T02D1202:181b-16: med pa 'di ni rig pa dang bral ba'i dngos

T02D1202:181b-19: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang //
T02D1202:181b-21: de ni bde ba'i tshogs te ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi tshogs so //
T02D1202:181b-22: tshogs kyi dbye ba byas nas /
T02D1202:181b-23: khyim ni sum thog gi gnas zhes bya ba ni

T02D1202:181b-26: tshom rkun kun dang ldan pa yi //
T02D1202:181b-27: phyi rol yul min nang gi min //
T02D1202:181b-29: slob dpon 'dus pas brgyan pa dang /

T02D1202:182a-0: @182a * // me tog la sogs dkyil 'khor bya //

T02D1202:182a-11: pa'o // des ni phyi dang nang la sogs pa'i dbye ba'o //
T02D1202:182a-12: de ru ma chod sbyin don du ni //
T02D1202:182a-13: zhes pas ni tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du dgod pa la bya'o ;
T02D1202:182a-14: / byol song gi ni rab gzugs blang //
T02D1202:182a-15: zhes pa ni gti mug byol song gi ngo bo dang bral ba'i ro blang bar bya'o //
T02D1202:182a-16: skye ba gcig pa zhes pa la sogs pa ni
T02D1202:182a-17: bar ma chad par skyes pa na chod la bab
T02D1202:182a-19: nad kun med pa bde grub pa //
T02D1202:182a-20: zhes pa ni dang mi bde ba dang bral ba'i dngos grub grub pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba de'o //
T02D1202:182a-21: dri zhim rdul ni 'byung ba can //
T02D1202:182a-22: zhes pa ni dri la sogs pa'i yon tan gyis gang ba /
T02D1202:182a-23: yang dag pa'i bdud rtsi rgyu ste bde ba'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1202:182a-24: gang zhig mig ni yun rings 'dzums //
T02D1202:182a-25: zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi ye shes kyi rang
T02D1202:182a-26: bzhin bya pa'i don du mkhas pas blangs zhes gsungs
T02D1202:182a-27: so // sna tshogs pa yi mchod sbyin gyis //
T02D1202:182a-28: zhes pa ni tshogs la mchod pa mang po'i tshogs pas so //
T02D1202:182a-29: gri gug rung bas brtag par bya //
T02D1202:182a-30: zhes pa ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin shin tu rno ba'i gri gug gis bcad pa'i las bya'o //
T02D1202:182a-31: yan lag rab kyi padmo'i snod //
T02D1202:182a-32: btung ba'i don du bla ma'i mdun //
T02D1202:182a-33: zhes pa ni rkang pa dang /
T02D1202:182a-34: lag pa la sogs pa'i rab ni mgo bo'i padma'i snod do //

T02D1202:182a-38: yang na ka p'a la ni tshogs kyi rtsa ba yin no //

T02D1202:182a-40: phyed ni gtor mar dbul bar bya //
T02D1202:182a-41: zhes pa ni phyed mar sha dang chang la sogs pa bgo ba'o //

T02D1202:182a-44: sha chen ni sha chen te mi'i sha'o //

T02D1202:182b-26: ma bcu so sor gzhag go //
T02D1202:182b-27: rtsa ba ci bzhin rim pas gzhag / ces bya
T02D1202:182b-28: ba ni rtsa ba'i gtor ma chen po mdun la
T02D1202:182b-29: gzhag / phyi ma yang rim pa bzhin du gzhag
T02D1202:182b-30: go // rang gnas phyin pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1202:182b-31: zhes pa ni dur khrod chen po'i gnas sam /
T02D1202:182b-32: yang na chu dogs chen por phyin pa tsam ni man ngag go //
T02D1202:182b-33: 'khor lo la ni snod gcig brtag / ces bya
T02D1202:182b-34: ba ni 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad ni gcig tu

T02D1202:182b-37: rang gi tshogs la'ang mi sbyin bya //

T02D1202:182b-39: zhes pa ni bla ma ka p'a la gling gcig
T02D1202:182b-40: pa'i 'dzag bug med pa der bdud rtsis bkang la

T02D1202:183a-0: la sogs pa dang yang mi bsre bar @183a *

T02D1202:183a-19: lus kyi gsang ba de bzhin du gsang ba la
