T02D1202:183a-30: dang gus pa'i tshul gyis dris pa'i don to //
T02D1202:183a-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba
T02D1202:183a-32: ni 'khor rnams dang bcas pa la gsungs pa ste
T02D1202:183a-34: dkyil 'khor gyi ni nges bstan pa //
T02D1202:183a-35: ji bzhin de ni dpa' po nyon //
T02D1202:183a-36: zhes pa ni sngar zhus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi don
T02D1202:183a-37: ges par bstan gyis bstan pa de ma nor bar
T02D1202:183a-38: sems la yang dag par zung shig / shes par
T02D1202:183a-40: sngar gsungs pa yi rgyud don las ;
T02D1202:183a-41: / zhes pa ni gong du gsungs pa'i don 'di ru bsdus nas bstan par bya'o //
T02D1202:183a-42: a'a lo k'a li bde ba che //
T02D1202:183a-43: zhes pa ni bde ba'i byang chub kyi sems thig le'i ngo bo zla ba dang nyi ma'o //
T02D1202:183a-44: mam h'um gnyis las thig tshul grangs //
T02D1202:183a-45: zhes bya ba ni mam las tshul gyi dngos po
T02D1202:183b-0: h'um las @183b thig le de gnyis las phyag mtshan
T02D1202:183b-2: de gnyis las gri gug dang zhes gsungs te /
T02D1202:183b-3: phyag mtshan gnyis kyang sa bon dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1202:183b-4: sa bon gnyis las 'od phyogs thams cad du spro ba dang /
T02D1202:183b-5: bsdu ba byas pa las bcom ldan 'das ye shes thig le yab yum bzhengs pa ni /
T02D1202:183b-6: ye shes me long las ye shes //
T02D1202:183b-7: snying bo bdag nyid zhu las byung //
T02D1202:183b-9: sar pa sprin dang mnyam pa'i mdog / ces ba ni /
T02D1202:183b-10: sku mdog sprin bzhin gnag par gnas //
T02D1202:183b-12: phyag ni brgyad gnyis pa yis brgyan //
T02D1202:183b-13: zhes bya ba ni brgyad gnyis las bcu drug ste /
T02D1202:183b-14: g-yas pa brgyad dang g-yon pa brgyad do //
T02D1202:183b-15: bcu drug phyed kyi zhal 'jigs pa //
T02D1202:183b-16: zhes pa ni zhal brgyad mnga' ba'o //
T02D1202:183b-17: zhabs bzhi yis ni rab tu mdzes //
T02D1202:183b-18: zhes pa ni zhabs bzhis brgyan pa la ni mdzes zhes pa'o //
T02D1202:183b-19: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i spyan gyis phyug / ces bya
T02D1202:183b-20: ba ni yon tan de lta bu dang ldan no
T02D1202:183b-21: // gti mug gsum gyi mun nag 'joms //
T02D1202:183b-22: zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa gsum bsal ba'i bdag nyid ye shes dang stobs gsum mo //
T02D1202:183b-23: dkar po zhes pa la sogs pa la dbus ku
T02D1202:183b-24: gnag pa dang g-yas ser po g-yon dkar po lhag
T02D1202:183b-25: ma dmar po'o // gzhan ni sngon po'o //
T02D1202:183b-26: steng gi shin tu 'jigs pa bong bu'i zhal bung ba'i mdog go //
T02D1202:183b-27: g-yon brkyang g-yas brkyang zhabs ni zhes pa la zhabs bzhi brkyang zhes bya ste /
T02D1202:183b-28: dor stabs su bzhugs nas g-yas brkyang bas 'jigs byed mnan pa /
T02D1202:183b-29: g-yon gyis nyi zla ba rdzis pa'o //
T02D1202:183b-30: de'i phyir 'jigs byed nyi zla gnon zhes bya'o //
T02D1202:183b-31: 'jigs byed ma ldan ka p'a la //
T02D1202:183b-32: khrag gis bkang ba phyag na bsnams //
T02D1202:183b-33: zhi ba'i pags pa na bza' mchog / phyag gnyis de ni gyen du brkyang //
T02D1202:183b-34: zhes pa ni ma h'a de ba'i pags pa rlon
T02D1202:183b-35: pa bshus ma thag phyag gnyis kyis gyen la dbyangs
T02D1202:183b-36: pa'i phyag dang gzhan lhag ma rnams kyis 'jigs byed
T02D1202:183b-37: ma'i khyag kha la sogs pa nas 'dzag pas ka
T02D1202:183b-38: p'a la bkang bas bdag nyid btung pa'i rol pa
T02D1202:183b-39: mdzad pa'o // tshangs pa'i pags pa rked sham thabs //
T02D1202:183b-41: phyag rgya drug gis sku la bcings //
T02D1202:184a-0: @184a * // zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo la sogs pa drug ste /
T02D1202:184a-2: phyag rgya che dang gnyis med sbyor //
T02D1202:184a-3: zhes pa ni yum gyi mtshan yin te /
T02D1202:184a-4: yab yum gnyis su dbyer mi phyed par sbyor pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1202:184a-5: gar dang ldan pa'i tshangs spyod bzhugs //
T02D1202:184a-6: zhes bya ba ni gar mkhan nas sprul pa'i bdag nyid du bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1202:184a-7: tshangs pa'i yul sa bye ba khang //
T02D1202:184a-8: tshangs pa'i yul sa zhal gyis brgyan //
T02D1202:184a-9: zhes bya ba ni sha chen la sogs pa gsol
T02D1202:184a-10: ba dang mi mgo la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan
T02D1202:184a-11: pa'o // phyag rgya chen po nam mkha' sngo //
T02D1202:184a-12: zhes ba ni bcom ldan mo'i sku mdog sngo ba'o //
T02D1202:184a-13: tshangs pa'i phyag gnyis na bza' grol //
T02D1202:184a-14: zhes ba ni gcer bu gos mi mnga' ba zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'o //
T02D1202:184a-15: gri gug snod bsnams zhi ba'i zhal //
T02D1202:184a-16: zhes pa ni phyag g-yas gri gug g-yon pa padma'i snod bsnams pa dgyes pa'i tshul du mdzad pa'o //
T02D1202:184a-17: spyan gsum pa dang skra grol ba /
T02D1202:184a-18: mgrin par 'khyud pa gsang ba mchog / ces pa ni spyan gsum pa /
T02D1202:184a-19: skra kham pa gyen du g-yengs pa /
T02D1202:184a-20: yab kyi mgrin par yum 'khyud nas gnas pa /
T02D1202:184a-21: yum la yang yab kyis 'khyud pa'o //
T02D1202:184a-23: h'um las sna tshogs rdo rje yi //
T02D1202:184a-24: ra ba gur du bsam par bya //
T02D1202:184a-25: de dbus bh'um las rtsibs bcu ser //
T02D1202:184a-26: phyogs skyong bcu dang khro bor bcas //
T02D1202:184a-27: gshin rje mdog gnag shar du bsam //
T02D1202:184a-28: zhal gsum phyag drug spyan gsum pa //
T02D1202:184a-29: rdo rje ral gri rtse gsum g-yas //
T02D1202:184a-30: padma tho ba dbyug pa g-yon ;
T02D1202:184a-32: zhal g-yas ser la g-yon pa dmar //
T02D1202:184a-33: h'um las 'phro ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1202:184a-34: shes rab mthar phyin lho yi rtsibs //
T02D1202:184a-35: dkar bo dmar po sngon po'i zhal //
T02D1202:184a-36: dbyug pa rlag ri g-yas pas bsnams //
T02D1202:184a-37: mtshon rtse mgo bo g-yon du'o //
T02D1202:184a-38: padma mthar phyin nub kyi rtsibs //
T02D1202:184a-39: dmar po dkar po sngon po'i zhal //
T02D1202:184a-40: ral gri 'khor lo phyag g-yas su //
T02D1202:184a-41: zla phyed dang ni ri rab g-yon //
T02D1202:184a-42: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa byang gi rtsibs //
T02D1202:184a-43: sngon po'i dkar po dmar po'i zhal //
T02D1202:184a-44: g-yas na ral gri rdor rgya gram //
T02D1202:184b-0: mdud thung @184b dung gnyis g-yon na bsnams //
T02D1202:184b-1: 'dod rgyal sngon po dkar dmar zhal / ral gri rin chen sta re mdung //
T02D1202:184b-2: dbyug sngon ser po ljang dmar zhal //
T02D1202:184b-3: rtse gsum ral gri gsal shing me'o //
T02D1202:184b-4: stobs chen dung mdog ser dang dmar //
T02D1202:184b-5: ral gri dud zhags rta rnga yab //
T02D1202:184b-6: mi g-yo dkar nag dmar po sngo //
T02D1202:184b-7: ral gri lcags kyu pi wang bye'u //
T02D1202:184b-8: drang srong la sogs mtshams su'o //
T02D1202:184b-10: 'khor lo ral gri ka p'a la //
T02D1202:184b-11: kha tv'am bzhi phyag rnams na //
T02D1202:184b-12: bsnams pa shar mtshams rtsibs la'o //
T02D1202:184b-13: sum rgyal sngon po zhal gsum pa ;
T02D1202:184b-15: ral gri lcags kyu gri gug dang //
T02D1202:184b-16: thod pa bsnams pa nub mtshams so //
T02D1202:184b-17: kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug ste //
T02D1202:184b-18: dang po gnyis ni yum la 'khyud //
T02D1202:184b-19: g-yas brkyang pa la bzhin yang 'jigs //
T02D1202:184b-20: gsus rlo ljags 'dril mche ba gtsigs //
T02D1202:184b-21: sprul gyi rgyan gyis thams cad brgyan //
T02D1202:184b-22: aag tshom dang ni smin ma mnyam //
T02D1202:184b-23: dbu skra ser ba gyen 'greng ba'i //
T02D1202:184b-24: khro bo bcu ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1202:184b-25: kun kyang 'jig rten skyong ba ste //
T02D1202:184b-26: gar dgu dang ni ldan pa'o //
T02D1202:184b-27: aom dzrimbha dzrimbh'a sbh'a h'um phat /
T02D1202:184b-28: aom gu gu ro h'um phat /
T02D1202:184b-29: aom dha ra dha ra h'um phat /
T02D1202:184b-30: aom bi dha ra bi dha ra h'um phat /
T02D1202:184b-31: aom ta ghe ta ta ghe ta h'um phat /
T02D1202:184b-33: aom aa ta ha sa h'um phat /
T02D1202:184b-34: aom aa dha ha sa h'um phat /
T02D1202:184b-35: aom lu hu lu hu h'um phat /
T02D1202:184b-36: aom bi kra ma bi kra ma h'um phat /
T02D1202:184b-37: zhes pa sngags kyis bsrung pa'o /
T02D1202:184b-38: de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni //
T02D1202:184b-40: ae las byung ba bsam par bya'o //
T02D1202:184b-41: rlung la sogs pa'i 'khor lo bzhi //
T02D1202:184b-42: mam ram bam lam las byung ba'o //
T02D1202:184b-43: bhr'um las 'khor lo'i steng du bdag / rnam par snang mdzad ngo bor gnas //
T02D1202:184b-44: dkyil 'khor dang bcas yongs gyur pa //
T02D1202:184b-45: gzhal yas khang pa rim gnyis so //
T02D1202:184b-46: gru bzhi pa la sgo sogs ldan //
T02D1202:184b-47: shing dang dur khrod rnams kyis bsgor //
T02D1202:184b-48: mi bzad mi sdug ce spyang sogs //
T02D1202:184b-49: 'jigs su rung yang sha za'i kha //
T02D1202:184b-50: ha har dgod dang nag po'i me //
T02D1202:184b-51: 'jigs byed brgyad pos rnam par brgyan //
T02D1202:184b-52: dpal gyi me tog mig rdzi shing //
T02D1202:185a-2: pa la dang ni sha ra dang /
T02D1202:185a-3: khar ba shing dang sha mi brgyad //
T02D1202:185a-4: byi la bya rgod nyi ma 'jigs //
T02D1202:185a-5: stag dang glang chen ce sbyang dang //
T02D1202:185a-6: khyi dang rta la sogs pa brgyad //
T02D1202:185a-7: dur khrod shing la dbang byed pa'o //
T02D1202:185a-8: yang na khva la sogs pa brgyad //
T02D1202:185a-9: rigs pas dur khrod du bshad pa'o //
T02D1202:185a-10: 'dod ma la sogs rtsa brgyad ni //
T02D1202:185a-11: 'bras bu me tog yod pas shing //
T02D1202:185a-12: shing la dbang byed dpa' bo rnams //
T02D1202:185a-13: rang rang ngo bor gnas pa'o //
T02D1202:185a-14: de lta'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1202:185a-15: dbus na 'dab brgyad kha dog dmar //
T02D1202:185a-16: zla ba kha dog nyi ma mdzes pa'i gdan //
T02D1202:185a-17: dbyangs yig dpe byad las byung ba'i //
T02D1202:185a-18: zla ba nyi ma gnyis su gsal //
T02D1202:185a-19: dbus su sa bon gnyis gyur pa //
T02D1202:185a-20: pad snod gri gug mam h'um ldan //
T02D1202:185a-21: thams cad 'di ru gcig pa la //
T02D1202:185a-22: bcom ldan ye shes thig le bzhengs //
T02D1202:185a-23: sku mdog gnag la khros pa'i zhal //
T02D1202:185a-24: zhal brgyad dang ni spyan gsum pa //
T02D1202:185a-25: dbus ma gnag la sku dang 'dra //
T02D1202:185a-26: ser po dmar po ljang du'i mdog / g-yon nas bskor ba'i rim pa'o //
T02D1202:185a-27: gzhan ni autpala sngon po mtshungs //
T02D1202:185a-28: rdo rje dril bu rnge'u chung dang //
T02D1202:185a-29: ka p'a la dang khva tv'am ga / ral gri dang ni mda' gzhu rnams //
T02D1202:185a-30: phyag ni bzhi gnyis na ni bsnams //
T02D1202:185a-31: sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi bor mtshan //
T02D1202:185a-32: zla phyed dbu la brgyan pa la //
T02D1202:185a-33: mi bskyod pa yi cod pan can //
T02D1202:185a-34: mgo bo rlon pas do shal byas //
T02D1202:185a-35: gshin rje'i pags pa'i sham thabs la //
T02D1202:185a-36: thod pa'i dum bu'i ska rags bcings //
T02D1202:185a-37: sku ni phyag rgya drug gis brgyan //
T02D1202:185a-38: bzhengs te gar dgu'i sgra chen sgrogs //
T02D1202:185a-39: zhabs kyis 'jig rten mnan nas so //
T02D1202:185a-40: phyag rgya che dang gnyis med sbyor //
T02D1202:185a-41: bde ba chags chen rang bzhin las //
T02D1202:185a-42: 'phros pa'i lha mo rnams kyis mchod //
T02D1202:185a-43: kye rab sku mchog gi ngo bo yi mtshan nyid //
T02D1202:185a-44: gang na bzhugs pa mya ngan 'das mtshan nyid //
T02D1202:185a-45: de kho na nyid dang bral ba'i stong de chad //
T02D1202:185a-46: gnyis med pa yi bde bas mi tshor ram ci //
T02D1202:185a-47: mtsho skyes ma dang gsung rdo rjer sbyor yongs su gzigs //
T02D1202:185a-48: gang zhig dngos bo dngos med de ni spyod //
T02D1202:185a-49: glu yis mchod cing bskul ba las //
T02D1202:185a-50: rang bzhin las ni mam h'um ngo //
T02D1202:185b-0: @185b gri gug pad snod de las byung //
T02D1202:185b-1: lte ba'i nang du sa bon gnas //
T02D1202:185b-2: snying po zhu las bcom ldan 'das //
T02D1202:185b-3: 'jigs byed zla nyi steng na bzhengs //
T02D1202:185b-4: dpa' bo dpa' mo rnams kyis bskor //
T02D1202:185b-5: zhal brgyad phyag ni bcu drug ste //
T02D1202:185b-6: zhabs bzhi g-yas brkyang g-yon kyang brkyang ;
T02D1202:185b-7: / spyan gsum pa ni sku mdog gnag / zhal gsum dkar dang dmar dang ser //
T02D1202:185b-8: gzhan rnams zhal ni bung ba mtshungs //
T02D1202:185b-9: steng ma 'jigs pa bong bu'i byad //
T02D1202:185b-10: khyod sku mche ba 'jigs pa gtsigs //
T02D1202:185b-11: sku la bskal ba'i me ri 'bar //
T02D1202:185b-12: bzhengs nas dregs pa 'joms par mdzad //
T02D1202:185b-13: thod rlon rgyu mas brgyus pas brgyan //
T02D1202:185b-14: skra ser smin ma gyen du 'greng //
T02D1202:185b-15: zhi ba'i 'phags pa rlon pa ni //
T02D1202:185b-16: phyag gnyis kyis ni gyen du dpyangs //
T02D1202:185b-17: lhag ma'i phyag rnams 'jigs byed ma'i //
T02D1202:185b-18: kha nas khrag 'dzag ka p'a lar //
T02D1202:185b-19: btung bza'i phyir ni phyag na bsnams //
T02D1202:185b-20: phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan //
T02D1202:185b-21: tshangs pa'i pags pas sham thabs byas //
T02D1202:185b-22: skye rags bcings shing gar du sgrogs //
T02D1202:185b-23: ha ha bzhad pa khro bo'i 'jigs //
T02D1202:185b-24: phyag rgya che dang mnyam sbyor zhing //
T02D1202:185b-25: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo //
T02D1202:185b-26: spyan gsum skra grol gnyis ka 'khyud //
T02D1202:185b-27: rus pa'i rgyan dang thod pas brgyan //
T02D1202:185b-28: mi bskyod cod pan yab dang mnyam //
T02D1202:185b-29: gcer bu kham du thams cad gsol //
T02D1202:185b-30: phyag gnyis gri gug snod 'dzin pa //
T02D1202:185b-31: rgyan rnams yab dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D1202:185b-32: sna tshogs padma'i shar phyogs su //
T02D1202:185b-33: dpa' bo la sogs bzhugs pa rnams //
T02D1202:185b-34: shar du au rgyan gnas su ni //
T02D1202:185b-35: nam mkha' dri med bsam par bya //
T02D1202:185b-36: dz'a landha ra byang du ste //
T02D1202:185b-37: shin tu rtsal chen bsgom pa'o //
T02D1202:185b-38: pu li ra ma nub tu ste //
T02D1202:185b-39: lha yi dbang phyug bsam pa'o //
T02D1202:185b-40: k'a ma r'u pa lho yi phyogs //
T02D1202:185b-41: gsang ba'i bdag po de ltar ro //
T02D1202:185b-42: ma la pa ru 'od brag ste //
T02D1202:185b-44: na ga ru ni mchog dga' ste //
T02D1202:185b-45: sing gar thams cad byed pa'o //
T02D1202:185b-46: gnas dang nye gnas bya ba'o //
T02D1202:185b-47: ma rur autpala snying po ste //
T02D1202:185b-48: de ba'i ko ta'ira zhing chen bdag / koo lu ta ru nag po 'dul //
T02D1202:186a-1: zhing dang nye zhing zhes 'dir bshad //
T02D1202:186a-2: ha li ka lir grags chen te //
T02D1202:186a-3: ku ta par ni dregs 'joms so //
T02D1202:186a-4: ri rab rta ni lam pa ka / k'anytsi kar ni nam mkha'i zhal //
T02D1202:186a-5: tshan do dang ni nye tshan do //

T02D1202:186a-7: / dpa' mo rnams ni sngon dang mtshungs //
T02D1202:186a-8: las kyi yul du zla ma ste //
T02D1202:186a-9: g-yon pa ma ni gser gling du //
T02D1202:186a-10: nyi ma ma ni ku lu tar //
T02D1202:186a-11: rlung za ma ni tsinda ro //
T02D1202:186a-13: yi dgas 'dus par bsil sbyin ma //
T02D1202:186a-14: snying po'i 'dab ma'i chu yi ngos //
T02D1202:186a-15: bag yod thor cog tsa ri tar //
T02D1202:186a-16: nyi 'dul gzhon nu'i grong khyer du //
T02D1202:186a-17: de ni dur khrod nye dur khrod //
T02D1202:186a-18: zhi tshor pho nya ka smi rar //
T02D1202:186a-19: ljang brtson ma ni ke ta rar //

T02D1202:186a-21: tshangs pa'i ma ni ka ru dzar //
T02D1202:186a-22: byi la nye ba'i byi la'o //
T02D1202:186a-24: / thog kha ma ni mi yi yul //
T02D1202:186a-25: thams cad skyed byed sa 'og tu //
T02D1202:186a-26: dpa' bo'i yul ni ri rab rtser //
T02D1202:186a-27: de ni sbyor dang nye ba'i sbyor //
T02D1202:186a-28: dpa' bo rnams dang lhan cig sbyor //
T02D1202:186a-29: sku mdog bzhugs thams yab dang 'dra //
T02D1202:186a-30: nag po dkar po dmar po sngo //

T02D1202:186a-32: dmar chen autpala sngon po mtshungs //
T02D1202:186a-33: gser zhogs mig sman du ba'i mdog / sprin mdog gser 'od dmar nag dang //
T02D1202:186a-34: ser po la sogs rim pa bzhin //
T02D1202:186a-35: zhal bzhi phyag bzhi dpa' bo kun //
T02D1202:186a-36: kha tr'am ga dang ka p'a la //
T02D1202:186a-37: rtsa bar bsnams nas shes rab 'khyud ;
T02D1202:186a-38: / dril bu rnge'u chung 'og gnyis bsnams //
T02D1202:186a-39: 'jigs byed zla nyi zhabs kyis mnan //
T02D1202:186a-40: rgyal po'i bzhugs thabs bzhin du bzhugs //
T02D1202:186a-41: phyag rgya rnam pa lnga yis brgyan //
T02D1202:186a-42: sna tshogs pa yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1202:186a-43: zhal gcig phyag gnyis dpa' bo rnams //
T02D1202:186a-44: thams cad pad snod gri gug thogs //
T02D1202:186a-45: rgyan dang cha lugs yab dang mthun //
T02D1202:186a-46: rim gnyis sna tshogs 'dab rgyas la //
T02D1202:186a-47: shar du skam ma sprin mdog ste //
T02D1202:186a-48: byang du 'jigs ma gser gyi mdog / nub tu rgyun 'od kha dog dmar //
T02D1202:186a-49: lho ru mchu 'phyangs ma ni ljang //
T02D1202:186b-0: @186b me mtshams ri rab so ma zla //
T02D1202:186b-1: gnod sbyin mtshams su bde ma ser //
T02D1202:186b-2: rlung mtshams dmigs stong shel gyi mdog / byang mtshams stag ma beerya mtshungs //
T02D1202:186b-3: nub mtshams gtum mo rin chen mdog / lho mtshams
T02D1202:186b-4: 'dod gzugs sna tshogs mdog / lus 'phags bo dang
T02D1202:186b-5: sgra mi snyan // ba lang spyod dang 'dzam bu'i gling //
T02D1202:186b-6: lam dang nye ba'i lam yin te //
T02D1202:186b-8: zhal ni nyi mig autpala mdog / dbang ldan mtshams su me zhal ser //
T02D1202:186b-9: 'od ma ser mo shar gyi sgor //
T02D1202:186b-10: lce rings dkar mo byang gi sgor ;
T02D1202:186b-11: / chos dkar zla mdog nub kyi sgor //
T02D1202:186b-12: bden ma ljang gu lho yi sgor //
T02D1202:186b-13: shar mtshams phyag bzhi sna tshogs gzugs //
T02D1202:186b-14: skra dang na bza' grol ba yis //
T02D1202:186b-15: spyan gsum pa la rus pa'i rgyan //
T02D1202:186b-16: phyag rgya lnga yis shin tu mdzes //
T02D1202:186b-17: ral gri dang ni ka p'a la //
T02D1202:186b-18: khrag gis bkang ba phyag na bsnams //
T02D1202:186b-19: gzhan na kha tv'am rnge'u chung ngo //
T02D1202:186b-20: ro steng g-yon brkyang rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1202:186b-21: de lta bur ni thams cad gnas //
T02D1202:186b-23: spyi bo dang ni spyi gtsug dang //
T02D1202:186b-24: mtshog ma dang ni smin dbus dang //
T02D1202:186b-25: sna yi rtse mo mig gnyis dang //
T02D1202:186b-26: rna ba gnyis dang kha pad dang //
T02D1202:186b-27: ko sko dang ni mgrin gling dang //
T02D1202:186b-28: rgyab gling de bzhin 'o ma'i snod //
T02D1202:186b-29: snying ga dang ni lte ba dang //
T02D1202:186b-30: gsang ba'i padma mtshan gyi dbus //
T02D1202:186b-31: mtshan rtsa dang ni gzhang kha dang //
T02D1202:186b-32: brla gnyis de bzhin pus mo gnyis //
T02D1202:186b-33: rje ngar gnyis dang rkang pa gnyis //
T02D1202:186b-34: mthe bong dang ni sor mo dang //
T02D1202:186b-35: lus thams cad dang rkang mthil gnyis //
T02D1202:186b-36: ltag pa dang ni rked pa dang //
T02D1202:186b-37: chos 'khor de bzhin lte ba dang //
T02D1202:186b-39: spu mtshams de ltar de yi 'og / rin mgrin rdo rje'i dpral ba'i gnas //
T02D1202:186b-40: de ni gnas dang nye ba'i gnas ;
T02D1202:186b-41: / zhing dang de bzhin nye zhing ste //
T02D1202:186b-42: tshan do dang ni nye tshan do //
T02D1202:186b-44: dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod rab //
T02D1202:186b-45: byi la nye ba'i byi la dang //
T02D1202:186b-46: sbyor ba dang ni nye ba'i sbyor //
T02D1202:186b-47: lam dang nye lam la sogs gnas //
T02D1202:186b-48: de ni gnas ni brgyad du bstan //
T02D1202:187a-1: gnas kyang de bzhin no// rang bzhin bde chen nam mkhar gnas //
T02D1202:187a-2: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te //
T02D1202:187a-3: sngags dang ldan pa'i phyag rgyas dgug / mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud sbrel te //
T02D1202:187a-4: mdzub rtse gnyis ni nam mkhar bsgreng //
T02D1202:187a-5: mthe bong mnan pas brtan par bya //
T02D1202:187a-6: ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor rnams //
T02D1202:187a-7: dam tshig sems dpa' la bstims la //
T02D1202:187a-8: sngags 'dis rtag tu nga rgyal bya //
T02D1202:187a-9: aom shr'i sarba ta th'a ga ta dzny'a na satva a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1202:187a-10: ji ltar chu la chu thim ltar //
T02D1202:187a-11: ye shes sems dpa' bstim pa'o //
T02D1202:187a-12: de nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje //
T02D1202:187a-13: spyi bo snying ga mgrin par bsgom //
T02D1202:187a-14: rigs su dbye bas 'khor lo gsum //
T02D1202:187a-15: gnas gsum du ni bsgom pa'o //
T02D1202:187a-16: aom a'a: h'um dang ldan pa yis //
T02D1202:187a-17: rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig go //
T02D1202:187a-18: bdag nyid phyag rgya drug ldan pas //
T02D1202:187a-19: de phyir go cha mi dgos so //
T02D1202:187a-20: 'khor lo rna cha mgul gdub dang //
T02D1202:187a-21: gdu bu ske rags thal ba drug / gti mug mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'o //
T02D1202:187a-22: drug tu bdag gis bshad pa'o //
T02D1202:187a-23: phyag rgya chen po las kyang gsungs //
T02D1202:187a-24: phyag rgya drug la bstan pa ste //
T02D1202:187a-25: skye mched drug ni dag pa ste //
T02D1202:187a-26: rigs drug rim par shes par bya //
T02D1202:187a-27: lha mo bdag nyid phyag rgya drug / de yi phyir na go cha rdzogs //
T02D1202:187a-28: de nas dbang bskur bde ba ni //
T02D1202:187a-29: bcom ldan 'das la dbang bskur don //
T02D1202:187a-30: 'od zer dang ni bcas pas bskul //
T02D1202:187a-31: de nas bde chen nam mkha' gnas //
T02D1202:187a-32: bdud rtsi dang ldan bum pa yis ;
T02D1202:187a-33: / rang gi spyi bor dbang bskur bas //
T02D1202:187a-34: dri ma dag nas mi bskyod pa'i //
T02D1202:187a-35: rang bzhin ye shes su ni 'gyur //
T02D1202:187a-36: rlung me'i dkyil 'khor la sogs steng //
T02D1202:187a-37: bde 'khor ka p'a la yi dbus //
T02D1202:187a-38: gla rtsi bzhi mnyam sihla dang //
T02D1202:187a-39: ga bur dang ni sha li dang //
T02D1202:187a-40: ye shes gnas pa'i rigs kyi lha //
T02D1202:187a-41: rlung mas bskul nas me ni 'bar //
T02D1202:187a-42: rigs lnga bdud rtsi'i ngo bor zhu //
T02D1202:187a-44: h'um gis bdud rtsi dkar por sbyangs //
T02D1202:187a-45: aa yis gnyis med rtogs par brlabs //
T02D1202:187a-46: de rdzas bdud rtsi bza' bar bya //
T02D1202:187b-1: h'um byung rdo rje dkar bkod la //
T02D1202:187b-2: phyi nang rab tshim 'di yis so //
T02D1202:187b-3: nyi zla la sogs mchod pa yis //
T02D1202:187b-4: phyi dang nang gnyis sku la mchod //
T02D1202:187b-5: rim gnyis rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis //
T02D1202:187b-6: sngags 'dus mchod pa rtag tu bya //
T02D1202:187b-7: aom dang h'um phat bar du ni //
T02D1202:187b-8: dbyangs yig re re spel ba yis //
T02D1202:187b-9: mar ngo tshes gcig nas bzung ste //
T02D1202:187b-10: bcu drug bar du mchod bya'o //
T02D1202:187b-11: dpral ba la sogs gnas rnams na //
T02D1202:187b-12: bde chen sku ni bzhugs pa la //
T02D1202:187b-13: sngags dang me tog ldan pa'i dus //
T02D1202:187b-14: dus dang tshes grangs ma nor bar //
T02D1202:187b-15: rlag dang longs spyod dbang gis ni //
T02D1202:187b-16: sku brgyad pa ni mchod byas pas //
T02D1202:187b-17: sku gsum bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1202:187b-18: bcu drug dga' ba'i sa thob bo //
T02D1202:187b-19: de nas bstod pa sna tshogs kyis //
T02D1202:187b-21: don thams cad ni bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D1202:187b-22: sngags rnams bzlas pa gsal bar bya //
T02D1202:187b-23: aom shr'i ma h'a badzra ge na ti la ka h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1202:187b-24: aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1202:187b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po dang //
T02D1202:187b-26: nye ba'i snying po'i 'di gnyis ni //
T02D1202:187b-27: grang med pa yi yon tan yod //
T02D1202:187b-28: aom badzra mre ta ye ma h'a ba la pa raksha ma ye h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1202:187b-29: aom sa ra wi sa ra h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1202:187b-30: bcom ldan mo yi snying po dang //
T02D1202:187b-31: nye ba'i snying po 'di gnyis kyis //
T02D1202:187b-32: don kun thams cad 'grub pa'i mchog / yang na
T02D1202:187b-33: phreng ba'i sngags ni mchog / bsnyen pa rdzogs par
T02D1202:187b-34: byas nas ni // de nas las kyi dbye ba bya //
T02D1202:187b-35: 'dis ni thams cad las grub byed //
T02D1202:187b-50: dpa' po dpa' mo bcu drug gnyis //
T02D1202:187b-51: snying po mchog tu bstan pa'o //
T02D1202:187b-53: snying po sngags kyang de ltar ro //
T02D1202:187b-54: aom ni dang po h'um phat mtha' //
T02D1202:187b-55: bar du ming ni sbel ba'o //
T02D1202:188a-0: aa a'a ai a'i au a'u ri r'i li l'i ae aee ao aoo aam aa: @188a * //
T02D1202:188a-1: yang na a'a li k'a li sngags //
T02D1202:188a-2: dpa' bo dpal mo snyid po sngags //
T02D1202:188a-3: de nas gtor ma'i cho ga bstan //
T02D1202:188a-4: dza: h'um bam ho: phyag rgyar ldan /
T02D1202:188a-5: mkha' 'gro dang ni phyogs skyong sogs //
T02D1202:188a-6: dgug gzhug bcings la dgyes par bya //
T02D1202:188a-7: aa dang ka sogs sngags rnams kyis //
T02D1202:188a-8: dgyes pa'i rdo rje brtag gnyis las //
T02D1202:188a-9: 'byung ba'i sngags kyis gtor ma sbyin //
T02D1202:188a-10: khro bo'i ngo bor bdag nyid gnas //
T02D1202:188a-11: sems can bsrung ba'i don du ni //
T02D1202:188a-12: rdo rje snyim pa kha phye la //
T02D1202:188a-13: mtshan phyed 'jigs pa med pas sbyin //
T02D1202:188a-14: dur khrod la sogs gnas su gtang //
T02D1202:188a-15: de nas bdag gis rnam dag bstan //
T02D1202:188a-16: rgyud 'di rang na gsal bas na //
T02D1202:188a-17: 'di ru dbye ba bdag gis ni //
T02D1202:188a-18: ngal bas 'jigs pas ma bris so //
T02D1202:188a-19: yang na 'di lta bu ru bstan //
T02D1202:188a-20: rdo rje gur sogs dbus su ni //
T02D1202:188a-21: chos kyi 'byung gnas bsam pa ste //
T02D1202:188a-22: bde 'khor zur gsum yod pa ni //
T02D1202:188a-23: de ni chos kyi ngo bo ste //
T02D1202:188a-24: nang na gnas pa'i byang chub sems //
T02D1202:188a-25: 'byung ba'i gnas zhes de la byas //
T02D1202:188a-26: nam mkha' chos ni yin pa ste //
T02D1202:188a-28: chos ni bha ga yin par bshad //
T02D1202:188a-29: bha ga'i gnas ni rin chen ste ;
T02D1202:188a-30: / de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i phyir //
T02D1202:188a-32: 'byung ba bzhi ni byang sems las //
T02D1202:188a-33: 'khor lo las byung thams cad khyab //
T02D1202:188a-34: zhu ba shel gyi gzhal yas khang //
T02D1202:188a-35: char yang thig le'i tshul dga' bzhi'i //
T02D1202:188a-36: gru bzhi pa yis rnam par mdzes //
T02D1202:188a-37: stong pa bzhi dang dga' ba bzhis //
T02D1202:188a-38: sgo bzhi zur bzhi par ni byas //
T02D1202:188a-39: rta babs la sogs dbye ba yis //
T02D1202:188a-40: 'khor lo la sogs de ltar ltar sbyar //
T02D1202:188a-41: yang na byang sems thig le de //
T02D1202:188a-42: stong pa snying rje ro gcig pas //
T02D1202:188a-43: gru bzhi sgo bzhi zur bzhi sogs //
T02D1202:188a-44: tshad med rnam par de bzhin sogs //
T02D1202:188a-45: de ltar chos rnams ye shes su //
T02D1202:188a-46: dbyer med shes pa de nyid do //
T02D1202:188a-47: dur khrod la sogs rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D1202:188a-48: rnam par khyab dang shing tshig dang //
T02D1202:188a-49: phyed tshig sva sva tseg tseg dang //
T02D1202:188a-50: dum mgo rnam bcas yi dgas ldan //
T02D1202:188b-1: de ni dur khrod gsang yin no //
T02D1202:188b-2: yang na mtshan rtogs bag chags gsang //
T02D1202:188b-3: bde ba'i ye shes 'dzin pa'i ro //
T02D1202:188b-5: slar la rang gi rin chen khar //
T02D1202:188b-6: h'um gis byin brlabs sha chen te //
T02D1202:188b-7: shing dang dur khrod dbang byed pa'i //
T02D1202:188b-8: dpa' po rnams kyis za zhing bzhad //
T02D1202:188b-9: ha ha'i sgra ni 'jam pa sgrogs //
T02D1202:188b-10: de lta bu yi dur khrod ni //
T02D1202:188b-11: bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya //
T02D1202:188b-12: rin chen ma dang padma dang //
T02D1202:188b-13: gshe chen ma dang stobs chen ma //
T02D1202:188b-14: mgo chen ma dang myos chen dang //
T02D1202:188b-15: dga' chen ma dang dga' med che //
T02D1202:188b-16: 'di ni shing gi dngos po ste //
T02D1202:188b-17: 'bras bu dang ni me tog dang //
T02D1202:188b-18: yan lag yod pa'i rtsva yi shing //
T02D1202:188b-19: gzhal yas khang ni rnam par brgyan //
T02D1202:188b-20: de yi dbus na padma'i gdan //
T02D1202:188b-21: zur gsum la sogs rnam par gnas //
T02D1202:188b-22: gzung 'dzin steng du nyi zla'i gdan //
T02D1202:188b-23: khu bde dbyangs yig dpe byad las //
T02D1202:188b-24: zla ba nyi mas bon gnas //
T02D1202:188b-25: de las bde chen rang bzhin gsal //
T02D1202:188b-26: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid ces brjod //
T02D1202:188b-28: mchog dang chad pa'i dbus na bzhugs //
T02D1202:188b-29: rlag dang longs spyod de bzhin no ;
T02D1202:188b-30: / shar ba dang ni nub pa min //
T02D1202:188b-31: rtag tu shar ba bcom ldan 'das //
T02D1202:188b-32: au dyan zhes pa zur gsum mo //
T02D1202:188b-35: rigs kyi me tog k'a ma ru //
T02D1202:188b-36: tshangs pa'i mig 'dra ma la ba //
T02D1202:188b-38: rna ba'i mig 'drar na gar ro //
T02D1202:188b-39: ba yi mig 'drar srid kar te //
T02D1202:188b-40: dung gi lte 'drar mu mung ro //
T02D1202:188b-41: glang chen lte 'drar de koo tar //
T02D1202:188b-44: bung ba'i kha 'drar ha ri kol //
T02D1202:188b-45: rma bya'i kha 'drar goo ta bar //
T02D1202:188b-46: rdo rje'i kha 'drar lam pa kar //
T02D1202:188b-47: til gyi me tog rgyas 'drar du //
T02D1202:188b-48: k'anytsi kar zhes pa yi gnas //
T02D1202:188b-49: de ni dpa' bo rnams kyi gnas /
T02D1202:188b-50: yan lag ma rnams bstan par bya //
T02D1202:188b-51: til gyi me tog ri rab rtse //
T02D1202:188b-52: sa 'og de ni rdo rje khar //
T02D1202:188b-53: mi yul de ni rma bya'i khar //
T02D1202:188b-54: 'chi med grong ni bung ba'i khar //
T02D1202:189a-2: ne pa la ni autpala lter //
T02D1202:189a-3: ka ra tar zhes glang chen lter //
T02D1202:189a-4: kar mi ra ni dung gi lter //
T02D1202:189a-5: gzhon nu grong khyer pa yi tshig / tsha ri
T02D1202:189a-6: tar zhes rna ba'i mig / chu dogs de ni
T02D1202:189a-7: dung gi mig / yi dgas 'dus pa tshangs pa'i
T02D1202:189a-8: mig / tshintar zhes pa'i rigs me tog / ko
T02D1202:189a-9: lu ta ni drag po'i mig / gser gling padma'i
T02D1202:189a-10: 'bras bu'i gnas // las kyi yul gnas zur gsum yin //
T02D1202:189a-11: 'di ni don du gsang ba'i gnas //
T02D1202:189a-12: lus 'phags po ni srog rtsa ma //
T02D1202:189a-13: sgra mi snyan ni la la n'a //
T02D1202:189a-14: ban glang spyod ni ra sa n'a //
T02D1202:189a-15: 'dzam bu'i gling zhes pa yi gnas //
T02D1202:189a-16: aa wa dh'u t'i zhes pa'o //
T02D1202:189a-17: 'di las gzhan pa'i gnas rnams ni //
T02D1202:189a-18: rnyed par sla bar yod mi 'gyur //
T02D1202:189a-19: gnas brgyad rang gi ngo bo ru //
T02D1202:189a-20: sku brgyad po ni bsgom pa'o //
T02D1202:189a-21: gnas ni gsang chen padma'i gnas //
T02D1202:189a-22: lte ba yod pa'i 'dab brgyad ni //
T02D1202:189a-23: gang gang bzhugs dang rten sa rnams //
T02D1202:189a-24: de dang de ni gnas zhes brjod //
T02D1202:189a-25: rang bzhin gang du skye ba ni //
T02D1202:189a-26: zhing rab ces ni de bstan to //
T02D1202:189a-27: de bzhin yang dag byang chub sems //
T02D1202:189a-29: gsum dang drug sogs dbye ba rnams //
T02D1202:189a-31: khu ba bde ba gnyis su rtog / dbyer med thim pa dur khrod do //
T02D1202:189a-32: gang du ye shes yang dag mthong //
T02D1202:189a-33: de yang mthong min byi lar brjod //
T02D1202:189a-35: ye shes brten nas nyams myong lam //
T02D1202:189a-36: rin chen kha ru bdud rtsi 'gog //
T02D1202:189a-37: 'od rab ngo bo gnas phyir sbyor //
T02D1202:189a-38: 'di ni de ni gnas brgyad de //
T02D1202:189a-39: sku brgyad dang ni sbyor ba'i gnas //
T02D1202:189a-40: thams cad stong dang bde chen dang //
T02D1202:189a-41: rang bzhin dga' dang 'od rab dang //
T02D1202:189a-42: char yang chen po ye shes che //
T02D1202:189a-43: phyag rgya che dang rdo rje sems //
T02D1202:189a-44: sku brgyad bdag nyid ye shes brgyad //
T02D1202:189a-45: yang na mtshan ma brgyad mchod ste //
T02D1202:189a-46: zla ba nyi ma shes rab thabs //
T02D1202:189a-48: mchod sbyin gyis ni de la mchod //
T02D1202:189a-49: yang ni bdud rtsi rim pa ltar //
T02D1202:189a-50: rlung 'khor steng du ye shes me //
T02D1202:189a-51: bde 'khor gsang pad ka p'a la //
T02D1202:189b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang @189b ldan ;
T02D1202:189b-1: / rlung ma dang ni gnyid ma yis //
T02D1202:189b-2: ye shes me 'bar gsal ba las //
T02D1202:189b-3: bde gshegs lnga rnams bdud rtsir bzhu //
T02D1202:189b-4: rdor gsum sa bon 'bar sbyangs rtogs //
T02D1202:189b-5: dga' ba gsum dang ldan nas gnas //
T02D1202:189b-6: bdud rtsi gsang ba'i ka p'a lar //
T02D1202:189b-7: gnas pa mthong nas bdag nyid btung //
T02D1202:189b-8: gsang ba'i rdo rje bu gus so //
T02D1202:189b-9: de nas mchod pas mchod sbyin bya'o //
T02D1202:189b-10: byang chub sems kyi me tog gis //
T02D1202:189b-11: sngags dang dus tshod ma nor bar //
T02D1202:189b-12: rlag dang longs spyod la sogs pas //
T02D1202:189b-13: mchod pa byas pas bsod nams 'phel //
T02D1202:189b-14: bde ba la sogs gnas su'o ;
T02D1202:189b-15: / yang na dga' mchog gnas su 'am //
T02D1202:189b-16: de rlag pa ni mchog gi brda //
T02D1202:189b-17: chad pa ru ni longs spyod de //
T02D1202:189b-18: de gnyis dbus su dbang gnyis bsten //
T02D1202:189b-21: de kho na nyid mchod pa ste //
T02D1202:189b-22: gnas brgyad pa yi sku la mchod //
T02D1202:189b-23: nye ba'i gnas na gnas pa yang //
T02D1202:189b-24: de yi shin tu tshim pa'o //
T02D1202:189b-25: de nas bde gshegs snying po sngags //
T02D1202:189b-26: de ni a'a li bcu drug bde //
T02D1202:189b-27: kun rdzob tu ni chu zla bzhin //
T02D1202:189b-28: de ni bzlog cing drang bar bya'o //
T02D1202:189b-29: yang na rdor gsum ye shes kyi //
T02D1202:189b-30: spros pa rang rig ma yi mkha' ;
T02D1202:189b-31: / bsdus pas rang bdag mkha' la ste //
T02D1202:189b-32: gnas par rang bzhin ye shes so //
T02D1202:189b-33: de ni spros bral nam mkha' bzhin //
T02D1202:189b-34: de ni don dam snying po'o //
T02D1202:189b-35: sems can thams cad bsrung don du //
T02D1202:189b-36: rnal 'byor pas ni gtor ma sbyin //
T02D1202:189b-37: gtor ma ba lam zhes bshad pas //
T02D1202:189b-38: ba ni shes rab lam ni thabs //
T02D1202:189b-39: de gnyis mchog dang chad pa ste //
T02D1202:189b-40: gnyis sbyor ba ni chad pa'i dga' //
T02D1202:189b-41: de ru bsrungs pas sems can rnams //
T02D1202:189b-42: sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur the tshom med //
T02D1202:189b-43: de lta'i gtor ma chen po gtang //
T02D1202:189b-44: yang na sems can don du ni //
T02D1202:189b-45: 'di ltar bu yi gtor ma sbyin //
T02D1202:189b-46: srog chags thams cad bdag nyid kyis //
T02D1202:189b-47: gcig kyang ma shes pa ru gsad //
T02D1202:189b-48: gsad cing gsad pas thar pa 'thob //
T02D1202:189b-51: de lta'i sgrub thabs shes par dka' //
T02D1202:189b-52: dkyil 'khor sku ru bstan pa dang //
T02D1202:190a-2: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang //
T02D1202:190a-3: de kho na nyid dkyil 'khor dang //
T02D1202:190a-4: dkyil 'khor bzhi ni mchog tu bshad //
T02D1202:190a-5: de ltar sku brgyad kyi sgrub thabs bstan nas /
T02D1202:190a-7: yang na snying po'i dkyil 'khor bstan ;
T02D1202:190a-8: / zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gsum po las gzhan
T02D1202:190a-9: te de kho na nyid kyi yin pa ste 'og
T02D1202:190a-10: na ston to // rang gis ni bdag rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02D1202:190a-11: bde ba len pa'i phyir zhes pa ni /
T02D1202:190a-12: rang bzhin dga' ba thob par bya ba'i ched du khyad par can gyi dkyil 'khor brjod do //
T02D1202:190a-14: na yi yig 'bru lte bar dran //
T02D1202:190a-15: da yi yig 'bru ge sar dag / la yi yig 'bru bde ldan no //
T02D1202:190a-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dkyil 'khor la bya ba'i mandala la zhes pas bstan te /
T02D1202:190a-17: shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor ye shes kyi lha dang
T02D1202:190a-18: gzhal yas khang rdzogs pa gdan dang thams cad rdzogs
T02D1202:190a-19: pa ste / de yang 'dab ma la sogs pa
T02D1202:190a-20: ni gnas la rang bzhin dga' bas gtso bo byas
T02D1202:190a-21: pa ste / pa dang / bde ba gzhan rnams 'khor /
T02D1202:190a-22: ma yi yig 'bru rin chen grags //
T02D1202:190a-23: na yi yig 'bru mdud par brjod //
T02D1202:190a-24: da yi yig 'bru ring po'i dngos //
T02D1202:190a-25: la yi yig 'bru khar brjod do //
T02D1202:190a-26: zhes pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzhal yas khang zhes bya ste /
T02D1202:190a-27: dngos su gsad pa'i rin po che dang gsang ba'i
T02D1202:190a-28: rdo rje 'brel ba'i rtsi'i mdud pa dang bcas pa
T02D1202:190a-29: rin po che'i khar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
T02D1202:190a-30: bde ba chen po de shes rab kyis nam mkha'i
T02D1202:190a-31: dbyings nas thabs kyis spyan drangs nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1202:190a-32: bdag gi gzhal yas khang na bzhugs tsam na rang
T02D1202:190a-33: bzhin dga' ba'i ngo bo rdo rje sems dpa' de
T02D1202:190a-34: thabs kyi ye shes kyi lha'o //
T02D1202:190a-35: slar mkha' dbyings su gsol bas shes rab ye shes kyi lha'o //
T02D1202:190a-36: de gnyis 'brel pa'i lha rdo rje sems dpa' yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1202:190a-37: ma yi yig 'bru shu kra'i gzugs //
T02D1202:190a-38: na yi yig 'bru zhu ba'i dngos //
T02D1202:190a-40: la yi yig 'bru bde gzugs so //
T02D1202:190a-42: byang chub kyi sems de rtog pa dang mtshan ma
T02D1202:190a-43: thams cad bcad nas gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1202:190b-0: @190b dga' ba 'od sna tshogs 'phro ba gang yin
T02D1202:190b-1: pa ni bcom ldan 'das yab yum gnyis kyi padma
T02D1202:190b-2: dang / rin po che'i gzhal yas khang na 'od
T02D1202:190b-3: phar 'phro tshur spyon cing bde ba chen po rdo
T02D1202:190b-4: rje sems dpa' gzugs su bzhugs so //
T02D1202:190b-5: ma yi yig 'bru snang zhas grags //
T02D1202:190b-6: na yi yig 'bru snang ba mched //
T02D1202:190b-7: da ni snang ba snang ba thob //
T02D1202:190b-8: la ni yang dag dri med mchog / ces bya ba ni /
T02D1202:190b-9: yang dag dri med 'od rab kyi //
T02D1202:190b-10: gtso bo yi ni rang bzhin byas //
T02D1202:190b-11: gzhan yang snang ba gsum 'khor gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1202:190b-12: 'od rab las ye shes kyi snang ba thob pa spro ba dang /
T02D1202:190b-13: de las yang sngar bzhin snang ba mched pa spro'o ;
T02D1202:190b-14: / de las yang ye shes kyi ngo bo snang
T02D1202:190b-15: ba mched pa 'phros pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
T02D1202:190b-16: shes gzhal yas khang rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1202:190b-17: de nas yang rim gyis yang dag dri med bsdus
T02D1202:190b-18: la thams cad kyi ngo bo 'od rab la gnas
T02D1202:190b-19: pa la ni dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
T02D1202:190b-20: ma yi yig 'bru dga' bar grags //
T02D1202:190b-21: na yi yig 'bru mchog tu dran //
T02D1202:190b-22: da yi yig 'bru chad pa'i dga' //
T02D1202:190b-23: la ni rang bzhin dran pa'o //
T02D1202:190b-24: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor dga' ba rnams su yang bshad de /
T02D1202:190b-28: bsdu ba rnams sngar bstan pa yin no //
T02D1202:190b-29: 'dir shes rab ma dang ldan pa la sogs pas ni dga' ba dang /
T02D1202:190b-30: thabs dang shes rab lha ru gnas pa mchog /
T02D1202:190b-31: rdo rje dang dril bu gnyis dbyer mi phyed par
T02D1202:190b-32: sbyor ba chad pa'i dga' ba /
T02D1202:190b-33: mtshan ma dang rtog pa thams cad spangs nas nam mkha' bzhin gnas pa ni rang bzhin no //
T02D1202:190b-34: yang na bde ba chen po zhu ba la sogs pa 'am /
T02D1202:190b-35: lte ba nas mdud pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1202:190b-36: de yang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1202:190b-37: ngo bo ni rang bzhin dga' ba zhes gsungs so
T02D1202:190b-39: na yi yig 'bru chu zhes bstan //
T02D1202:190b-40: da yi yig 'bru yis ni me //
T02D1202:190b-41: la yi yig 'bru rlung gi gzugs //
T02D1202:190b-42: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems ni sra ba'i chos can te /
T02D1202:190b-44: de yang chub yis bsdus pas so //
T02D1202:190b-48: yang na ye shes kyi rlung gis khyab nas gnas pa la ni /
T02D1202:191a-2: yang na khyab pa'i phyi ru dran //
T02D1202:191a-4: rang bzhin dga' ba la yig 'bru'i bdag nyid gang
T02D1202:191a-5: yin pa de ni rtags dang mtshan ma thams cad
T02D1202:191a-6: spangs nas gnas bya ba dang /
T02D1202:191a-7: rlung g-yo ba gnyis mi 'gal lam zhe na /
T02D1202:191a-9: dang po bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo nas byang chub kyi sems g-yo bar byed la /
T02D1202:191a-10: rlung gis g-yo ba yang mi 'gal la //
T02D1202:191a-11: de yang rgyu yin pa dang rang bzhin dang bde chen du sbyar ba yang yin la /
T02D1202:191a-12: der ma zad de rang bzhin dga' ba las dga' ba gzhan rnams g-yo bar byed pa dang /
T02D1202:191a-13: rang bzhin dga' ba dang ldan pa'i rlung la g-yo
T02D1202:191a-14: ba zhes ma btags na sa rdo bzhin gnas pa'am
T02D1202:191a-15: / stong pa phyogs gcig par yang 'gyur ro //
T02D1202:191a-16: de'i phyir rang bzhin dga' ba la rlung du bshad do //
T02D1202:191a-17: rlung ni ye shes kyi rlung zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan no //
T02D1202:191a-18: de ltar rgyud phyi ma'i le'u brgyad pa las kyang gsungs so //
T02D1202:191a-19: rlung ni ye shes yin pa ste //
T02D1202:191a-20: ye shes nam mkha' yin pa ste //
T02D1202:191a-21: nam mkha' stong par bstan pa'o //
T02D1202:191a-22: stong pa las ni thams cad 'byung //
T02D1202:191a-24: des na ye shes rnyed pa'i phyir //
T02D1202:191a-25: bde ba yi ni chen po len //
T02D1202:191a-26: ye shes ngo bo bde ba che //
T02D1202:191a-27: dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag bzhugs //
T02D1202:191a-28: zhes gsungs te rang bzhin dga' ba spros pa thams
T02D1202:191a-29: cad dang bral ba'i ye shes chen po ni de
T02D1202:191a-30: las gzhan pa'i bde ba sus kyang ni rnyed pa
T02D1202:191a-31: ste // 'di kho na nyid yang dag pa ma nor ba /
T02D1202:191a-32: gting dpag dka' ba skye 'gag med //
T02D1202:191a-33: nam mkha' dang 'dra rang bzhin dga' //
T02D1202:191a-34: de kho na nyid ces bya'o //
T02D1202:191a-35: dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rin chen gtso //
T02D1202:191a-36: thig le'i ngo bo yi ge bral //
T02D1202:191a-38: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rigs kyi bdag po'am //
T02D1202:191a-39: gtso bo ni 'ong rab de yin la yi ge
T02D1202:191a-40: la sogs pa'i chos thams cad dang bral ba'i rdo
T02D1202:191a-41: rje sems dpa' ni dkyil 'khor bdag po yin no
T02D1202:191a-42: // de ltar yin pa'i phyir 'di na mar rnam
T02D1202:191a-43: pa thams cad rnam med ces bya ba la sogs
T02D1202:191a-45: bdag 'dzin pa ni nyon mongs che //
T02D1202:191a-46: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lta ba ngan pa'i phyogs dgag pa'o //
T02D1202:191b-0: de yang nyan thos pa'i lta ba dang @191b mu
T02D1202:191b-1: stegs bye brag pa la khyad chung bas de rnams
T02D1202:191b-2: spangs nas bzang bar bstan pa dang /
T02D1202:191b-3: de yang dag par smad na ngan pas so //
T02D1202:191b-4: kun rdzob kyi thabs kyis zin par bya'o //
T02D1202:191b-5: de bzhin du don gyi zhe ka nas mi smad la /
T02D1202:191b-6: 'jig rten pa'i lta ba dang cha mthun pas mchod kyang mi mchod do //
T02D1202:191b-7: phyi yi 'phar ma gcig gnas su //
T02D1202:191b-8: zhes pa ni 'phar ma gnyis yod pa'i phyi'i rim na gnas pa'o //
T02D1202:191b-10: zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi gnas na bzhugs pa rnams te /
T02D1202:191b-11: rnal 'byor ma bcu drug gis zhes so //
T02D1202:191b-12: rtag tu me tog spos la sogs //
T02D1202:191b-13: zhes pa ni mchod pa'i rdzas me tog dang /
T02D1202:191b-17: lha bshos la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams dang bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'o //
T02D1202:191b-18: sngags 'di yis ni mchod par bya //
T02D1202:191b-19: zhes pa ni shes rab dang snying rjer ldan pa'i sgo nas me tog la sogs pa'i sngags 'di'o //
T02D1202:191b-20: aom ni dang po h'um phat mthar //
T02D1202:191b-21: bar du ming ni spel bar bya //
T02D1202:191b-23: bar du a'a li gzhug pa ni rnal 'byor ma'i ming ste /
T02D1202:191b-26: dh'u pe la sogs pas mchod pa'i mchod pas mchod do //
T02D1202:191b-27: sna tshogs lnga yi mchod sbyin gyis //
T02D1202:191b-28: zhes pa ni go sla bas bdag gis ma bshad do //
T02D1202:191b-29: dkyil 'khor pa la rab tu mchod //
T02D1202:191b-30: ces bya ba ni sngar smos pa'i gtso bo dang
T02D1202:191b-31: 'khor du bcas pa la phyi nang la sogs pas
T02D1202:191b-33: mchod pa byas nas rab tu 'grub //
T02D1202:191b-34: ces pa ni yon tan gyis bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /
T02D1202:191b-35: ye shes kyi tshogs la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1202:191b-36: rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u bcu pa'i dka' ba bkral ba'o /
T02D1202:191b-38: // / der sku brgyad dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan nas /
T02D1202:191b-39: da ni 'dir sngags kyi bzla ba tsam zhig bshad do //
T02D1202:191b-40: mchod sbyin ni dpal dga' ba'i me tog las shes par bya'o //
T02D1202:191b-41: dga' ba la sogs pa las byung //
T02D1202:191b-42: zhes pa ni dga' ba dang mchog gi dga' ba dang /
T02D1202:191b-44: rang bzhin dga' ba'i nang nas sngags byung ngo //
T02D1202:191b-45: yang na dga' ba gsum pos rgyu byas nas byung ba'o //
T02D1202:192a-3: srub pa dang ni bsrub pa'i sngags //
T02D1202:192a-4: zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba ni zlos pa ste /
T02D1202:192a-5: de yang 'di na mar sngags kyi ngo bo bstan pas 'bras bu rnyed pa'o //
T02D1202:192a-6: sngags ni bdud rtsi bstan pa'o //
T02D1202:192a-7: zhes pa ni a'a li k'a li rgyu byang chub sems kyi bdud rtsi ste /
T02D1202:192a-8: des ni ming dang rgyu bstan to //
T02D1202:192a-9: lam gyi thar pa de ni sngags //
T02D1202:192a-10: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo nas chad pa'i bar ni lam yin no //
T02D1202:192a-11: rang bzhin dga' ba shes rab dang snying rje chen
T02D1202:192a-12: po dbyer med pa ni thar pa chen po yin
T02D1202:192a-14: de ni sngags thams cad kyi 'bras bu'o //
T02D1202:192a-15: tshig rgyas pa ni de bzhin no //
T02D1202:192a-16: zhes pa ni nor bu'i mtha' rgyas pa ni lus
T02D1202:192a-17: thams cad bde ba chen pos rgyas pa ni rang
T02D1202:192a-19: phrag pa gnyis kyi dbus na gnas //
T02D1202:192a-20: zhes pa ni shes rab dang thabs kyi sbyor ba'i
T02D1202:192a-21: dus su bo la dang kakko la phrad pas nyi
T02D1202:192a-22: ma dang zla ba'i dus zhes brjod do //
T02D1202:192a-23: de ni don dam pa yi sngags //
T02D1202:192a-24: zhes bya ba de ni tshig dang yi ges brjod par mi nus pa ste /
T02D1202:192a-25: mchog gi dga' ba yang ma yin /
T02D1202:192a-27: mchog dang chad pa gnyis ka dang bral ba'i rang bzhin gsal ba'o //
T02D1202:192a-28: sngags ni a'a li k'a li yin ;
T02D1202:192a-29: / zhes pa ni a'a li bcu drug dang /
T02D1202:192a-30: k'a li sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis ni ngo bor
T02D1202:192a-31: snang ba la mtshan brjod nas byang chub kyi sems
T02D1202:192a-32: thabs dang shes rab tu dbye /
T02D1202:192a-33: brjod pa de ni bzlas pa'o //
T02D1202:192a-34: zhes pa ni sngags sngar gyi kun gyi mtshan nyid brjod par byas pa'o //
T02D1202:192a-35: des ni bzlas pa bstan to //
T02D1202:192a-37: bskyed dang bzlas pa'i bye brag tu //
T02D1202:192a-38: sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu grags //
T02D1202:192a-39: zhes pas bzlas pa bstan te /
T02D1202:192a-40: dga' ba'i rim pa gsum du bskyed pa dang /
T02D1202:192a-41: yang slar gsum du rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1202:192a-42: de gnyis kyi bye brag las rang bzhin gyi sngags 'byung ba ni don dam pa'i bzlas pa ste /
T02D1202:192a-43: de kho na nyid kyi sngags bzlas pa'o //
T02D1202:192a-44: gang du ske dang rkan ni gnyis //
T02D1202:192a-45: bskyod pa gang du mi 'byung ba //
T02D1202:192a-46: zhes pa ni dbugs mi rgyu ba ni rdo rje'i
T02D1202:192a-47: ske mdud pa'i gnas nas padma'i bar gyi rkan gyi
T02D1202:192a-48: mgul par gnas te yod pa'o //
T02D1202:192b-0: srog gi rtsa yi nang @192b yod pa ;
T02D1202:192b-1: / zhes pa ni srog pa rtsa'i nang na a'a
T02D1202:192b-2: li la sogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo
T02D1202:192b-3: bo yod pas na tshangs pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1202:192b-4: lugs dang lugs min rgyun mi 'chad //
T02D1202:192b-5: ces pa ni shel gyi phreng ba lugs su thur la drangs la bzlas pa dang /
T02D1202:192b-6: gyang la slar la bzlog cing drangs la sngags bzlas so //
T02D1202:192b-7: thig le gsum yig gsum dag la //
T02D1202:192b-8: zhes pa ni dga' ba thig le gsum gyis lugs su 'byung /
T02D1202:192b-9: rdzogs pa gsum gyis dga' ba gsum dag par byed pa'o //
T02D1202:192b-10: rang 'od ma bcos brjod par bya //
T02D1202:192b-11: zhes pa ni las kyi phyag rgya la sogs spangs la bdag nyid kyis bzlas brjod bya'i //
T02D1202:192b-12: rkyen la rag ma lus par bya'o //
T02D1202:192b-14: shes rab dang bral ba la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1202:192b-15: dper na ma he sa steng mnyam pa lta bu'o //
T02D1202:192b-16: rkan gyi nang du lce bcug pa //
T02D1202:192b-17: zhes bya ba ni lce rdo rje dang rkan padma
T02D1202:192b-18: gnyis shes rab dang thabs kyi sbyor bas ni ye
T02D1202:192b-19: shes kyi me 'bar bas bde chen las byang chub
T02D1202:192b-21: ro ma yis ni mnan par bya //
T02D1202:192b-22: zhes bya ba ni lce ste des mnan cing sbyar ba ste /
T02D1202:192b-23: slob dpon chen po gsung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1202:192b-24: yang na rtse mo'i cha'i reg bya //
T02D1202:192b-26: lce rtse la ram bsams la de las me mtshon
T02D1202:192b-27: gang pa tsam zhig 'bar bas rkan gyi nang nas
T02D1202:192b-28: 'bar bar bsgoms pas bde ba nyams su myong ba
T02D1202:192b-29: yin / mnyam sbyor rnam pa'i bsam gtan gyis //
T02D1202:192b-31: de lta bu'i bsam gtan la sems rtse gcig tu dus rtag tu gnas pa'o //
T02D1202:192b-32: grags pa med pa bdud rtsi bzhin //
T02D1202:192b-33: zhes pa ni yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'di ni ma rig pa dang /
T02D1202:192b-34: nyon mongs pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi rtsir gyur pa ste /
T02D1202:192b-35: tshig dang yi ges brjod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1202:192b-37: zhes bya ba ni ye shes de las rang bzhin
T02D1202:192b-38: gyis dga' ba dri ma thams cad dang bral bar
T02D1202:192b-39: 'byung ba'o // rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u bcu gcig pa'i dka' ba bkral ba'o /
T02D1202:192b-41: // /'di ltar mchod pa'i rim pa bstan pa las byung ba ni /
T02D1202:192b-42: g-yas g-yon yan lag gnyis su ni //
T02D1202:193a-1: pa ni byang chub kyi sems thur du 'byung ba ni g-yon nas mar 'bab /
T02D1202:193a-2: gyen du g-yas nas ldog pa gnyis las 'byung ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1202:193a-3: khu ba yi ni 'byung bar dran //
T02D1202:193a-5: gcig gnas gcig tu thig le re re 'byung bas bco lnga 'bab pa'o //
T02D1202:193a-6: bcu drug pa 'pho ba dang 'gro ba las grol ba'o //
T02D1202:193a-7: mar ngo de bzhin yar ngo yi //
T02D1202:193a-8: bzlog pa yis ni 'byung ba'i tshe //
T02D1202:193a-9: zhes bya ba ni khu ba dang bde ba shal
T02D1202:193a-10: dang ga bur gnyis shes rab dang thabs sbyor ba
T02D1202:193a-11: las 'byung ba'i bde ba chen po ste rtogs par
T02D1202:193a-12: dka'o // bcu dang lnga yi gnyis med sbyor //
T02D1202:193a-13: zhes pa ni tshes bco lnga'i bdag nyid ye shes
T02D1202:193a-14: bco lnga la bde ba'i byang chub kyi sems dang
T02D1202:193a-15: gnyis kyi bye brag spangs pa'o //
T02D1202:193a-17: zhes pa ni 'di kho na las 'byung ste /
T02D1202:193a-18: bco lnga'i ye shes las 'byung ba'o //
T02D1202:193a-19: de yang gzhan las mi 'byung ba dang /
T02D1202:193a-20: de las logs na med par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1202:193a-21: de nyid gsum shes bcu dang ldan //
T02D1202:193a-22: shes rab dang bral bde ba che //
T02D1202:193a-26: chad pa'i dga' ba gsum ma nor par rtogs pas bco lnga po yang rtogs pa yin la /
T02D1202:193a-27: dga' ba gsum dang bco lnga'i rang bzhin gang gsal
T02D1202:193a-28: ba ni shes rab rigs thams cad dang bral ba'i
T02D1202:193a-29: bde ba'o // gzhan dag na re char yang thig
T02D1202:193a-30: le gsum la ni de nyid gsum zhes bshad la
T02D1202:193a-31: bde ba'o // / de rnams shes pa ni ye shes bco lnga ste /
T02D1202:193a-32: bco lnga las logs na shes rab dang thabs gnyis
T02D1202:193a-33: dang bral ba'i bde ba chen po med do zhes
T02D1202:193a-34: zer ro // 'di lta bu'i dga' ba'i don rang
T02D1202:193a-35: bzhin dga' ba bcu drug gi cha yod med gnyis
T02D1202:193a-36: las grol ba de ni bla ma las thob par
T02D1202:193a-37: zer ro // bya ba'i phyir / bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis //
T02D1202:193a-38: gnyis su med pa'i bde ye shes //
T02D1202:193a-40: thabs dang shes rab la sogs pa'i gnyis dang bral
T02D1202:193a-41: ba'i bde ba chen po 'od rab de ni bla
T02D1202:193a-43: rtag tu goms pa yis ni shar //
T02D1202:193a-44: zhes bya ba ni bla mas dbang gi rim pa
T02D1202:193a-45: bskur bas ye shes nyams su myong ba la yang
T02D1202:193b-0: dang yang dris shing goms pas rang bzhin @193b dga'
T02D1202:193b-1: ba shar ba'o // bsam gtan gyis ni shes pa'o //
T02D1202:193b-2: zhes pa ni bsgoms pas rtogs kyi brjod pas rang bzhin dga' ba rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1202:193b-3: bcu drug gi ni ye ge'i gzugs //
T02D1202:193b-4: zhes pa ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin a'a li'i ngo bo g-yon du 'bab pa'o //
T02D1202:193b-6: a'a li'i thig le rang ngo bo //
T02D1202:193b-8: a'a li'i ye shes bde bdag nyid //
T02D1202:193b-10: de yang bde ba'i thig le bcu drug grangs kyi char yang dang /
T02D1202:193b-11: don gyi char yang ni shes rab ye shes bde
T02D1202:193b-12: ba 'byung ba'i rgyu grangs kun rdzob las don 'bras
T02D1202:193b-13: bu rnyed pa'o // ka sogs yig 'bru'i char yang 'byung //
T02D1202:193b-14: zhes bya ba ni thabs kyi rang bzhin k'a li'i
T02D1202:193b-15: g-yas nas 'bab pa khu ba'i ngo bo thig le
T02D1202:193b-16: bcu drug kun rdzob las don dam pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1202:193b-17: no // k'a li'i ye shes bde ba che ni
T02D1202:193b-18: mchog gi ye shes su bstan pas chad pa'i ye
T02D1202:193b-20: a'a li k'a li gnyis sbyor las //
T02D1202:193b-21: zhes bya ba ni thabs las shes rab gnyis kyis mtshon nas gzhan rnams kyang mtshon zhes te /
T02D1202:193b-23: mchod sbyin gyi ni rab mchog bya //
T02D1202:193b-24: zhes pas ni mchod sbyin thams cad kyi mchog ni mchod pa 'di rnams yin no //
T02D1202:193b-25: de bas mchod pa yin de bzhin no //
T02D1202:193b-27: gsang ba'i padma'i snying gar ro //
T02D1202:193b-28: zhes pa ni 'khor lo rnams sam /
T02D1202:193b-29: yang na dga' ba'i pho brang la sogs pa'i lte bar ro //
T02D1202:193b-30: gsang ba'i de nyid gsum zhes bya //
T02D1202:193b-31: zhes pa ni rlag pa la sogs pa gsum ni
T02D1202:193b-32: sku gsum du bstan pa la gsang ba zhes bya'o
T02D1202:193b-33: // rlag dang longs spyod sogs bye brag / ces
T02D1202:193b-34: pa ni shes rab dang thabs sbyor ba'i rdo rje
T02D1202:193b-35: dang padma phrad pa ni mchod sbyin gyi skabs su
T02D1202:193b-36: rlag pa la sogs pa la ni mchod pa zhes
T02D1202:193b-37: // bya ba ste / padma'i gnas kyi pho brang
T02D1202:193b-38: rnams na ri bong can gnas pa'i rtse na yang
T02D1202:193b-40: rlag pa dang ni longs spyod dbang //
T02D1202:193b-41: zhes pa ni mchod pa dngos yin par bstan pa'o //
T02D1202:193b-42: dga' ba gsum du bstan pa'o //
T02D1202:194a-0: zhes pa ni rlag pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa ni dga' ba dang mchog @194a * //
T02D1202:194a-1: dga' dang chad dga' gsum mo zhes so //
T02D1202:194a-2: de ni thig le gsum zhes bya //
T02D1202:194a-3: zhes pa ni dga' ba'i thig le dang /
T02D1202:194a-6: sku gsum yig gsum bdag nyid do //
T02D1202:194a-7: zhes pa ni chos kyi sku dang /
T02D1202:194a-8: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang ;
T02D1202:194a-10: aom a'a: h'um gi rang bzhin gyi mchod pa'o //
T02D1202:194a-11: tshangs pa'i bu ga de bzhin sker //
T02D1202:194a-12: snying ga ru ni thig le gsum //
T02D1202:194a-13: zhes pa ni spyi bor sku'i thig le /
T02D1202:194a-14: mgrin par gsung gi thig le /
T02D1202:194a-15: snying gar thugs kyi thig le'i gnas so //
T02D1202:194a-16: yang na rim pa bzhin rlag tshangs pa'i bu ga ste chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1202:194a-17: gzhan gnyis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T02D1202:194a-19: de ni bskyed pa'i rim zhes bya //
T02D1202:194a-20: zhes pas ni 'og ma rnams la ltos nas ltos pa zhes bshad do //
T02D1202:194a-21: mdud pa'i nang ni nam chad do //
T02D1202:194a-22: zhes pa ni des gnas kyi don bstan te /
T02D1202:194a-23: bzlog pa yi ni thig le gsum pa ni chad dga' ru gcig / mngon dga' ru gnyis /
T02D1202:194a-24: dga' ba'i gnas dang gsum las bzlog pa zhe bya ste /
T02D1202:194a-26: gyen du rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni //
T02D1202:194a-27: zhes pas gsal bar bshad do //
T02D1202:194a-28: rgyu 'bras rnam dag bye brag tu //
T02D1202:194a-29: thig le drug ni rab tu grags //
T02D1202:194a-30: zhes pa ni bskyed pa rnams rgyu la /
T02D1202:194a-32: yang na dga' ba'i rim pas rgyu las rang bzhin gyi rim pas 'bras bu ni snga ma dang /
T02D1202:194a-33: phyi ma rnams la yang sbyor //
T02D1202:194a-34: dri med yi shes char yang drug / de ni rnam shes sbyor drug bshad //
T02D1202:194a-35: zhes pa ni bskyed rdzogs kyi thig le drug la rang bzhin gyi char yang drug ste /
T02D1202:194a-36: de la don dam pa'i spros pa dang bral ba'i rang bzhin sbyor ro //
T02D1202:194a-37: sbyor ba la ni rnam par shes //
T02D1202:194a-39: de yi dbus su de nyid zhugs //
T02D1202:194a-40: zhes pa ni sbyor ba drug po de'i dbus su
T02D1202:194a-41: rang bzhin dga' ba bde ba'i dngos po 'di lta
T02D1202:194a-42: bu gnas so // rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u bcu gnyis pa'i dka' ba bkral ba'o /
T02D1202:194a-44: // / rgyud gsum gyi ni rim pa yis //
T02D1202:194a-45: dbang drug re ba bstan pa'o //
T02D1202:194a-46: zhes bya ba ni rgyud la sogs pa phyi ma
T02D1202:194b-0: mthun pa'i rgyud gsum du ni rigs @194b lnga dbang
T02D1202:194b-1: lnga'i thog tu phyir mi ldog par bsnan pas 'bras
T02D1202:194b-3: chu yi dbang bskur dbu rgyan dag / ces pa
T02D1202:194b-4: ni bum pa chu la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis
T02D1202:194b-5: gang ba dang ldan pa ni mi bskyod pa'i 'bras
T02D1202:194b-6: bu'o // dbu rgyan yang gser ram ba so la sogs par 'bur du btod pa'am ;
T02D1202:194b-7: thang ka la sogs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1202:194b-8: bskyed dgug gzhug pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i
T02D1202:194b-9: rin chen 'byung ldan 'bras bu yod pa'o //
T02D1202:194b-10: bya ba'i rgyud las rab tu grags //
T02D1202:194b-11: zhes pa ni dbang gnyis po de bya ba'i sgo na 'jug dngos su grags so //
T02D1202:194b-12: rdo rje dril bu ming gi dbang ;
T02D1202:194b-13: / zhes pa ni rdo rje la snang ba mtha'
T02D1202:194b-14: yas bskyed pa la sogs pa dang 'bras bu yang
T02D1202:194b-15: de bzhin no // dril bu don yod grub pa dang /
T02D1202:194b-16: ming gi rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa'o //
T02D1202:194b-17: spyod pa'i rgyud las rab tu gsal// zhes pa ni
T02D1202:194b-18: gnyis ka'i rgyud de/ lta ba yang lta spyod pa'i
T02D1202:194b-19: bye brag kyang bya ba'i rgyud dang mthun pa'i phyir
T02D1202:194b-20: gsol lo // phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang zhes pa
T02D1202:194b-21: ni bka' stsal pa la sogs pas ni 'bras bu
T02D1202:194b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang ldan pa sngar
T02D1202:194b-23: gsol lo // bzhin no // rnal 'byor rgyud du gsal bar byas //
T02D1202:194b-24: zhes pa ni yo ga ru bzhi po rnams gsal ba ste /
T02D1202:194b-25: de rnams ni thun mong gi dbang du shes so //
T02D1202:194b-26: de ni drug gi bye brag dbang //
T02D1202:194b-27: zhes pa ni chu la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i sgo nas dbye ba'o //
T02D1202:194b-28: yang na sa bon 'debs pa'i dbang ste rgyu'i sgo
T02D1202:194b-29: nas dbye ba ni slob dpon gyi ru grags pa'o
T02D1202:194b-30: // rnal 'byor bla ma'i mtshan zhes pa ni rnal 'byor chen po thabs kyi rgyud kyi ming ngo //
T02D1202:194b-31: gsang ba'i dbang ni dbang rgyal bshad //
T02D1202:194b-32: ces pa ni gsang ba'i phyir na gsang ba ste /
T02D1202:194b-33: ma h'a yo gar grags so //
T02D1202:194b-34: shes rab ye shes bla na med //
T02D1202:194b-35: ces pa ni bla na med pa ni ma rgyud de /
T02D1202:194b-36: de ru shes rab ye shes kyi dbang grags so //
T02D1202:194b-37: bzhi pa ltar na de bzhin no //
T02D1202:194b-38: zhes pa ni gong dbang de rnams kyi khongs nas 'byung ste /
T02D1202:194b-39: char yang bcu drug lta bu'o //
T02D1202:194b-40: dgu yi bye brag dbang la sogs //
T02D1202:194b-42: zhes pa ni chu dang dbu rgyan dang /
T02D1202:195a-1: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang la sogs pa brgyad ni rgyu yin la /
T02D1202:195a-2: dgu ba ni sngar gyi na tshang bar yod pas
T02D1202:195a-3: 'bras bu'i dngos po yang brgyad po na yod la
T02D1202:195a-4: / de bzhin du bzhi pa yang yod pa'o //
T02D1202:195a-5: bzhi ba de ltar de bzhin brjod //
T02D1202:195a-7: shes rab ye shes de yi 'bras //
T02D1202:195a-8: zhes pa ni de'i 'bras bu dbang bzhi pa ste 'di skad ston no //
T02D1202:195a-9: dngos po so sor shes mi bya //
T02D1202:195a-10: zhes pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu gcig po'i bzhi
T02D1202:195a-11: pa la sogs na med pa la de skad bshad
T02D1202:195a-12: do // de ltar zhes ni tshad med do //
T02D1202:195a-13: zhes pha ni bzhi pa la tshad dang rigs pas gzhal bar mi nus par bstan to //
T02D1202:195a-14: de bas 'bras bu'i tshig don ni //
T02D1202:195a-15: rigs pa ma yin pa yi sems //
T02D1202:195a-17: 'bras bu'i ngo bo bzhi pa ni brjod par dka'
T02D1202:195a-18: la rtogs par dka' ba ni rigs pa spangs te
T02D1202:195a-19: ye shes de ni bla ma'i man ngag gis bsgoms
T02D1202:195a-21: de yang 'byung ba dang bral ba'i dngos po ste /
T02D1202:195a-22: gsal bar byed pa'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D1202:195a-23: 'o na chos nyid kyi rang bzhin bzhi pa ni 'byung bar bstan te /
T02D1202:195a-25: 'byung ba med pa'i dngos po yi //
T02D1202:195a-26: zhes pa ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1202:195a-27: bu mo la sogs pa'i dbang gi rim pa las 'byung la /
T02D1202:195a-28: shes rab ye shes las logs na med pa'i phyir mi 'byung ste /
T02D1202:195a-29: de bas na 'di skad ston to //
T02D1202:195a-30: de yang don dam pa'i dngos po bde ba ni 'byung la /
T02D1202:195a-31: kun rdzob kyi dngos po khu ba ni mi 'byung ba la bya yang 'gal ba med do //
T02D1202:195a-32: de bzhin re zhig dga' ba'i rim //
T02D1202:195a-33: ji lta bu'i ni yod par 'gyur //
T02D1202:195a-34: zhes pa ni sdud pa pos dga' ba la sogs pa'i dngos po dang /
T02D1202:195a-39: dga' ba las su grags pa ste //
T02D1202:195a-40: zhes pa la sogs pas ni mchog dga' ba dang /
T02D1202:195a-42: dga' ba la sogs pa ni sems can gyi gnas
T02D1202:195a-43: skabs su lus ngag yid gsum yin pa la bya
T02D1202:195a-44: la / sangs rgyas kyi gnas skabs su sku gsung thugs so //
T02D1202:195a-45: rang bzhin dga' ba de rnams las gzhan du mi rnyed do //
T02D1202:195a-47: sems las gzhan ni yod pa min //
T02D1202:195b-1: sems rang yang ma yin pa de ni rang bzhin dga' ba'o //
T02D1202:195b-2: lus kyi mgo bo'i gnas dga' ba //
T02D1202:195b-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lus kyi dga'
T02D1202:195b-4: ba la sogs pa ni mgo bo la sogs pa'i
T02D1202:195b-5: gnas rnams su shes par bya'o //
T02D1202:195b-6: lus rgyu 'bras bu de ni ngag / ces pa
T02D1202:195b-7: la sogs pas snga ma rnams las phyi ma'i rim
T02D1202:195b-9: de yang yid ches pa'i chad pa'i dga' ba shes
T02D1202:195b-10: rab ye shes kyi dbang gi ngo bo rtogs nas
T02D1202:195b-11: gnas pa la rang bzhin dga' ba zhes bya ste
T02D1202:195b-12: / don dam pa'i ma nor ba'i 'bras bu'o //
T02D1202:195b-14: de nyid gsum bdag ye shes gang //
T02D1202:195b-15: de ni bzhi pa gsum dang bral //
T02D1202:195b-16: zhes pa ni dga' ba gsum po de dbang gsum
T02D1202:195b-17: gyi bdag nyid gang yin pa'i ye shes de ni
T02D1202:195b-18: rang bzhin dga' ba bzhi pa dbang gsum dang brlas
T02D1202:195b-19: ba gsum gyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1202:195b-20: rtsa gsum nang gi dbus na bzhugs //
T02D1202:195b-21: zhes pa ni srog ma'i dngos po'i nang na ling+ga la dang /
T02D1202:195b-24: gsum po'i dbus ni bya gdong ma ste de'i nang na 'bras bu bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1202:195b-25: gnas gsum khyab ma skye ba med //
T02D1202:195b-26: 'od gsum srid pa gsum dang bral //
T02D1202:195b-27: 'od rab gnas ni rab kyi mchog / de ni bzhi pa rab kyi dbang //
T02D1202:195b-31: snying ga gsum du khyab pa'i dbang gsum las byung
T02D1202:195b-32: ba skye ba med pa 'di bde ba gsum dang
T02D1202:195b-33: / khu ba gsum po dang bral ba'i rang bzhin
T02D1202:195b-34: dga' ba'i rnam grang 'od rab kyi gnas gsum po
T02D1202:195b-35: dang mi 'dra ba'i gnas rab ma gnas pa de
T02D1202:195b-37: gzhan dag na re rtsa gsum la ni gnas yin la skye ba med pa bzhi pa'i dbang ngo //
T02D1202:195b-38: 'od la sogs pa ni snang ba dang /
T02D1202:195b-39: snang ba mched pa dang snang ba thob pa dang /
T02D1202:195b-40: la la n'a rlag / ra sa n'as longs spyod /
T02D1202:195b-41: aa wa dh'u t'ir dbang ste /
T02D1202:195b-42: de rnams dang bral ba yang dag dri med sangs
T02D1202:195b-43: rgyas rin po che'i gnas na bzhugs pa dbang bzhi
T02D1202:195b-44: pa'i ngo bo yin zer ro //
T02D1202:195b-45: bdun gnyis bye brag tu ni yod //
T02D1202:195b-46: ces bya ba'i bum pa'i dbang bcu gcig gsang ba'i
T02D1202:196a-0: dbang bcu gnyis shes rab ye shes dang @196a *
T02D1202:196a-1: // bcu gsum de ltar de bzhi pa ste /
T02D1202:196a-2: de ni bcu bzhi pa'i dbang gi bye brag go //
T02D1202:196a-3: de yang rgyu 'bras dang gnas kyi sngo nas bsdus la dbye ste /
T02D1202:196a-4: yan lag rab kyi mdor bsdus pa //
T02D1202:196a-5: zhes bya ba ni lus kyi yan lag dang nyid
T02D1202:196a-6: lag thams cad kyi rab ni mgo bor bsdus pas

T02D1202:196a-8: gsang ba'i dbang bskur mgrin pa ru //
T02D1202:196a-9: mngon par dga' ba bdag nyid mchog / ces pa ni ngag thams cad ske nas 'byung la /
T02D1202:196a-10: der gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas 'bras bu mchog gi dga' ba thob po //
T02D1202:196a-11: shes rab ye shes kyi ni dbang //
T02D1202:196a-12: snying ga ru ni chad bdag nyid //
T02D1202:196a-13: ces pa ni rgyu shes rab ye shes las 'bras bu chad pa'i dga' ba ste /
