T02D1202:196a-15: myong bas rtogs pa la sogs pas gzung 'dzin thams
T02D1202:196a-16: cad chad nas ye shes la gnas pa'o //
T02D1202:196a-17: gsang ba'i padma'i lte ba ru ;
T02D1202:196a-18: / bzhi pa rang bzhin ngo bor grags //
T02D1202:196a-19: zhes pa ni gsang pad sangs rgyas rin po che'i
T02D1202:196a-20: snod kyi dbus su dbang bzhi pa bskur ba'i rang
T02D1202:196a-22: de ltar dbang ni bzhi ru dbye //
T02D1202:196a-23: zhes pa ni rgyu 'bras la sogs pa'i dbang gi
T02D1202:196a-24: dbye ba mdor bsdus pa bzhi ru dbye ba yin
T02D1202:196a-25: no ; / bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs yin no //
T02D1202:196a-26: zhes pa ni de yan chad kyi dbang gcig nas
T02D1202:196a-27: gcig tu ye shes skye bas bskyed pa'i phyogs so
T02D1202:196a-28: // chu yi dbang ni mdoms su ste //
T02D1202:196a-31: sna tshogs 'bras bu sbyin pa yi //
T02D1202:196a-32: zhes pa ni 'o dang 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1202:196a-33: dga' ba sna tshogs kyi 'bras bu dga' ba dang
T02D1202:196a-35: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ster //
T02D1202:196a-36: zhes pa ni gsang ba'i dbang gi 'bras bus sngar
T02D1202:196a-37: gyi dga' bar 'gyur ba las mchog gi dga' ba'o
T02D1202:196a-39: / zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma la sogs pa'i
T02D1202:196a-40: dngos po thams cad bcom nas chad pa'i dga' bar
T02D1202:196a-41: 'gyur ro // de ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang yin la /
T02D1202:196a-42: de nor bu'i khar byang chub kyi sems gsal la /
T02D1202:196b-0: gsal ba 'di rang gi shes rab ma'i mkha' la 'gro ba ni 'di skad @196b brjod do //
T02D1202:196b-2: rlung ma dang ni gnyis skye'i rtsa //
T02D1202:196b-3: gnyis ka rgyas pa yis ni bde //
T02D1202:196b-4: gyen gyi yi ni lam gyis bzlog / ces pa
T02D1202:196b-5: ni rang gi las kyi phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i mkha'
T02D1202:196b-6: padma la byang chub kyi sems kyi dngos po 'gro
T02D1202:196b-7: la / 'gro bas ni thabs kyi rtsa dang shes
T02D1202:196b-8: rab kyi rtsa gnyis ka rgyas pa'i ngo bo las
T02D1202:196b-10: de gyen du thabs kyis drangs pas ni rang bzhin dga' ba'i 'bras bur bstan te /
T02D1202:196b-12: mdud pa yi ni nang nas 'gro / de ltar bzhi pa rab tu grags //
T02D1202:196b-14: mdud pa ni thabs kyi mdud pa'o //
T02D1202:196b-15: nang ni rin po che nor bu'i nang du 'gro ba la grags zhes bya'o //
T02D1202:196b-16: mtshan nyid dang bral 'bral bur grags //
T02D1202:196b-17: zhes pa ni chos thams cad kyang bral ba'i chos thams cad kyi 'bras bur 'dod de //
T02D1202:196b-18: de yang mdud pa'i bya ba nas //
T02D1202:196b-19: dbang gi ye shes nges bstan to //
T02D1202:196b-20: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bzhi pa'i 'bras bu bstan to //
T02D1202:196b-21: 'o na dbang gsum po'i 'bras bu ma bstan nam
T02D1202:196b-22: zhe na 'dir bstan mod kyi thams cad kyi ye
T02D1202:196b-23: shes kyi 'bras bu 'di yin pas na rang bzhin
T02D1202:196b-25: dbang bzhi'i 'bras bu 'di tshol ba las 'bras bu gzhan ni de lta ma yin te /
T02D1202:196b-26: dper na rgyal po'i pho brang bskyod pas 'khor dang ldan nas chas pa bzhin nam /
T02D1202:196b-27: yang na rgyal po spyan 'drangs [*drangs] na 'khor med kyang bsam pa 'grub pa yin no //
T02D1202:196b-28: ye shes de ni rgyud gzhan du ston pas gsal bar ma gsungs te /
T02D1202:196b-29: rdo rje ka p'a de bzhin gsang //
T02D1202:196b-30: zhes pa la sogs pa ni rdo rje ka p'a la'i rgyud la sogs pa ru sbas pa'o //
T02D1202:196b-31: khyod kyi ngor mdzad dbang gi don //
T02D1202:196b-32: zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' lha'i dbang phyug la ngo bo yod par bya ba ste /
T02D1202:196b-33: rgyud gzhan du dbang gi ye shes sbas zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1202:196b-34: khyod kyi ngor mdzad dbang gi dang //
T02D1202:196b-35: rgyud 'di ru ni rab tu gsal //
T02D1202:196b-36: zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' lha'i dbang phyug
T02D1202:196b-37: kho na'i ngor bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad pa'i dbang
T02D1202:196b-38: gi don dpal ye shes thig ler gsal bar gsungs
T02D1202:196b-39: so // tshad ma shes dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snod ngan par bstan te /
T02D1202:196b-40: yang dag lam shes slob dpon gyis //
T02D1202:197a-1: pa ni don dam pa'i lam shes pa'i bla ma
T02D1202:197a-2: gong ma'i skal ba dang mi ldan pa la mi
T02D1202:197a-4: aa'i yig 'brus zhes pa la sogs pa'i dngos pos ni dbang bstan te /
T02D1202:197a-5: aa bhi she ka zhes pa ni dbang ngo //
T02D1202:197a-6: de yang dbang gi rgyu byas pas 'bras bu dga'
T02D1202:197a-7: ba la sogs pa'i ye shes su 'di nas mar
T02D1202:197a-8: 'byung ste bdag gis ni ma bshad /
T02D1202:197a-9: rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u bcu gsum pa'i dka' ba bkral ba'o /
T02D1202:197a-11: // / de nas yang ni bshad bya ba //
T02D1202:197a-12: zhes ba ni dbang bstan nas bar mchad par nang la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg bshad do ;
T02D1202:197a-13: / nang gi mtshan nyid sbyin sreg go //
T02D1202:197a-14: zhes pa ni nang dang gsang ba la sogs pa las 'dir nang kho na bstan pa'o //
T02D1202:197a-15: kha ni hom khung zhes pa ste /
T02D1202:197a-16: sngar zas bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1202:197a-17: bsang gtor dang rdzas kyi rnam pa 'og nas mar bstan to //
T02D1202:197a-19: phrag dog la sogs bsang gtor bya //
T02D1202:197a-21: dum bu gsum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1202:197a-22: nang dang gsang ba la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs
T02D1202:197a-23: pa ste / bdud rtsi mchog ni zhu bar byed / ces pa'i bar gyis so //
T02D1202:197a-24: gsang ba'i sbyin sreg la las kyi phyag rgyal brten pa dang /
T02D1202:197a-25: dam tshig gi phyag rgyal brten pa dang /
T02D1202:197a-26: ye shes kyi phyag rgya la brten pa'i sbyin sreg
T02D1202:197a-27: las don dam pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i 'bras bu
T02D1202:197a-28: 'thob bo // rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u bcu bzhi pa'i dkar ba bkral ba'o /
T02D1202:197a-30: // / de nas gtor ma chen po'i las kyi nges
T02D1202:197a-31: par bstan pa'i don bshad do zhes pa ni bde
T02D1202:197a-32: ba chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi rtog pa
T02D1202:197a-33: la sogs pa bsad pa'i rdzas rnams dga' ba la
T02D1202:197a-34: sogs pa'i sbyor ba sbyin gyis brlabs te chad pa'i
T02D1202:197a-35: dga' bar rdzas tshogs par bdud rtsir gyur te /
T02D1202:197a-36: sems can thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir gnas dur khrod
T02D1202:197a-37: chen po mtshan mo shi ba dbugs dang bral ba'i
T02D1202:197a-38: bde ba'i ro dang ldan pa'am /
T02D1202:197a-39: yang na chu bo chen po rnam par dga' ba'i ngogs srog gi rtsa'i gnas /
T02D1202:197a-40: rin po che'i khar byang chub sems kyi rgyun mi 'chad pa'i gnas su gtsang ngo //
T02D1202:197a-41: des ni bar chad byed pa'i 'byung po la sogs
T02D1202:197b-0: pa @197b thams cad zhi nas khams gsum gyi sems
T02D1202:197b-1: can rnams bar chad mi 'byung bar tshogs gnyis mchog
T02D1202:197b-2: dang chad dgar rdzogs nas bde ba chen po'i ye
T02D1202:197b-3: shes kyis padma'i snod dum bu gcig pa shin tu
T02D1202:197b-4: rgya chen ba'i nang du gang ngo //
T02D1202:197b-5: de yang he ru kar rnal 'byor pa bsams la
T02D1202:197b-6: ye shes kyi phyag rgya bca' mthe'u chung lu gu
T02D1202:197b-7: rgyud du sbrel mdzub mo gyen du 'greng bar ma
T02D1202:197b-8: sbyar la gtang ba'i sngags ni ba le ma dang
T02D1202:197b-9: has gtang ngo // de lta bu'i gtor mas 'khor
T02D1202:197b-10: ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su med
T02D1202:197b-12: rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u bco lnga ba'i dka' ba bkral ba'o /
T02D1202:197b-14: // / bsdus pa'i nges pa'i don rnams gsungs pa'i rting
T02D1202:197b-15: la ni de nas bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya
T02D1202:197b-17: sdar zhus pa'i bshad zin par dngos nas bcom ldan
T02D1202:197b-18: mo the tshom mchod nas sdud pa po la bos
T02D1202:197b-19: nas bskul ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
T02D1202:197b-20: po lha'i dbang phyug bos te zhes pa ni 'khor
T02D1202:197b-21: bye brag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi nang nas sprul
T02D1202:197b-22: pa'i sku byang chub sems dpa' lha'i dbang phyug la
T02D1202:197b-24: bdag gi the tshom sol cig bya'o //
T02D1202:197b-25: de yang kye dpa' bo chen po lha'i dbang phyug
T02D1202:197b-26: ces te snyan cing dgyes pa'i sgo nas bos so
T02D1202:197b-27: // de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi
T02D1202:197b-28: dang nges par bstan pa zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D1202:197b-29: mi zhu ba 'am ci zhes pa ni bcom ldan
T02D1202:197b-30: 'das ma le'u dang por de kho na la sogs
T02D1202:197b-31: pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa skabs 'dir nges
T02D1202:197b-32: don zhu bar rigs so zhes bya'o //
T02D1202:197b-33: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa zhes pa ni slar bcom ldan 'das la dgyes nas gsol pa'o //
T02D1202:197b-34: mchog gi dbang phyug ma zhes pa nas nam mkha'i
T02D1202:197b-35: mtha' legs so legs so zhes pa lha'i dbang phyug
T02D1202:197b-36: gi tshig ste / yon tan thams cad kyis bstod nas rjes su yi rang ngo zhes pa'o //
T02D1202:197b-37: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
T02D1202:197b-38: pa ni sprul pa'i sku sa bcu pa'i dbang phyug
T02D1202:197b-39: gis so // bcom ldan 'das mos khong du chud
T02D1202:197b-40: pas zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das mos ni lha'i
T02D1202:198a-0: dbang phyug gis khong du chud cing @198a * //
T02D1202:198a-1: shes par bya ba'i don du ni 'di skad bshad do //
T02D1202:198a-2: dga' ba chen po sems kyis zhes pa ni shes
T02D1202:198a-3: pa'i dbang gis dga' ba bde ba'i bdag nyid kyis
T02D1202:198a-4: sprul pa mang po dgye ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1202:198a-6: rmad du byung ba sprul te zhes pa ni lha'i
T02D1202:198a-7: dbang phyug gis 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs
T02D1202:198a-8: pas gang ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang de re re las
T02D1202:198a-9: mchod pa'i lha mo dpag tu med pa sprul pa'i
T02D1202:198a-10: cho 'phrul dang / de rnams thams cad kyi phyag
T02D1202:198a-11: na padma dang ku mu ta'i rang bzhin zla ba
T02D1202:198a-12: dang nyi ma'i me tog la sogs pa'i rmad du
T02D1202:198a-13: byung ba mang po sprul pa'i mchod rdzas so //
T02D1202:198a-14: rnam pa du ma tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i mchod sbyin
T02D1202:198a-15: byas nas zhes pa ni lha dang lha mo dang
T02D1202:198a-16: me tog la sogs pa'i rnam pa thams cad 'tshogs
T02D1202:198a-17: nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba la
T02D1202:198a-18: sogs pas dgyes pa byas nas so //
T02D1202:198a-19: sngar gyi dris pa zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das mos dris pa'o //
T02D1202:198a-20: zhus so zhes pa ni lha'i dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das ye shes thig le la zhus pa'o //
T02D1202:198a-21: bcom ldan 'das ni ston pa ste /
T02D1202:198a-22: bdud bcom pa dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1202:198a-23: de kho na nyid la sogs pa nges pa'i don zhus pa ste /
T02D1202:198a-24: bka' stsal du gsol zhes pa'i tshig rnams so //
T02D1202:198a-25: nyon cig bdag gis rab tu bshad //
T02D1202:198a-26: ces pa ni lha'i dbang phyug la sogs pa'i 'khor
T02D1202:198a-27: gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems ma yengs
T02D1202:198a-29: ston pa po bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bshad pa ste /
T02D1202:198a-30: 'khor rnams kyi nang du dam bcas pa'i tshig tu gsal ba'o //
T02D1202:198a-31: mtshan nyid las skyes kho na nyid //
T02D1202:198a-32: ces pa ni chos thams cad kyi chos nyid las skyes pa ni de kho na nyid do //
T02D1202:198a-33: de ltar min na zhes pa ni chos nyid las
T02D1202:198a-34: skye ba nyid las skye ba bde ba'i ngo bo
T02D1202:198a-35: ste de'i phyir mi mthun no zhes so //
T02D1202:198a-36: de yang kun rdzob tu brjod pa dang mi mthun bshad do //
T02D1202:198a-38: rang rig pa yi bdag nyid phyir //
T02D1202:198a-39: de bas brjod par mi nus so //
T02D1202:198a-40: zhes pa ni chos nyid spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i rang rig pa yin la /
T02D1202:198a-41: de la brjod pa'i tshig dang yi ges thog tu
T02D1202:198a-42: mi phebs te de'i phyir kun rdzob tsam du brten
T02D1202:198a-43: la brjod do // de kho na'i bdag nyid gsum
T02D1202:198b-0: de snang ba zhes bya ba la @198b sogs pas
T02D1202:198b-1: la brjod do // bstan te / ye shes gsal
T02D1202:198b-2: ba dang shin tu gsal ba dang de yang bdag
T02D1202:198b-3: nyid kyi dbang du 'dus nas thob pa dang /
T02D1202:198b-4: ye shes dus rtag tu yang dag pa'i 'od dang
T02D1202:198b-5: ldan nas gnas pa de dpe don gnyis ka'i sgo
T02D1202:198b-8: de ni gnas mchog ye shes te //
T02D1202:198b-9: zhes bya ba ni ye shes thams cad kyi mchog
T02D1202:198b-10: gi rang bzhin dga' ba'i ye shes su bshad pa
T02D1202:198b-12: blta bar dka' ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1202:198b-14: dpyad pas mi rnyed pa bltas pas mi mthong ba'i
T02D1202:198b-15: ngo bo 'di bsgoms kyang rnyed pa ma yin no
T02D1202:198b-16: // de ni 'di nas mar rgyas par bshad do //
T02D1202:198b-17: char yang dang ni thig le'i tshul //
T02D1202:198b-18: de nyid gsum bdag brjod pa'o //
T02D1202:198b-19: 'khor lo gsum yod me rlung chu //
T02D1202:198b-20: dngos po 'du shes rang ngo bo //
T02D1202:198b-21: zhes bya ba ni gsang bar rlung dang rtsa ru
T02D1202:198b-22: ldan pa'i rlung gi 'khor lo'i gnas su char yang
T02D1202:198b-23: gnas pa'o ; / de'i steng lte bar me'i 'khor
T02D1202:198b-24: lo'i gnas su thig le gnas pa sprul pa'i 'khor
T02D1202:198b-25: lo byung ba chu'i gnas su tshul brten pa'o //
T02D1202:198b-26: de gsum dang snang ba zhes bya ba'i dngos po'i dga' ba rang gi ngo bo ru gnas pa'o //
T02D1202:198b-27: de kho na nyid gsum du bstan pa'o //
T02D1202:198b-28: tshul tsam zla ba yin te ;
T02D1202:198b-29: sa yi 'khor lo de ni mchog / de ni rten gyi 'du shes te //
T02D1202:198b-30: lha yi dbang phyug shes par bya //
T02D1202:198b-31: zhes pa ni 'byung ba sa'i rang bzhin snying gar
T02D1202:198b-32: chos kyi 'khor lo la brten pa'i tshul tsam dri
T02D1202:198b-33: ma dang bral nas gnas pa ste /
T02D1202:198b-34: snang ba mched pa'i rang bzhin bsten //
T02D1202:198b-35: zhes pa'i mchog gi dga' ba la ni zla ba
T02D1202:198b-36: bde ba mchog / ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bos
T02D1202:198b-37: nas bstan pa shes par gyis zhes so //
T02D1202:198b-38: phyag rgya chen po 'dir ni mchog / nam mkha' ye shes 'du shes so //
T02D1202:198b-39: zhes pa ni 'byung ba nam mkha'i rang bzhin sker
T02D1202:198b-40: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo'i gnas su mchog gnas
T02D1202:198b-41: te / snang ba thob pa'i rang bzhin ye shes zhes bya ba'i chad pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1202:198b-42: de la ni phyag rgya chen po zhes bya'o //
T02D1202:198b-43: de yi mtha' ni gzhan gyi mchog / bde chen mchog gi nam mkhar ro //
T02D1202:198b-44: de ni rnal 'byor ngo bor grags //
T02D1202:199a-0: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes @199a * //
T02D1202:199a-2: / ces bya ba ni 'byung ba gzhan gyi nam
T02D1202:199a-3: mkha'i rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo rtsa
T02D1202:199a-4: sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa'i gnas na gzhan mchog
T02D1202:199a-5: chos nyid dang 'dra ba'i gnas so //
T02D1202:199a-6: der 'od rab kyi rnag bzhin rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i rang bzhin dga' ba /
T02D1202:199a-8: chad pa'i dga' ba gnyis su med pa'o //
T02D1202:199a-9: de la ni de'i mtha' zhes bya'o //
T02D1202:199a-10: de ni 'khor lo drug dbus gnas //
T02D1202:199a-11: rnam shes drug gi ngo bo zhes pa ni rlung gi 'khor lo rtsa drug dang /
T02D1202:199a-15: longs spyod kyi 'khor lo dang bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo dang /
T02D1202:199a-16: drug gi dbus na sbyor ba drug gi rnam shes so //
T02D1202:199a-17: dngos po brten la sogs bye brag / ces bya
T02D1202:199a-18: ba ni ye shes dang rnam par 'byed pa bsdus
T02D1202:199a-19: pa'o // bzhir ni dbye bar yod pa'o //
T02D1202:199a-20: zhes pa ni rang bzhin dga' ba la yon tan 'byung bas dngos po'i ye shes dang /
T02D1202:199a-22: ye shes kyi ye shes dang /
T02D1202:199a-23: rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes rnams 'byung ngo //
T02D1202:199a-24: de yang dngos po ni byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ni gnas pa'o //
T02D1202:199a-25: brten ni 'khor lo longs spyod nas mar 'bab pa'i mtha' la brten no //
T02D1202:199a-26: ye shes ni de la kun rdzob dang don dam
T02D1202:199a-27: pa gnyis su shes pa la don dam pa la
T02D1202:199a-29: rnam par 'byed pa ni gnas pa la sogs pa'i ye shes thams cad spangs pa ste /
T02D1202:199a-30: brjod pa dang spyod pa la sogs pa ni rnyed de 'byed pa'o //
T02D1202:199a-31: de nyid gsum bdag bye brag gis //
T02D1202:199a-32: zhes pa la sogs pa ni char yang thig le dang tshul dang gsum du yang dbye'o //
T02D1202:199a-33: de yang kun rdzob kyi sgo nas don dam par brjod do //
T02D1202:199a-34: mtshan mo nyin mo mtshan bral phyir //
T02D1202:199a-35: zhes pa ni mtshan mo ye shes ni zla ba shar ba lta bu ste snang pa'o //
T02D1202:199a-36: nyin mo ni nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i ye
T02D1202:199a-37: shes snang ba chen po mtshams ni nyin mo dang
T02D1202:199a-38: mtshan mo gnyis dang bral ba'i phra zhing bdag med
T02D1202:199a-39: pa srog dang rtsol ba mi rgyu ba /
T02D1202:199a-40: rgyu ba thams cad dang bral ba'i ye shes snang ba thob pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1202:199a-41: de rnams kyang sems dang sems las byung ba dang
T02D1202:199b-0: ma rig pa dang gsum gyi mtshan nyid can @199b
T02D1202:199b-1: te ; de rnams dang bral bas 'od rab ces bya ba la /
T02D1202:199b-2: gcig pu yi ni bde ba che //
T02D1202:199b-4: rang bzhin zhes pa la sogs pa ni gong ma ltar bdag gis ma bshad do //
T02D1202:199b-6: shes par bla mas byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1202:199b-8: bla ma'i zhal nas rnyed par 'gyur ;
T02D1202:199b-9: / zhes pa la sogs pa ni bla mas bstan
T02D1202:199b-10: pas rang bzhin dga' ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub
T02D1202:199b-11: rnyed de / de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin bla ma yin par bstan pa'o //
T02D1202:199b-12: sa bcu yi ni dbang phyug bdag / ces pa
T02D1202:199b-13: la sogs pa ni bla ma de yang sprul pa'i
T02D1202:199b-14: sku sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dper na
T02D1202:199b-15: rgyal po chen po rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug aindra
T02D1202:199b-16: bh'u t'i lta bu'i bla mas slob ma la bstan
T02D1202:199b-17: par sla'o // 'o na sa bcu pa'i byang chub
T02D1202:199b-18: sems dpa' aindra bh'u t'i lta bu kho na las
T02D1202:199b-19: gzhan mas bla ma mi btub po zhe na /
T02D1202:199b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo
T02D1202:199b-22: rje sems dpa' nas rim pas dbang la sogs pa
T02D1202:199b-23: thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas bla ma btub ste mi
T02D1202:199b-26: slob dpon rdo rje'i bcu gcig dbang //
T02D1202:199b-27: gsang ba'i dbang ni bcu gnyis pa //
T02D1202:199b-28: shes rab ye shes bcu gsum ste //
T02D1202:199b-29: de ltar de bzhin bcu bzhi pa'o //
T02D1202:199b-30: dbang re la ni sa re sbyar //
T02D1202:199b-31: de rnams sa yi dbang phyug bdag / ces gsungs so //
T02D1202:199b-32: de'i phyir yang dbang thob pa'i bla ma mi 'gal lo //
T02D1202:199b-33: de ma zad de lung gzhan nas kyang 'byung ste /
T02D1202:199b-34: bum pa'i dbang ni dang po ste //
T02D1202:199b-35: gsang ba'i dbang ni gnyis pa mchog / shes rab ye shes gsum pa ste //
T02D1202:199b-36: de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa'o //
T02D1202:199b-37: sa brgyad la sogs dbye ba yis //
T02D1202:199b-38: rim bzhin sbyar nas dbang bskur thob //
T02D1202:199b-39: des ni bla ma slob dpon gyur //
T02D1202:199b-40: gzhan rnams la yang dbang bskur nus //
T02D1202:199b-41: zhes gsungs pas kyang btub ste /
T02D1202:199b-43: de bas na 'dir bla ma las lhag pa gzhan
T02D1202:199b-44: ston pa chen po yod pa'am zhes gsungs te go
T02D1202:199b-45: sla'o // de ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid bla ma yin par bstan nas /
T02D1202:199b-46: 'di nas mar sngags kyi bla ma'i don gzung ba dang /
T02D1202:200a-0: 'jig rten pa'i chos spang zhir sgra mkhan la sogs pa la dbang dang man ngag @200a * //
T02D1202:200a-2: gang zhig bla ma'i bstan bcos la //
T02D1202:200a-3: mdzad dam bshad pa gang la lar //
T02D1202:200a-4: zhes pa ni bla ma rje btsun gyis bstan pa'i
T02D1202:200a-5: sgrub thabs la sogs pa'am yang na mdzad pa'i sgrub
T02D1202:200a-7: yang na man ngag bstan par yang rung ba'i chos gang na gang ngo //
T02D1202:200a-8: de ni bstan bcos de tshad don //
T02D1202:200a-9: de ni de nyid 'khrul pa med //
T02D1202:200a-10: ces bya ba ni de zhes pa dang gang zhes pa 'brel la ste /
T02D1202:200a-11: bla mas gang na gang gis bstan cing bshad pa'am /
T02D1202:200a-13: man ngag la sogs pa'i chos de ni yang dag pa'i tshad ma'i don te /
T02D1202:200a-14: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1202:200a-15: rjes dpag mngon sum tshad ma'i don //
T02D1202:200a-16: thar 'dod pas ni nges par gzung //
T02D1202:200a-17: bzung nas rjes dpag bsgoms pa las //
T02D1202:200a-18: don dam pa yi bden pa rnyed //
T02D1202:200a-20: yang dag pa'i tshad ma ni bla mas mngon sum
T02D1202:200a-21: du zhal gyis man ngag bstan pa la rjes su
T02D1202:200a-22: dpag nas bzung ba ste yang phyag rgya chen po
T02D1202:200a-23: thob par 'dod pas nges par byas nas bla ma
T02D1202:200a-24: ma brjed par gzung ba de la bsgoms pa'i 'bras
T02D1202:200a-25: bu don dam pa'i bden pa phyag rgya chen po
T02D1202:200a-27: gtan tshigs des mtshan ma la sogs pa'i 'khrul pa'i
T02D1202:200a-28: chos thams cad kyang 'gag pa la ni 'khrul pa
T02D1202:200a-29: med ces bya'o // slob dpon smras dang bdag gis smras //
T02D1202:200a-30: de la bye brag mi dbye'o //
T02D1202:200a-31: zhes pa ni don dam pa rtogs pa'i slob ma
T02D1202:200a-32: bla ma drin can de ltar bu'i rnal 'byor pa
T02D1202:200a-33: ni bla ma dang gnyis bye brag chos gang la
T02D1202:200a-34: yang med par shes shing rtogs pa'o //
T02D1202:200a-35: de ni slob dpon smras dang zhes pa la sogs pa'i don no //
T02D1202:200a-36: rnal 'byor zhes pa ni thub pa'i rgyud shes pa'i phyi'i rnams so //
T02D1202:200a-38: rnal 'byor ma rgyud ces bya ba ni thabs kyi rgyud rnams dang /
T02D1202:200a-39: shes rab kyi rgyud rnams zhes pa'o //
T02D1202:200a-40: slob dpon bstan bcos byed pa gang //
T02D1202:200a-41: zhes pa ni brtsams shing byas pa'i chos rnams so //
T02D1202:200a-42: de la sgra dang sgra ngan du //
T02D1202:200a-43: lha yi dbang phyug brtag mi bya //
T02D1202:200a-44: zhes bya ba ni de la zhes pas 'brel par sngar bshad de /
T02D1202:200a-45: bla mas mdzad pa dang brtsams pa'i chos thams cad
T02D1202:200a-46: ni sgra ngan pa yin par bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1202:200b-0: lha'i dbang phyug bos nas @200b gsungs so //
T02D1202:200b-1: 'di lta bu la sgra ngan par bstan te /
T02D1202:200b-2: snyan dang gas zlos gar gyi bstan bcos zhes pa
T02D1202:200b-3: ni phyin ci log gi tshad ma la sogs pa
T02D1202:200b-4: ni sangs rgyas kyis mdzad pa'i chos dang mi 'dra
T02D1202:200b-5: ba 'di ni mu stegs la sogs pa dang mthun
T02D1202:200b-7: sgra dang sgra ngan brtag par bya //
T02D1202:200b-9: sngags kyi bstan bcos gtan la phab //
T02D1202:200b-10: ces pa ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02D1202:200b-11: yang na rtsa bzhi'i don du rnam par la sogs par shes par bya'o zhes pa ni /
T02D1202:200b-13: bya gdong ma de kho na nyid //
T02D1202:200b-14: gsum bdag nyid kyi rnam pa'o //
T02D1202:200b-15: ra sa n'a 'jug pa ni gtum mo'o //
T02D1202:200b-16: zla ba bde ba mchog gi tshad du bstan to //
T02D1202:200b-17: srog ma brten pa bdag nyid de //
T02D1202:200b-18: phyag rgya chen po'i rang ngo bo //
T02D1202:200b-20: aa wa sh'u t'i gnas pa'i rtog med ma'i rang
T02D1202:200b-21: bzhin de'i mtha' la rnam pa la sogs pa dang
T02D1202:200b-22: bral ba'o // rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u bcu drug pa'i dka' ba bkral ba'o /
T02D1202:200b-24: // / sngar de kho na la sogs pa bshad pas don rtogs pa'i phyir /
T02D1202:200b-25: de nas lha mo rab tu dgyes //
T02D1202:200b-26: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das mo phyag rgya chen po dgyes pa'o //
T02D1202:200b-27: rang bzhin don ni gsal ba'i phyir //
T02D1202:200b-28: zhes bya ba ni gong du bshad pa ni rang
T02D1202:200b-29: bzhin dga' ba'i ngo bor gsal zhing khong du chud
T02D1202:200b-30: pa'i phyir ro // dam po ru ni 'khyud byas nas //
T02D1202:200b-31: padma dam pa rab tu bskyed //
T02D1202:200b-33: bcom ldan 'das la sbyor ba'i tshul du 'khyud de /
T02D1202:200b-34: gsang ba'i kakko la dang bo la gnyis bskyod pa'i
T02D1202:200b-35: sbyor ba las bzhengs nas yang zhu ba bgyid do
T02D1202:200b-36: // dur khrod la sogs pa yi don //
T02D1202:200b-37: rdo rje rgyal po la ni zhus //
T02D1202:200b-38: zhes pa ni dur khrod dang shing dang rtsva dang
T02D1202:200b-39: lha mo la sogs pa'i don bcom ldan mos zhus
T02D1202:200b-40: pa'o // bsrub dang zhes pa ni la la n'a dang gnyis sbyor ba'o //
T02D1202:200b-41: bsrub pa'i sbyor ba ni yang nas yang du bskyod pa ste /
T02D1202:200b-42: thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba zhes bshad do //
T02D1202:200b-43: sbyor ba las dgyes pa la ni las zhes pa'o //
T02D1202:200b-44: dpal bdag dgyes nas bka' stsal to //
T02D1202:200b-46: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i dpal dkyil 'khor /
T02D1202:200b-47: thabs kyi bdag po yin sbyor las //
T02D1202:200b-48: ye shes myong bas dgyes pa des //
T02D1202:200b-49: bcom ldan mo la bka' stsal to //
T02D1202:201a-1: khrod la sogs kyi ni don //
T02D1202:201a-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1202:201a-3: phyi dang nang gsang ba'i dbye bas dur khrod dang
T02D1202:201a-4: shing dang lha mo la sogs pa'i don gsungs pa'o
T02D1202:201a-7: sprul pa'i 'khor lo la sogs pa'i dbus kyi lte ba ni srog gi rtsa yin par ston no //
T02D1202:201a-8: srog rtsa ba dang lhan cig rtsa gsum dang ldan
T02D1202:201a-9: pa'i zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems dang
T02D1202:201a-10: srog rlung gi rten byed pa'i ngang /
T02D1202:201a-13: aa wa dh'u t'i gsum lhan cig ste srog gi
T02D1202:201a-14: rtsa'i nang na gsum gnas pa la ni ldan zhes
T02D1202:201a-15: bya'o // 'dab ma gsum gyi padma'i g-yas ngos su pinga la /
T02D1202:201a-16: g-yon ngos su ai dang dbus su so sho man'a //
T02D1202:201a-19: 'gro ba 'grub par byed do zhes bya ba ni
T02D1202:201a-20: srog gi rtsa'i nang du gsum po gnas pa bya
T02D1202:201a-21: gdong ma'i padma dang lte bar bcas pa 'dab ma
T02D1202:201a-22: gsum pa'i 'dag nyid g-yas ngos su la la n'a
T02D1202:201a-23: dri chu 'gro bar byed pa dang /
T02D1202:201a-24: g-yon ngos su ra sa n'a si la phyir mi 'byung bar 'jug par byed do //
T02D1202:201a-25: dbus su aa wa dh'u t'i byang chub kyi sems ga bur gnas par byed pa'o //
T02D1202:201a-28: rtog med ma gsum du gsang ba'i padma'i snying po yin te /
T02D1202:201a-29: de bde ba gsum dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1202:201a-30: de dag ni bzhi po'i rtsa rnams bstan pa'o //
T02D1202:201a-31: dngos po dang ni snang pa'i ye shes srog rtsa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1202:201a-32: rten ni snang ba mched pa ye shes ra sa n'a dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1202:201a-33: ye shes ni snang ba thob pa'i ye shes la la n'a dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1202:201a-34: rnam par 'byed pa ni yang dag dri med rang
T02D1202:201a-35: bzhin gyi ye shes spros pa dang bul [*bral?] ba'i
T02D1202:201a-36: ngo bo aa wa dh'u ti'a dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1202:201a-37: las ni de rnams kyi 'byung ba ru bstan pa'o //
T02D1202:201a-38: zhal bzang mo ni bcom ldan mo la bos pa'o //
T02D1202:201a-39: de ru shes par bya ba ni rtsa de rnams su gnas sa ru bstan pa ste /
T02D1202:201a-40: ye shes rnams de ru zhes bya bas so //
T02D1202:201a-41: shar ba ni longs spyod pa'i dngos bo mchog gi dga' pa'o ;
T02D1202:201a-42: / nub pa ni rlag pa'i mtshan nyid byang chub kyi sems chad pa'o //
T02D1202:201a-43: dus ni rlag dang longs spyod gnyis las grol ba dbang gi rang bzhin te /
T02D1202:201a-44: mchog dang chad pa'i dbus su rang bzhin dga' ba'i dus so //
T02D1202:201a-45: rtsa'i 'khor lo zhes pa ni bde ba chen po'i
T02D1202:201b-0: 'khor lo nas rlung gi 'khor lo yan @201b chad
T02D1202:201b-1: kyi 'khor lo drug drug po rnams so //
T02D1202:201b-2: 'byung ba thams cad ces bya ba ni byang chub
T02D1202:201b-3: kyi sems rnams de ru 'byung bas na rnam pa
T02D1202:201b-5: 'bad pas btsal bar bya'o zhes pa ni rnal 'byor
T02D1202:201b-6: pas byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i ngo bor brtsal
T02D1202:201b-7: ba'o // gang gi phyir tsa'i 'byung ba med pa
T02D1202:201b-8: de'i phyir zhes pa ni ma btsal ni ci nyes
T02D1202:201b-9: shi na byas pa dang rtsa'i nang nas byang chub
T02D1202:201b-10: kyi sems ma btsal na bde pa chen po'i ye
T02D1202:201b-11: shes mi rnyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1202:201b-12: de bas na 'bad la brtsal dgos so //
T02D1202:201b-13: byang chub kye sems kyi zhes pa ni kun rdzob
T02D1202:201b-14: dang don dam pa'i dbye bas phye na gnyis su
T02D1202:201b-15: bsdu pa'o ; / bdud rtsi bde ba'i ye shes
T02D1202:201b-16: zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa'i bdud de'i rtsi ru
T02D1202:201b-17: 'gyur ba ni don dam pa'i ye shes de yin
T02D1202:201b-18: bsdu pa'o ; no // 'di 'jug pa dang la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1202:201b-19: byang chub kyi sems med na 'jug pa la sogs pa'i dga' ba mi shes par bstan to //
T02D1202:201b-20: ma shes na ji ltar phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub pa rnyed ces pa ni las dang /
T02D1202:201b-23: phyag rgya chen po dang bzhi'i dngos po 'jug pa dang /
T02D1202:201b-25: skye ba bzhi phyag rgya bzhi lam brten cing bde
T02D1202:201b-26: ba'i ye shes ma rnyed na phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D1202:201b-29: de bas na 'di skyon yod pa yin pas bya'o //
T02D1202:201b-30: phyag rgya chen po'i don 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor gyi
T02D1202:201b-31: dbang phyug bsam gtan la ma g-yel bar bya'o zhes
T02D1202:201b-32: gsungs so // brjod du med pa /
T02D1202:201b-35: chos thams cad kyi chos nyid /
T02D1202:201b-36: shin tu zab pa'i gting dpag dka' ba //
T02D1202:201b-37: yang dag pa'i mthar shar ba yang ma yin nub
T02D1202:201b-38: pa yang ma yin rtag tu shar pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1202:201b-39: char yang thig le mchog tu gyur pa ni phyag
T02D1202:201b-40: rgya chen po'o // de lta bu'i dngos grub 'dod
T02D1202:201b-41: pa'i thabs dang shes rab kyi don la sbyor ba'i
T02D1202:201b-42: rnal 'byor pas dbang thams cad thob nas sems rtse
T02D1202:201b-43: gcig tu bla ma rje btsun gyis gsungs pa la
T02D1202:201b-44: gnas pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1202:201b-45: rgyas par ma bstan par bla ma la khungs bstan pa bcom ldan 'das mos zhus pa'o //
T02D1202:201b-46: lha mos gsol pa ni bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa'o //
T02D1202:201b-47: bcom ldan ni bcom ldan 'dab bod pa'o //
T02D1202:202a-1: phyug gi bsam gtan 'dir ni ji lta bu zhes
T02D1202:202a-2: pa ni sngar bdag gis bshad pas 'di ru ma
T02D1202:202a-3: bshad do // bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1202:202a-4: kun rdzob ye shes rten pa las //
T02D1202:202a-5: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen
T02D1202:202a-6: po'i 'khor lo'i dkyil na aa'i tshul du gnas pa
T02D1202:202a-7: de chad dga' pho brang du rten pas ye shes
T02D1202:202a-8: kyi dngos po'o // gnyis su med pa'i gnas rab rnyed //
T02D1202:202a-9: ches pa ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis
T02D1202:202a-10: su med pa ye shes thams cad kyi rab mchog
T02D1202:202a-12: nyer 'gro bsam gtan mchog gis ni //
T02D1202:202a-13: zhes pa ni gnas de ltar bur bdag nyid kyi
T02D1202:202a-14: byang chub kyi sems nye bar 'gro ba de la
T02D1202:202a-15: sems kyi bsam pa brtan par gnas pa ni mchog
T02D1202:202a-16: yin no // grub pa chen po rnyed par 'gyur //
T02D1202:202a-17: zhes bya ba ni mchog de la dus rtag tu
T02D1202:202a-18: sems brtan par gnas pas phyag rgya chen po grub
T02D1202:202a-20: yid dang mthun pa'i rang gnas su ni rang dga'
T02D1202:202a-21: ba'i gnas te ye shes skye ba'i gnas ni chad
T02D1202:202a-23: skyon ni thams cad dang bral ba ni nyon mongs
T02D1202:202a-24: pa'i mtshan ma dang rtog pa'i gzhi ma rig pa
T02D1202:202a-25: ste / skyon de dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa med pa'o //
T02D1202:202a-26: sra ba spangs pa'i lus po yi //
T02D1202:202a-27: zhes pa ni lus thams cad chad pa ma yin pa ste /
T02D1202:202a-28: lus me bsgrims par klod la ci bder byas pa'o //
T02D1202:202a-29: rlabs med pa yi bde ba'i stan //
T02D1202:202a-30: zhes pa ni mtshan ma la sogs pa'i rlabs dang
T02D1202:202a-31: bral ba ji ltar bde ba'i stan padma'i lte bar
T02D1202:202a-32: ro // lte pa'i dbus na yod pa'i tshul //
T02D1202:202a-33: zhes pa ni rang byung gi me sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i lte ba na h'um tshul du yod pa'o //
T02D1202:202a-34: h'um gi yig 'bru drag chen grags //
T02D1202:202a-35: zhes pa ni me rang 'byung gi me h'um yin pa des rtogs pa dang mtshan ma dang /
T02D1202:202a-36: 'khor lo kun 'bar zhing bsregs pa la sogs pa'i drag po bzhin grangs so //
T02D1202:202a-38: lte ba la sogs gnas bzhir ni //
T02D1202:202a-39: 'khor lo bzhi ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1202:202a-40: lte bar sprul 'khor drug cu bzhi //
T02D1202:202a-42: mgrin par longs spyod bcu drug 'dab //
T02D1202:202a-43: spyi bor bde 'khor sum cu gnyis //
T02D1202:202a-44: padma'i dngos po rtsa re re //
T02D1202:202a-45: gsang bar rlung dkyil gzhu 'dra dang //
T02D1202:202a-46: de steng mi 'khor gru gsum mo //
T02D1202:202b-0: yig @202b 'bru'i dngos po rtog pa yin //
T02D1202:202b-1: btsums pa dang ni phye ba yis //
T02D1202:202b-2: shes rab thabs las me 'byung bas //
T02D1202:202b-3: las kyi rlung gis me 'bar ro //
T02D1202:202b-5: rtog pa'i bdag nyid mkha' 'gro bsregs //
T02D1202:202b-7: longs spyod 'khor lo lan gsum bskor ;
T02D1202:202b-8: / na sa g-yas byung smin gnyis phrag / au rgyan tshigs rgyas gser skor bshegs //
T02D1202:202b-9: bde chan yod pa'i bdud rtsir 'jug / ri bong can gyi bdud rtsi gsol //
T02D1202:202b-10: thugs rje'i char gyi rgyun 'bab pa //
T02D1202:202b-11: sngar lam zhugs nas smin phrag zhugs //
T02D1202:202b-12: byang chub sems kyis longs spyod gnas //
T02D1202:202b-13: sngar bsregs mkha' 'gro rab tu tshim //
T02D1202:202b-14: lta ba'i dbus na gnas pa'o //
T02D1202:202b-15: yar gyis bsregs la mar gyis gso //
T02D1202:202b-16: skra yi rtse mo 'bum gyi cha //
T02D1202:202b-19: srog dang rngub pa 'gog pa yis //
T02D1202:202b-20: zhes pa ni byang chub sems dang rlung du ldan
T02D1202:202b-21: pa'i srog dang stsol ba'i rlung gnyis 'grogs na bde
T02D1202:202b-22: ba chen po'o // srog dang rngub pa'i bza' ba gsol //
T02D1202:202b-23: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems bde ba
T02D1202:202b-24: chen po de phyir mi gtang bar nang du bza'
T02D1202:202b-25: bar bya'o // srog dang rngub pa gnyis zos nas //
T02D1202:202b-26: shes pa ni mchog dga' dang chad pa'i dga' ba
T02D1202:202b-27: gnyis kyi gnas de ru zos pa ni kun rdzob
T02D1202:202b-29: de na gang yin par 'gyur na chu zla lta
T02D1202:202b-30: bu den byang chub kyi sems bdud rtsis khams gsum
T02D1202:202b-31: gang nas ye shes dang ldan pas ni 'khor ba
T02D1202:202b-32: mchog dga' dang mya ngan las 'das pa chad dga'
T02D1202:202b-34: de nas de ni rtags ni kum //
T02D1202:202b-35: zhes pa ni rin chen khar zla ba gang ba'i
T02D1202:202b-36: dus na snga'i rlung la sogs pa yang 'gags nas
T02D1202:202b-37: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas nas rtags brgyad 'byung ngo
T02D1202:202b-38: // mtshan ma zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1202:202b-39: de yang sgom pa la sems brtan pa las rtogs pa 'byung ngo //
T02D1202:202b-40: de nas rnal 'byor dbang shes nas ni rnal 'byor
T02D1202:202b-41: dbang phyug gi bsam gtan gyi rim pa shes nas
T02D1202:202b-42: / rnam par shes pa'i ye shes mchog gi aa'i tshul du mi dmigs par bsgom pa'i don to //
T02D1202:202b-43: nang du lta ba byas pas na sems rtse gcig
T02D1202:202b-44: tu mi g-yel bar bdag rang gi nang du gtang
T02D1202:203a-1: bo'i skra'i mtshams su ste mtshog mar ro //
T02D1202:203a-2: rtsi mo zab pa ru ni de'i steng gi rtse
T02D1202:203a-3: mo ni bde chen gnas pa tshangs pa'i bug pa
T02D1202:203a-4: chos thams cad kyi dbyings yin pas dang zab pa'o
T02D1202:203a-5: // mchog gi nam mkha' ru ni mkha' //
T02D1202:203a-6: zhes pa ni chos thams cad kyi dbyings de ni
T02D1202:203a-7: brjod du med pa rab mchog ; rmad du byung
T02D1202:203a-8: ba 'di bde chen gyi nam mkha' ru gnas te
T02D1202:203a-9: aa'i dngos po'i tshul du bshad do //
T02D1202:203a-10: yi ge mchog ni tshor byas nas ni aa skye
T02D1202:203a-11: ba med pa de la bsgoms pas nyams su myong
T02D1202:203a-12: nas rtogs pa'i shes rab bo //
T02D1202:203a-13: tshangs pa'i yul sa'i pad phug byas //
T02D1202:203a-14: zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i la la'i
T02D1202:203a-15: lte ba rgyas par bya ba'i bde ba chen po'i
T02D1202:203a-16: ye shes so // chags pa dang bral gnas su 'gro //
T02D1202:203a-17: zhes pa ni bde ba chen po ye shes de
T02D1202:203a-18: spros pa dang bral ba'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i gnas
T02D1202:203a-20: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas yin par ston to //
T02D1202:203a-21: dpal dang ldan pa'i rdor 'dzin pa'i //
T02D1202:203a-22: lha mo gnas der shes par bya //
T02D1202:203a-23: zhes pa thabs kyi mkha' dang shes rab kyi dbyings shes pas gnas te /
T02D1202:203a-24: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa 'khor dpag
T02D1202:203a-25: tu med pa'i yang dpag tu med pa dang bcas
T02D1202:203a-26: nas bzhugs pa la ni lha mo la bos nas
T02D1202:203a-28: de lta bu yi 'dus pa'i sa'i //
T02D1202:203a-30: mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma dang rnal 'byor dang
T02D1202:203a-31: rnal 'byor ma la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i 'khor
T02D1202:203a-32: thams cad sngar gyi gnas su 'dus pa la de
T02D1202:203a-33: skad ces bya'o // dur khrod chen po'i chos kyi
T02D1202:203a-34: 'byung gnas kyi gzhir zhes pa ni dbugs 'byung ba
T02D1202:203a-35: la sogs pa spangs pa'i dur khrod ye shes la
T02D1202:203a-36: sogs pa'i shin tu bde ba chen po 'dus byas
T02D1202:203a-37: kyi chos thams cad dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos
T02D1202:203a-38: rnams de las 'byung ba'i phyir ni chos kyi 'byung
T02D1202:203a-39: gnas thams cad kyi skye ba dang 'gag pa dang
T02D1202:203a-40: skad ces bya'o // / gnas sa yin pas na gzhi zhes bshad do //
T02D1202:203a-41: grangs med pa ni bye bas yang dpag tu med pa'i yang dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1202:203a-42: rnal 'byor ni rang bzhin dga' ba'i don la mchog
T02D1202:203a-43: gi dga' ba dang chad pa'i dga' bas sbyor bas
T02D1202:203a-44: so // phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob ste
T02D1202:203b-0: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni @203b sngar bshad
T02D1202:203b-1: so // do // rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u bcu bdun pa'i dka' bkral ba'o /
T02D1202:203b-3: // / sor bcu gnyis ni tshigs pa med //
T02D1202:203b-4: ces pa ni mgrin pa'i steng nas tshigs pa'am /
T02D1202:203b-5: 'dud pa med pa'i sang nge 'dug pa'i sor bcu gnyis kyis tshangs pa'i bu ga'i bar du'o //
T02D1202:203b-6: 'og gi cha ni bcu gnyis phyed //
T02D1202:203b-7: ces pa ni mgrin pa'i 'og ni rlung gi 'khor
T02D1202:203b-8: lo yan chad du bcu gnyis phyed de mdud pa
T02D1202:203b-9: drug yod pa'o // de bzhin sprul pa'i padma ru //
T02D1202:203b-10: zhes pa la sogs pa ni sngar bzhin du mdud
T02D1202:203b-11: pa sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i gsang ba'i padma'i rtsa gtso
T02D1202:203b-12: bo gsum ste / pi+nga la dang /
T02D1202:203b-14: so sho mna' gsum gyis padma'i 'dab ma gsum mo //
T02D1202:203b-15: des ni ye shes gsal bar byed do //
T02D1202:203b-16: de rnams la ni 'di ltar bstan te /
T02D1202:203b-17: rtsa dang bcas pa'i lte ba'i nang du zhes pa gsungs so //
T02D1202:203b-18: rtsa dang padmar bcas pa'i lte ba yod pa'i nang du 'byung ngo //
T02D1202:203b-19: rtsa ba rtsa ba'i nang 'ongs nas //
T02D1202:203b-20: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen
T02D1202:203b-21: po'i 'khor lo na yod pa'i chos thams cad kyi
T02D1202:203b-23: rtsa ba de rtsa bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa
T02D1202:203b-24: gnyis kyi rtsa ba srog gi nang du 'ongs nas
T02D1202:203b-25: bde ba la la gnas so //
T02D1202:203b-27: 'dab ma'i skye ru bcar te gnas //
T02D1202:203b-28: zhes pa la sogs pa ni srog rtsa dang /
T02D1202:203b-32: rtog med ma dang bcas pa ste gsum gyis 'dab
T02D1202:203b-33: ma la gnas pa rtsa'i rtse mo slar la dum
T02D1202:203b-34: gcig bkug nas yod pa de ni sangs rgyas rin
T02D1202:203b-35: chen snod do // bu ga phra mos nang na ldan //
T02D1202:203b-36: zhes pa la sogs pa ni srog gi rtsa ba la bu ga dang /
T02D1202:203b-37: 'dzin ma la sogs pa'i rtsa gsum dang ldan nas gnas pa'o //
T02D1202:203b-38: 'dzin ma la sogs pa'i rten kyang yin te dga' ba'i rang bzhin rtsa gsum gyi rten no //
T02D1202:203b-39: rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis med kyis //
T02D1202:203b-40: zhes pa ni srog gi rtsa ni rgyul [*rgyu la]
T02D1202:203b-41: rtsa gzhan gsum po ni 'bras bu ste bde ba
T02D1202:203b-42: chen po'i rang bzhin dga' ba ni gnyis su med
T02D1202:203b-44: rtsa ba 'bras bu rgya yis btab pa ni rang
T02D1202:203b-45: bzhin gyi ye shes kyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rtsa
T02D1202:203b-46: la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad ni gnyis su
T02D1202:203b-47: med pa 'do rab kyis rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D1202:203b-48: drug phyed rtsa ba dang ldan ni //
T02D1202:204a-0: la sogs pa ni srog gi rtsa dang rtsa gsum ldan pa'i @204a * //
T02D1202:204a-2: yang na srog gi rtsa sor gsum bya gdong du yod pa la bya ba la bstan to //
T02D1202:204a-3: srog gi rtsa ni byad dang gzugs la sogs pa gsal ba'i chos can yin no //
T02D1202:204a-4: de yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang sprul pa'i sku la sogs pa'i yon tan no //
T02D1202:204a-5: bcu drug phyed phyed bye brag tu //
T02D1202:204a-6: zhes pa ni bcu drug gi phyed brgyad //
T02D1202:204a-11: srog gi rtsa dang bzhi la ni srog ma 'dzin ma ro ma /
T02D1202:204a-12: rtog med ma bzhi ru bshad do //
T02D1202:204a-13: de ni rtsa'i skud pa gcig pu'o //
T02D1202:204a-14: zhes pa ni don dam pa ru gcig pu'o //
T02D1202:204a-15: rtsa ba gsum dbye skal ldan mo //
T02D1202:204a-16: zhes pa la sogs pa ni yang na 'dzin ma
T02D1202:204a-17: la sogs pa gsum la 'bras bu yang de rang
T02D1202:204a-18: ngo // yang na srog rtsa bya gdong gi gnas
T02D1202:204a-19: su sor gsum na med re mdud pa med par
T02D1202:204a-20: ngo // 'dug go // 'bras bu gsum po'i sna
T02D1202:204a-21: la sor gcig gnas pa 'di ni rtsa dang 'bras
T02D1202:204a-22: bu gnyis kyi gnas ni la la n'a dang /
T02D1202:204a-24: aa wa dh'u ti'a dang gsum gyi gnas ni srog gi rtsa'o //
T02D1202:204a-25: gsum po rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag la ni bcu gnyis phyid do //
T02D1202:204a-26: gcig po ni de rnams 'bras bu gcig pa'o //
T02D1202:204a-27: 'bras bu ni phra ba'i rnag bzhin nam 'jam pa rtog med ma'o //
T02D1202:204a-28: rin chen ba nang yan chad do //
T02D1202:204a-29: zhes pa la sogs pa ni bde ba chen po'i
T02D1202:204a-30: 'khor lo'i lte ba nas rlung gi 'khor lo lte
T02D1202:204a-31: ba rin po che'i kha ru gnas pa ye shes
T02D1202:204a-32: kyi rang bzhin thig le rgya ba'i rta pa'i skud
T02D1202:204a-33: pa / sbyor ba drug gi rten byed pa'i skud pa yod do //
T02D1202:204a-34: sbyor ba drug ni char yang zhes pa la sogs pa bstan to //
T02D1202:204a-35: dpal ni gzhan min 'dir ni chad ;
T02D1202:204a-36: / ces pa rgyud kyi mtshan dang tshad bstan te
T02D1202:204a-37: dpal ye shes thig le ni sbyor ba drug tu
T02D1202:204a-38: bshad do // 'di skad du shr'i dz'a na ti la ka zhes pa'i //
T02D1202:204a-39: char yang dang thig le'i tshul //
T02D1202:204a-40: tshul tsam mchog zhan mchog drug dang //
T02D1202:204a-42: dpal ldan ye shes thig le 'di //
T02D1202:204a-43: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen
T02D1202:204a-44: po'i ngo bo ru bzhugs pa 'di ni thams cad
T02D1202:204a-45: kyi bdag po'o // mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los sgyur //
T02D1202:204a-46: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1202:204a-47: mkha' 'gro ma stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ba dang /
T02D1202:204a-48: de yang rtsa'i dngos po yin te /
T02D1202:204b-0: @204b rtsa re re mkha' 'gro ma re re bstan te /
T02D1202:204b-1: mkha' ni stong pa la byang chub kyi sems 'gro ba'o //
T02D1202:204b-2: yan na chos thams cad dbyings su 'gro ba'o //
T02D1202:204b-3: 'jug pa gnas pa longs spyod yin //
T02D1202:204b-4: zhes pa ni g-yon gyi ai da sa hi la
T02D1202:204b-5: gyen du 'jug pa'i steng du 'gro ba longs spyod
T02D1202:204b-6: kyi gnas pa'o // rlag pa 'gro ba'i gnas su yod //
T02D1202:204b-7: ces pa ni la la n'a gla rtsi 'og tu 'gro ba rlag pa'i gnas so //
T02D1202:204b-8: 'byung ba dbang gis gnas su ste //
T02D1202:204b-9: zhes pa dbus kyi so sho mna' ga bur gnas pa dbus su gnas nas dbang gis gnas so //
T02D1202:204b-10: rang bzhin de ni mchog gzhan mchog / ces pa ni rlag pa dang /
T02D1202:204b-12: dbang dang gsum la sogs pa'i 'bras bu phyag rgya
T02D1202:204b-13: chen po'i rang bzhin ni mchog dang mchog gi yang
T02D1202:204b-14: mchog go // g-yon la sogs pa ni shes par slo'o //
T02D1202:204b-16: zhes pa ni g-yon pa la sogs pa'am /
T02D1202:204b-18: de rnams lte ba'i dbus su ni //
T02D1202:204b-19: zhes pa ni rtsa rnams la sogs pa gsang ba'i lte ba'i dbus na yod do //
T02D1202:204b-20: skra rtse bye ba brgya yi cha //
T02D1202:204b-21: zhes pa ni mtshan pa'i ngo bo'i tshul te rab tu gsungs so //
T02D1202:204b-22: tshad dang de bzhin du ni gnas //
T02D1202:204b-23: zhes pa ni de yang chad du tshad dang gnas bstan pa'i skabs su mtshan kyang bstan pa'o //
T02D1202:204b-24: zhal bzangs ye shes thig le'o //
T02D1202:204b-25: zhes pa la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1202:204b-26: de kun sa yi dbang phyug bdag / ces pa
T02D1202:204b-27: ni sa bcu drug gi bdag po ni bcom ldan
T02D1202:204b-28: 'das dpal ye shes thig le dbang phyug chen po'o
T02D1202:204b-29: // gnas la sogs pa dga' ba'i gnas //
T02D1202:204b-30: zhes pa ni gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs
T02D1202:204b-31: pa bcu drug po ni dga' ba bcu drug sbyar
T02D1202:204b-32: ro // sa yi sgra yis brjod yin no //
T02D1202:204b-33: zhes pa ni mos pa spyod pa la sogs pa bcu drug dang yang sbyor ro //
T02D1202:204b-35: de ni gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa'i rim pas sbyar te /
T02D1202:204b-37: gnas la sogs rim dbye ba yis //
T02D1202:204b-38: dga' sogs rim par dbye ba'o //
T02D1202:204b-39: de ltar sa yi dbye ba'o //
T02D1202:204b-40: gnas dang 'dod dga' mos spyod sa //
T02D1202:204b-41: nye gnas 'dar dga' rab dga'i sa //
T02D1202:204b-42: zhing dang 'gro dga' dri med sa //
T02D1202:204b-43: nye zhing dga' bo 'od byed pa //
T02D1202:204b-45: nye tshan bdud dga' sbyang dga' ba //
T02D1202:205a-0: @205a * // nye 'dus mchog dga' ring du song //
T02D1202:205a-1: dur khod 'bar dga' mi g-yo ba //
T02D1202:205a-2: nye 'dus thig dga' chags blo gros //
T02D1202:205a-3: byil mos dga' ba chos sprin sa //
T02D1202:205a-4: nye byi chad dga' kun du 'ong //
T02D1202:205a-5: lam nas au ta dga' kun snang mched //
T02D1202:205a-6: nye ba'i tshul dga' snang ba thob //
T02D1202:205a-7: sbyor ba gnyis dga' 'od rab sa //
T02D1202:205a-8: nye sbyor rang bzhin brjod du med //
T02D1202:205a-9: gnas la sogs pa'i dbye ba yis //
T02D1202:205a-10: dga' bas sa dang phe la sbyar //
T02D1202:205a-12: gzhan yang rgya cher sbyar ro //
T02D1202:205a-13: mos pa spyod pa ni drod rtse mo bzod pa
T02D1202:205a-14: 'jig rten chos kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i sa ste
T02D1202:205a-15: dang po'o // chu'i dbang gi 'bras bu'o //
T02D1202:205a-16: rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u bco brgyad pa'i dka' ba bkral pa'o /
T02D1202:205a-18: // / rgyud la sogs pa'i tshad la sogs pa bstan
T02D1202:205a-19: nas bcom ldan mos slob dpon dang slob ma 'brel
T02D1202:205a-21: rgyud kyi rim pa gong du ma gsungs pa des zhus pas /
T02D1202:205a-22: de nas yang ni bshad bya ba ni zhus ma
T02D1202:205a-23: thag bshad par zhal gyis bzhes pa ste gong du
T02D1202:205a-25: bla ma slob ma'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1202:205a-26: zhes pa la sogs pa ni de gnyis 'brel pa'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D1202:205a-27: de yang sngon la bla ma'i yon tan bstan to //
T02D1202:205a-28: gzhan zhes pa la sogs pa ni bum pa'i dbang
T02D1202:205a-29: la sogs dbye ba dang gsang ba'i dbang dang shes
T02D1202:205a-30: rab ye shes kyi dbang bzhi pa'i dbang la sogs
T02D1202:205a-31: pa dgongs pa'i dbang yan chad thob pa /
T02D1202:205a-32: sems can la snying rje dang ldan pa /
T02D1202:205a-33: sngags kyi spyod la sogs pas rlabs chen po dang
T02D1202:205a-34: yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i bla ma rdo
T02D1202:205a-36: slob ma yang de ltar yon tan tshang ba'i slob ma gzung ngo ;
T02D1202:205a-37: / rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u dgu pa'i dka' ba bkral ba'o /
T02D1202:205a-39: // / slob dpon la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid bshad nas
T02D1202:205a-40: rgyud kyi rim pa dang don dang bcas par bshad
T02D1202:205a-41: do // sa bon las ni myu gu bzhin //
T02D1202:205a-42: zhes pa ni sa bon myu gu de las sngon
T02D1202:205a-43: du de bzhin du rtsa ba'i rgyud las brtag pa'i
T02D1202:205a-44: rgyud / de las rgyud phyi ma /
T02D1202:205a-45: de las phyi ma'i phyi ma /
T02D1202:205a-49: de las rmad du 'byung ba'i rgyud do //
T02D1202:205a-50: rgyud kun rim pas so zhes pa ni sngon ma'i
T02D1202:205a-51: rgyud de ltar shes pas gzhan rnams kyang shes rnams
T02D1202:205b-0: kyang shes pa'i rim pa ni 'brel pa @205b la
T02D1202:205b-2: yang na don ni rgyud yin te //
T02D1202:205b-3: zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i don ni tshig
T02D1202:205b-4: dang yi ges mtshon pas 'brel pa la rgyud ces
T02D1202:205b-5: pa'am / yang na rdo rje sems dpa'i don brjod pa la ni sngar bzhin rgyud 'dzin zhes bya'o //
T02D1202:205b-6: yang na rim pa gnyis ni rgyud// ces pa ni
T02D1202:205b-7: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sgo nas zhugs pas rdzogs pa'i
T02D1202:205b-9: lha mo ni pos nas bshad pa'o //
T02D1202:205b-10: gang du skal ldan mo zhes pa ni dus gcig tu gnas pa'i sa ste /
T02D1202:205b-12: shes rab thabs gnyis phrad pa'i sa //
T02D1202:205b-13: de ni rgyud du bshad pa yin //
T02D1202:205b-14: zhes bya ba ni yum gnyis bsrubs pa las zla
T02D1202:205b-15: ba nyi ma phrad pa gang yin pa'i skal ba
T02D1202:205b-16: dang ldan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1202:205b-17: slar rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rigs gcig tu gyur pa
T02D1202:205b-19: yang na ye shes las 'byung ba //
T02D1202:205b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni tantra ni rgyud de /
T02D1202:205b-21: yab yum gnyis lha'i sku rdzogs nas tha mal pa'i
T02D1202:205b-22: rtog pa la sogs pa'i dri ma spangs nas zla
T02D1202:205b-23: ba dang nyi ma'i dngos po 'dres pa las tshad
T02D1202:205b-24: pa'i dga' ba de'i rnam pa las rang bzhin dga'
T02D1202:205b-25: ba don dam pa mtshan ma la sogs pa dang
T02D1202:205b-26: bral ba kun rdzob tu cha'i zla ba nya gang
T02D1202:205b-27: bzhin du gnas pa ni aa'i don to //
T02D1202:205b-29: aa ni skye ba dang 'gag pa med de gang
T02D1202:205b-30: la skye 'gag med pa de la ni don dam
T02D1202:205b-31: pa zhes bya'o // mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las kyang //
T02D1202:205b-32: aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / khor nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
T02D1202:205b-34: lung las kyang 'di skad ston te /
T02D1202:205b-35: aa zhes nam mkha'i dbyings na bde //
T02D1202:205b-36: brjod pa thams cad spangs pa ste //
T02D1202:205b-37: 'gag pa ma yin skye ba min //
T02D1202:205b-38: skye 'gag gnyis dang bral ba min //
T02D1202:205b-40: des ni dam pa'i tshul gyi rgyud kyi don yang bshad do //
T02D1202:205b-41: rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u nyi shu pa'i dka' ba bkral ba'o /
T02D1202:205b-43: // / rgyud ces bya ba yab yum gnyis yin par
T02D1202:205b-44: bstan pas bcom ldan 'das mos bdag rang gi ngo
T02D1202:205b-45: bo dang rgyud gang yin pa zhus pa'o //
T02D1202:205b-46: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa ni bstan
T02D1202:205b-47: gyis de bzhin du rtogs par dka' ba'i don ni
T02D1202:205b-48: sgrub pa po yang dag pa'i ye shes dang ldan
T02D1202:205b-49: pas bcom ldan mo rnyed pa'o //
T02D1202:205b-50: lha mo khyod ni 'byung ba min //
T02D1202:206a-0: zhes pa la sogs pa ni rgyu las @206a * //
T02D1202:206a-1: kyang mi 'byung gcig nas gcig tu yang mi skye /
T02D1202:206a-2: gong nas 'og tu yang 'pho ba ma yin /
T02D1202:206a-3: skye shi'i mtshan ma la sogs pa'i chos dang bral ba'i rlabs can no //
T02D1202:206a-4: rang gi ngo bo ye shes 'od //
T02D1202:206a-5: ces pa la sogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ye shes thig le sdar bstan pa de'i 'od /
T02D1202:206a-6: de bas na rang 'od kyi shes rab ces gsungs so //
T02D1202:206a-7: 'di ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bye brag
T02D1202:206a-8: gis phye na phyi la sogs pa'i rang gi shes
T02D1202:206a-9: rab dang bcas pa'i dbye ba'o //
T02D1202:206a-10: gzhan min bdag dang khyod min na //
T02D1202:206a-11: zhes pa la sogs pa ni yab dang yum gnyis
T02D1202:206a-12: med na de bzhin gshegs pas kyang rnyed par dka'i
T02D1202:206a-13: / 'jig rten thams cad kyis bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'i skyon yod de /
T02D1202:206a-15: mgo bo bcad pa'i mi bzhin du //
T02D1202:206a-17: thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos dang 'dra ba shes nas
T02D1202:206a-18: 'di ltar sems can rnams rdo rje 'dzin pa'i 'bras
T02D1202:206a-19: bu rnyed pa yang lha mo'i yon tan du brjod
T02D1202:206a-20: do // don dam par de ltar yin yang /
T02D1202:206a-21: kun rdzob bskyed pa'i rim par ni //
T02D1202:206a-22: mchog gi nam mkha'i gnas nas byon //
T02D1202:206a-23: zhes pa la sogs pa ni bde ba chen po'i
T02D1202:206a-24: 'khor lo mchog khyad par can gyi nam mkha' nas
T02D1202:206a-25: byon nas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lor gshegs pa
T02D1202:206a-26: dang / chos kyi 'khor lor gnas so //
T02D1202:206a-27: de nas sprul pa'i 'khor lor dus rtag tu bzhugs te /
T02D1202:206a-28: bde ba chen po byang chub sems ni rgyu yin la //
T02D1202:206a-29: longs spyod ni 'byung ba'i khungs so //
T02D1202:206a-30: chos ni gnas pa'i rten sprul ba ni rang bzhin gyi gzhi'o //
T02D1202:206a-31: kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs su ni //
T02D1202:206a-32: zhes pa la sogs pa ni kun rdzob las don
T02D1202:206a-33: dam pa'i ye shes kyi sku yab kyi byang chub
T02D1202:206a-34: kyi sems dang / yum gyi byang chub kyi sems
T02D1202:206a-35: kyi tshul du gsang sna'i snying po na bzhugs so
T02D1202:206a-36: kyi sems dang / // langs na bde ba yin padma //
T02D1202:206a-37: thig le khong du chud pa'i phyir //
T02D1202:206a-38: zhes pa ni gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi
T02D1202:206a-39: sems kyi thig le rtogs nas rnyed par bya ba'i
T02D1202:206a-40: don du thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor ba las
T02D1202:206a-41: rlung gis me sbar ba las langs te sprul bar
T02D1202:206a-42: 'bar ba'o // gshegs nas brten pa kun ka tshig / ces pa ni /
T02D1202:206a-43: lte ba nas gyen du gtum mo'i 'od gshegs pas
T02D1202:206a-44: chos kyi 'khor lo'i rtog pa'i dngos po'i phung po
T02D1202:206a-45: dang khams la sogs pa kun bsreg pa'o //
T02D1202:206a-46: rgyal ba'i thig le khyer nas su //
T02D1202:206b-0: zhes @206b pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis
T02D1202:206b-1: longs spyod la sogs pa nas gser sgor zhugs pas
T02D1202:206b-2: bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi la rol cing yang
T02D1202:206b-4: yang ni khyod 'dir byon pa'i don //
T02D1202:206b-5: zhes pa'i thabs dang lhan cig snod rang gi padma ru byin pa'o //
T02D1202:206b-7: chos kyi 'khor lo'i bar du bsregs pa'ang gsos nas
T02D1202:206b-8: lte ba'i sprul ba'i 'khor lo'i dbus na gnas pa'o
T02D1202:206b-9: // de'i tshe zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1202:206b-10: rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i dka' ba bkral ba'o /
T02D1202:206b-12: // / phyag rgya chen po'i rang gi ngo bo bstan nas yang bshad do //
T02D1202:206b-13: byang chub sems ni gsang ba yin //
T02D1202:206b-14: zhes pa ni gsang ba don rab 'bring tha ma'i dbye bas gsum du bshad do //
T02D1202:206b-15: khu ba'i byang chub kyi sems la skabs 'dir gsang zhes bstan te /
T02D1202:206b-16: khu ba'i ngo bo 'phur dang bral //
T02D1202:206b-17: zhes pa la sogs pa ni khu ba de 'gro
T02D1202:206b-18: ba dang 'pho ba la sogs pa dang bral ba
T02D1202:206b-19: shes rab kyi bha ga la gnas pa sems can
T02D1202:206b-20: thams cad la yang gnas pa dga' ba myong bar
T02D1202:206b-22: bcom ldan mos gsol pa zhes pa la sogs pa

T02D1202:206b-24: / byang chub kyi sems kyi khu ba'i gzugs gsang
T02D1202:206b-25: ba yin phan chad khams gsum gyi sems can thams
T02D1202:206b-26: cad kyis gsang ba shes pas de'i phyir bum pa'i
T02D1202:206b-27: / dbang / gsang ba'i dbang la sogs pa bskur
T02D1202:206b-28: mi dgos par thar bar 'gyur pa'i skyon yod pas
T02D1202:206b-29: / dbang / so // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
T02D1202:206b-30: stsal pa zhes pa slar lha mo la bskyar ba'o
T02D1202:206b-31: / dbang / so // // sangs rgyas kyi yum
T02D1202:206b-32: de ni bden zhes pa la sogs pa de ni
T02D1202:206b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs lnga la sogs pa'i bskyed
T02D1202:206b-34: pa'i ma byang chub kyi sems gsang ba khu ba
T02D1202:206b-35: yin pas ma nor bar nges par gzung ngo //
T02D1202:206b-36: 'on kyang ni de ltar yin yang drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don gnyis su dbye'o //
T02D1202:206b-38: drang ba'i don gyi tshig gis ldan ;
T02D1202:206b-39: / zhes pa ni drang don du byas pa'i dbang
T02D1202:206b-40: gis tshig tu smos pas skyen tig dang don du
T02D1202:206b-41: ldan no // rten gyi don phyir yang dag nges pa'i don //
T02D1202:206b-42: rten med na ni 'bras bu rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02D1202:206b-43: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems khu ba'i gzugs
T02D1202:206b-44: gsang ba la brten pa drang ba'i don yin yang
T02D1202:207a-1: gyis bde ba'i ye shes rnyed la /
T02D1202:207a-2: khu ba'i ngo bo rten med na nges pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bu mi rnyed pa'o //
T02D1202:207a-3: lus kyi dngos med ji ltar 'di ru sems //
T02D1202:207a-4: ji ltar don mthun gsang zhes pa ni dper na
T02D1202:207a-5: lus po med na sems gnas pa med pa bzhin
T02D1202:207a-6: / dpe de ltar khub med na bde ba med pa ni don mthun pa'o //
T02D1202:207a-7: 'o na skye mched mu bzhi la gzugs med pa'i khams so //
T02D1202:207a-8: de'i phyir 'dod chags kyi chos bstan pa'o //
T02D1202:207a-9: khu ba'i gzugs gang yin pa lus te /
T02D1202:207a-10: de na bde ba'i sems yod pa'i mi 'gal lam
T02D1202:207a-11: zhe na de ni de ltar bden te 'on kyang
T02D1202:207a-12: me tog gzugs med par dri'i dngos po mi 'byung

T02D1202:207a-15: 'dod khams pa'i dbang du chos bstan pa'o //
T02D1202:207a-16: des ni tha ma'i gsang ba bstan to //
T02D1202:207a-17: drang ba'i don min nges pa'i don yang min //
T02D1202:207a-18: zhes pa la sogs pa ni kun rdzob kyi bskyed
T02D1202:207a-19: rim dang bral nas don dam pa'i rdzogs pa'i gsang
T02D1202:207a-20: ba ste rab kyi gsang ba bstan to //
T02D1202:207a-21: yang na 'bring gi don gyis su //
T02D1202:207a-22: zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'bring gi gsang ba ste /
T02D1202:207a-23: de ni rang bzhin dga' ba rab kyi gsang ba rnyed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1202:207a-24: de rnyed pa ni brjod du med pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo yin no //
T02D1202:207a-25: rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'i dka' ba bkral ba'o /
T02D1202:207a-27: // / gsang ba'i don bcom ldan 'das kyis rang bzhin
T02D1202:207a-28: dga' ba zhes gsungs pas rang bzhin rtogs na chos
T02D1202:207a-29: thams cad kyi rtsa ba don dam pa yin par
T02D1202:207a-30: dgongs nas / de nas bcom ldan mos 'jam pa'i
T02D1202:207a-31: dbyangs kyis yang zhu bar byed do zhes pa la
T02D1202:207a-32: sogs pas ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1202:207a-33: mgon ma mchis pa'i mgon du gyur pa'i mgon po
T02D1202:207a-34: zhes dbyangs snyan cing 'jam pa brjod nas chos thams
T02D1202:207a-35: cad khyod kyis sngar gtan la phab pa'i don rang
T02D1202:207a-36: bzhin dga' ba ji lta ba ji lta ba lags
T02D1202:207a-37: zhes zhus pa ste lha mos so //
T02D1202:207a-38: de lta bu'i tshig thos nas zhes pa ni rang
T02D1202:207a-39: bzhin dga' ba'i don dam pa spros pa dang bral
T02D1202:207a-40: ba de'i ngo bo ji lta bu zhes pa'i tshig
T02D1202:207a-41: thos nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung ba'i dngos
T02D1202:207a-42: pos zhes pa la sogs pas ni rang bzhin dga'
T02D1202:207a-43: ba'i don la zhugs te bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1202:207b-0: rang bzhin dga' ba'i don ni mchog dang chad pa'i gnyis @207b las grol ba /
T02D1202:207b-5: zad pa med cing 'phel ba med //
T02D1202:207b-6: skye ba med cing 'gag ba med //
T02D1202:207b-8: 'pho ba med cing gnas pa med //
T02D1202:207b-9: thog ma ma yin tha ma min //
T02D1202:207b-10: dbu ma min zhing mtha' yang min /
T02D1202:207b-12: gzung ba ma yin 'dzin pa min //
T02D1202:207b-14: thams cad der ni 'dus pa yin //
T02D1202:207b-15: rnal 'byor dbang phyug dus shes pa //
T02D1202:207b-16: dus dang bral ba rang bzhin don //
T02D1202:207b-17: de lta'i rang bzhin don dam pa //
T02D1202:207b-18: shar ba med cing nub pa med //
T02D1202:207b-19: gnyis po gang sbyar ba yi dus //
T02D1202:207b-20: de ni rang bzhin dga' bar bshad //
T02D1202:207b-22: de nas bcom ldan mo zhes pa nas /
T02D1202:207b-23: cang mi smra bar bzhugs so zhes pa'i bar gyis rang bzhin gyis don zhus pas 'gyod pa'o //
T02D1202:207b-24: de'i dus su bya ba nas sna tshogs par snang /
T02D1202:207b-25: yod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bcom
T02D1202:207b-26: ldan 'das mo 'khor dang bcas pa sna tshogs padma'i
T02D1202:207b-27: nang chos kyi 'byung gnas stong bar mthong ba la
T02D1202:207b-28: sogs pa'o // de yang sna tshogs zhes pa ni 'khor rnams dang bcas pa'i tshogs pa'o //
T02D1202:207b-29: padma zhes pa ni chos nyid skye ba med pa'i dbyings skyon dang bral ba'o //
T02D1202:207b-30: chos kyi 'byung gnas ni sngar bshad do //
T02D1202:207b-31: stong pa la sogs pa ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02D1202:207b-32: kye byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D1202:207b-33: ni bcom ldan 'das mo 'khor dang bcas pas dris
T02D1202:207b-34: pa'o // lha'i dbang phyug gis zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1202:207b-36: rang bzhin brjod du med pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni sngar bshad do //
T02D1202:207b-37: rig pa med de'i phyir dris pa la lan med
T02D1202:207b-38: pa zhes pa ni sngar bstan kyang 'dir ni shes
T02D1202:207b-40: rtogs pa med pa la bstan du med pa ston
T02D1202:207b-41: cig gsungs pas na lan med pas na bzhugs zhes
T02D1202:207b-42: bshad do ; / rang bzhin dga' ba dpe ji ltar snang ba med pa dang /
T02D1202:207b-43: de ltar nyams su kun rdzob tu myong ba yin zhe na'o //
T02D1202:207b-44: rang bzhin dga' ba'i nam mkha' bzhin snang ba med de snang ba thams cad dang bral ba'o //
T02D1202:207b-45: nyams su myong ba ni kun rdzob tu dper na
T02D1202:207b-46: bu mo lo bcu drug lon pa'i bde ba shin
T02D1202:208a-2: ji ltar gzhon pa'i chags dga' dang //
T02D1202:208a-3: ji ltar lkugs pa'i rmi lam dang //
T02D1202:208a-4: de bzhin nyid kyis mig rgyas btab //
T02D1202:208a-5: rang bzhin 'di ni shin tu phra //
T02D1202:208a-7: de yang 'di skad kyang bstan te /
T02D1202:208a-8: rtogs shig rab rtogs byed pa na //
T02D1202:208a-10: ye shes snying bo shin tu phra //
T02D1202:208a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' mkha' dang mtshungs //
T02D1202:208a-13: des ci yang ma yin pa'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i don rnyed pa'o //
T02D1202:208a-14: rang bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma las le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'i dka' ba bkral ba'o; ;
T02D1202:208a-15: // gzhan rnams ni bla mas 'chad par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1202:208a-16: thams cad kyi rtsa ba rang bzhin dga' ba'i nor
T02D1202:208a-17: bu rin po che dang 'dra ba las 'bras bu
T02D1202:208a-20: rang bzhin dga' ba'i sdom gang yin //
T02D1202:208a-21: sus shes rnal 'byor dbang phyug ste ;
T02D1202:208a-22: / de ni bdag gis gsal bshad pa //
T02D1202:208a-23: rang bzhin mkha' 'gror bzod par gsol //
T02D1202:208a-24: dbang bzhi thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1202:208a-25: skabs su bshad bzhin phye ba yis //
T02D1202:208a-26: dga' ba bzhi yi 'bras bu btsal //
T02D1202:208a-27: mkha' 'gro ma bzhi bzod par gsol //
T02D1202:208a-28: smyon pa lta bu'i tshig yin yang //
T02D1202:208a-29: dran pa lta bu'i don 'byung bas //
T02D1202:208a-30: sangs rgyas lta bu'i bla rnams la //
T02D1202:208a-31: sgyu ma lta bu'i bzod pa gsol //
T02D1202:208a-32: rang bzhin dga' ba'i rin chen 'di //
T02D1202:208a-33: ye shes sgron mas gsal bar byas //
T02D1202:208a-34: rnyed nas dbul phongs bral ba bzhin //
T02D1202:208a-35: sems can kun gyi rin chen shog //
T02D1202:208a-37: bdag gis brtsams pa'i dge ba 'dis //
T02D1202:208a-38: khams gsum ye shes sgron gyur nas //
T02D1202:208a-39: rang bzhin don ni rnyed par shog / dpal rang
T02D1202:208a-40: bzhin dga' ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel
T02D1202:208a-41: / khog don bsdus pa slob dpon chen po rdo
T02D1202:208a-42: rje gsang ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so
